anya-e0804n:14_0: I gatiyaṃ. Yesaṃ dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Pavattipāpuṇānipi. Tatra
anya-e0804n:14_1: gamanaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyagamanaṃ ñāṇagamanañca. Tesu kāyagamanaṃ nāma iriyāpathagamanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:14_2: ñāṇagamanaṃ nāma ñāṇuppatti, tasmā payogānurūpena “gacchatī”ti padassa “jānātī”tipi
anya-e0804n:14_3: attho bhavati, “pavattatī”tipi attho bhavati, “pāpuṇātī”tipi attho bhavati, iriyāpathagamanena
anya-e0804n:14_4: gacchatītipi attho bhavati, ñāṇagamanena gacchatītipi attho bhavati. Tathā hi “sīghaṃ
anya-e0804n:14_5: gacchatī”tiādīsu iriyāpathagamanaṃ “gamana”nti vuccati. Sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato. “Gatimā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:14_6: pana ñāṇagamanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathāpayogaṃ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:15_0: Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti. Kārite “udāyatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati. Uṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0804n:15_1: hi attho, dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti, abhisameti,
anya-e0804n:15_2: samayo, abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito,
anya-e0804n:15_3: apeto, sameto, etabbo, paccetabbo, paṭiyamāno, paṭicco, ento, adhippeto, adhippāyo,
anya-e0804n:15_4: paccayo, aññānipi yojetabbāni. “Itā, ita”ntiādinā yathārahaṃ itthinapuṃsakavasenapi.
anya-e0804n:15_5: Paccetuṃ, upetuṃ, samupetuṃ, anvetuṃ, sametuṃ, abhisametuṃ, icca, paṭicca, samecca,
anya-e0804n:15_6: abhisamecca, apecca, upecca, paṭimukhaṃ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna,
anya-e0804n:17: Idamettha na vattabbaṃ, dassanāyeva me ruto.
anya-e0804n:23_0: Tatra itāyanti iti ayanti chedo. Itiiti ca gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha
anya-e0804n:23_1: suttapadattho – yo doso loke “kodho”ti lokiyamahājanena vuccati, nāyaṃ atthato kodhoti
anya-e0804n:23_2: vattabbo. Kinti pana vattabbo, eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva kodhavasena
anya-e0804n:23_3: pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo. Taṃ evarūpaṃ “maccurājā”ti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:23_4: bahuno janassa anatthakaraṃ kodhaṃ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.
anya-e0804n:24_0: Etīti imassa pana āgacchatīti attho. “Etī”ti ettha hi āupasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā
anya-e0804n:24_1: na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya. Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho
anya-e0804n:24_2: bhavati, ākārassa ca ikārena parena saddhiṃyeva ekārādeso. Tasmā “ayaṃ so sārathī
anya-e0804n:24_3: eti. Etu vessantaro rājā”tiādīsu “āgacchati, āgacchatū”tiādinā attho kathetabbo.
anya-e0804n:24_4: Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ
anya-e0804n:24_5: manasi kātabbā. Atha vā itīti rassavasena vuttaṃ padaṃ gamanaṃ bodheti, etīti vuddhivasena
anya-e0804n:24_6: vuttaṃ pana yathāpayogaṃ āgamanādīni. Mattāvasenapi hi padāni savisesatthāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:24_7: Taṃ yathā? Sāsane pabbajito, raṭṭhā pabbājitoti. Saññogāsaññogavasenapi, taṃ yathā?
anya-e0804n:24_8: Gāmā niggacchati. Yasaṃ poso nigacchati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:25: I gatiyanti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṃ gatā yadā;
anya-e0804n:30: Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṃ yathā.
anya-e0804n:35_0: Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo, iti āgamanattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:35_1: Āha ca suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etīti īti, āgantukānaṃ akusalabhāgīnaṃ byasanahetūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:36_0: Idāni yathārahaṃ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṃ itiito saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate
anya-e0804n:36_1: – tattha itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo.
anya-e0804n:36_2: Tathā hesa “ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
anya-e0804n:36_3: “Tasmātiha me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā,
anya-e0804n:36_4: kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane. “Iti
anya-e0804n:36_5: vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiattho. “Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0804n:36_6: saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:36_7: padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo
anya-e0804n:36_8: bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo paṇḍito”tiādīsu pakāro. “Atthi
anya-e0804n:36_9: idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā
anya-e0804n:36_10: jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n:36_11: avadhāraṇe. “Atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto, natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:36_12: nidassane. Nipātavaseneva te payogā gahetabbā. “Itāyaṃ kodharūpenā”ti ettha pana
anya-e0804n:36_13: ākhyātavasena gamane itisaddo dissati. Ayamevattho idhādhippeto, nipātattho pana
anya-e0804n:36_14: na icchitabbo, viññūnaṃ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṃ kevalaṃ atthuddhāravasena
anya-e0804n:41: Gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito;
anya-e0804n:43_0: Idha pana samayasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ sanibbacanaṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari ayadhātuvisayeyeva
anya-e0804n:43_1: vakkhāma i e ayadhātuvasena tidhātumayattā samayasaddassa. Tatra itīti ikārānantaratyantapadassa
anya-e0804n:43_2: ca “eti, udetī”tiādīnañca ekārānantaratyantapadānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ padamālā
anya-e0804n:43_3: yathārahaṃ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dukkarā
anya-e0804n:43_4: kriyāpadamālā. Yasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca tyantapadamālā jānitabbā,
anya-e0804n:43_5: tasmā bhūvādigaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:46: Iti etī”ti cetesaṃ, padānaṃ pana pantiyo;
anya-e0804n:59: Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.
anya-e0804n:62_0: Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo
anya-e0804n:62_1: vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo pañcamīnayo. Ettha ca imesaṃ
anya-e0804n:62_2: dvinnaṃ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni “veti, apeti, anvetī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0804n:62_3: vi iti veti. Vigacchatīti attho, itisaddo hettha gamanaṃ bodheti. Tathā apa iti apeti.
anya-e0804n:62_4: Apagacchatīti attho. Anu iti anveti. Anugacchatīti attho. Garū pana anu eti anvetīti vadanti. Taṃ –
anya-e0804n:65: Evaṃ taṃ anugacchāmi, putte ādāya pacchato”ti.
anya-e0804n:66_0: Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti “jessantaṃ anvetī”ti vacanato “anugacchāmī”ti vacanato ca.
anya-e0804n:66_1: Tathā hi etisaddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako, tattha āgamanaṃyeva joteti, na gamanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:66_2: tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo ñeyyo. Etesañca
anya-e0804n:66_3: itisaddavasena katachedānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ yuttibhāvañca “itāyaṃ kodharūpenā”ti pāḷiyeva
anya-e0804n:66_4: sādheti, tasmāyeva “anu iti, anu inti, anu isī”tiādinā “anvetī”tiādīnaṃ chede labbhamānanayena
anya-e0804n:66_5: vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito. Sattamīrūpādīni sabbathā appasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n:67_0: Imāni pana bhavissantiyā rūpāni, sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha.
anya-e0804n:67_1: Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ, issāmhe. Asabbadhātukattepi
anya-e0804n:67_2: suddhassarattā dhātussa ikārāgamo na labbhati. Paripuṇṇo bhavissantīnayo.
anya-e0804n:68_0: Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṃsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṃ, issamhā.
anya-e0804n:68_1: Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ, issāmhase. Kālātipattibhāve ca asabbadhātukatte
anya-e0804n:68_2: ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa akārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā
anya-e0804n:68_3: ca akārāgamo na hoti. Dvinnañhettha suddhassarānaṃ anantarikānaṃ ekatosannipāto anupapatti.
anya-e0804n:69_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṃ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:69_1: “nanu te sutaṃ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne, devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā”ti pāḷito
anya-e0804n:69_2: nayaṃ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso samānāni asamānatthāni
anya-e0804n:69_3: vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṃ aññamaññaṃ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṃ rūpāni
anya-e0804n:69_4: ca pakāsayissāma – vattamānāvasena tāva “issati, issanti. Issasi, issathā”ti sabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:69_5: yojetabbaṃ. Attho pana “issaṃ karotī”tiādinā vattabbo. Tasmiṃyeva atthe bhavissantīvasena
anya-e0804n:69_6: “ississati, ississanti. Ississasi, ississathā”ti paripuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Attho pana
anya-e0804n:69_7: “issaṃ karissatī”tiādinā vattabbo. Kālātipattivasena pana “ississā, ississaṃsu. Ississe,
anya-e0804n:69_8: ississathā”ti paripuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ, attho pana “issaṃ akarissā”tiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0804n:71: Eti, enti. Esi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n:72: Etu, entu. Ehi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n:73: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṃ, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito;
anya-e0804n:75: Yadā te pahiṇissāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya.
anya-e0804n:76: Eyya, eyyuṃ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṃ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṃ, eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n:77: So puriso eyya, te eyyuṃ. Tvaṃ eyyāsi, tumhe eyyātha. Ahaṃ eyyāmi, mayaṃ eyyāma. So puriso etha, te eraṃ. Tvaṃ etho, tumhe eyyāvho. Ahaṃ eyyaṃ, mayaṃ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n:79: Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṃ, essāmhe.
anya-e0804n:81: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ.
anya-e0804n:82: “Abhidosagato idāni ehī”ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:83: Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṃ, ehissāmhe.
anya-e0804n:84: Essā, essaṃsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṃ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṃ, essāmhase.
anya-e0804n:86: Udeti, udenti; Udesi, udetha; Udemi, udema.
anya-e0804n:87: Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
anya-e0804n:88: Udeyya, udeyyuṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissā, udissaṃsu. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:91_0: Ku sadde ke ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati, evaṃ kattupadāni bhavanti. Kuyyati, kiyyati,
anya-e0804n:91_1: evaṃ kammapadāni. Kānanaṃ, kabbaṃ, jātakaṃ, evaṃ nāmikapadāni. Kutvā, kutvāna, kavitvā,
anya-e0804n:91_2: kavitvāna, kāvitvā, kāvitvāna, kāyituṃ, evaṃ abyayapadāni.
anya-e0804n:92: Tatra kānananti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṃ karotīti kānanaṃ, vanaṃ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:94: Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma”nti
anya-e0804n:95_0: Vuttaṃ. Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṃ. Manoharatāya
anya-e0804n:95_1: avassaṃ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti kabbaṃ. Kāviyaṃ. Kāveyyaṃ. Aññatra pana kavīnaṃ idanti
anya-e0804n:95_2: kabbanti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo. Keci tu kābyanti saddarūpaṃ icchanti, na
anya-e0804n:95_3: taṃ pāvacane pamāṇaṃ sakkaṭabhāsābhāvato. Sakkaṭabhāsātopi hi ācariyā nayaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0804n:95_4: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ atītaṃ bhagavato cariyaṃ, taṃ kīyati kathīyati etenāti jātakaṃ. Jātakapāḷi
anya-e0804n:95_5: hi idha “jātaka”nti vuttā. Aññatra pana jātaṃ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṃ. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n:95_6: jātakasaddo desanāyampi vattati “itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhamma”ntiādīsu. Jātiyampi
anya-e0804n:96_0: Pakka nīcagatiyaṃ. Nīcagamanaṃ nāma hīnagamanaṃ hīnappavatti vā. Nīcasaddo hi hīnavācako
anya-e0804n:96_1: “nīce kule paccājāto”ti ettha viya. Pakkati kriyāpadamettha dissati, na nāmikapadaṃ.
anya-e0804n:96_2: Yattha yattha nāmikapadaṃ na dissati, tattha tattha nāmikapadaṃ upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:96_3: Kriyāpadameva hi duddasaṃ, kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:96_4: tasmā antamaso “pakkanaṃ, takanaṃ” iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu
anya-e0804n:98_0: Taki kicchajīvane. Kicchajīvanaṃ kasirajīvanaṃ. Taṅkati. Ātaṅkati. Ātaṅko. Ātaṅkoti
anya-e0804n:98_1: kicchajīvitakaro rogo, tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā “appābādhaṃ appātaṅka”nti imasmiṃ
anya-e0804n:98_2: pāḷippadese iti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ “ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati, yā ekadese
anya-e0804n:98_3: uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti. Ātaṅkoti kicchajīvitakaro
anya-e0804n:98_4: rogo. Atha vā yāpetabbarogo ātaṅko, itaro ābādho. Khuddako vā rogo ātaṅko, balavā
anya-e0804n:98_5: ābādho. Keci pana ‘ajjhattasamuṭṭhāno ābādho, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno ātaṅko’ti vadantī”ti.
anya-e0804n:103: Suka gatiyaṃ. Sokati, suko, sukī. Tatra sukoti suvo. Sokati manāpena gamanena gacchatīti suko. Tassa bhariyā sukī.
anya-e0804n:104: Bukka bhassane. Idha bhassanaṃ nāma sunakhabhassanaṃ adhippetaṃ “sunakho bhassitvā”ti ettha viya, na “āvāso gocaraṃ bhassa”ntiādīsu viya. Vacanasaṅkhātaṃ bhassanaṃ, bukkati sā.
anya-e0804n:105: Dhaka paṭighāte gatiyañca. Paṭighāto paṭihananaṃ. Dhakati.
anya-e0804n:106: Caka tittipaṭighātesu. Titti tappanaṃ, paṭighātaṃ paṭihananaṃva. Cakati.
anya-e0804n:107_0: Aka kuṭilagatiyaṃ. Akati. Etā kuādikā akapariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū
anya-e0804n:107_1: vadanti. Tesaṃ mate etā “ti anti, tu antu” iccādīnaṃyeva visayo. Pāḷiyaṃ pana niyamo
anya-e0804n:107_2: natthi, tasmā na taṃ idha pamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:108_0: I ajjhayane. Ajjhayanaṃ uccāraṇaṃ sikkhanaṃ vā, ayati, adhīyati, ajjhayati, adhīte,
anya-e0804n:108_1: ajjhenaṃ, ajjhāyako. Dibbaṃ adhīyase māyaṃ. Adhīyanti mahārāja, dibbamāyidha paṇḍitā.
anya-e0804n:108_2: Ajjhenamariyā pathaviṃ janindā. Tattha ajjhāyakoti ajjhayatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti attho.
anya-e0804n:109: U sadde. Avati, avanti. Avasi. Ettha “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti pāḷi papubbassa udhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo. Papubbassa vadadhātussa dakāralopappayogotipi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0804n:110: Vaṅka koṭille. Vaṅkati. Vaṅkaṃ. Vaṅkasaddo hi vakkasaddena samānattho, vakkasaddo ca vaṅkasaddena. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:112: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
anya-e0804n:113_0: Pāḷi dissati. Ayaṃ pana vakkasaddo sakkaṭabhāsaṃ patvā kakārarakārasaññogakkhariko
anya-e0804n:113_1: bhavati, dhātubhāvo panassa porāṇehi na vutto, tasmā kriyāpadaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ. Imassa
anya-e0804n:113_2: pana vaṅkasaddassa “vaṅka koṭille”ti dhātubhāvo vutto, “vaṅkatī”ti kriyāpadañca,
anya-e0804n:113_3: pāḷiyaṃ tu “vaṅkatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ, tathā bhāvavācako vaṅkasaddopi. Vāccaliṅgo
anya-e0804n:113_4: pana anekesu ṭhānesu diṭṭho. Tatta vaṅkatīti kriyāpadaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva
anya-e0804n:113_5: nāthatīti kriyāpadamiva. Bhāvavācakassa pana vaṅkasaddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu
anya-e0804n:113_6: punappunaṃ upaparikkhitabbā. Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “yadi bhāvavācako vaṅkasaddo natthi,
anya-e0804n:113_7: kathaṃ ‘aṭṭhavaṅkaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāra’nti ettha samāso”ti. Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0804n:113_8: vaṅkaṃ aṭṭhavaṅkaṃ, na aṭṭhavaṅkāni yassāti. Dabbavācako hi vaṅkasaddo, na bhāvavācakoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:117: Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
anya-e0804n:118: Ayañhi “te’me janā vaṅkaghastā sayanti. Yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chāditaṃ. Vaṅkaghastova ambujo”tiādīsu baḷise vattati.
anya-e0804n:119_0: Ettha siyā “nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita’nti ettha
anya-e0804n:119_1: vaṅkasaddo guṇavācako visesanasado, yena baḷiso visesito, tena vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ baḷisanti
anya-e0804n:119_2: attho viññāyatī”ti? Tanna, vaṅkasadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho
anya-e0804n:119_3: pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena payojanaṃ. Idaṃ pana “baḷisaṃ vaṅka”nti vacanaṃ “hatthi
anya-e0804n:119_4: nāgo. Saroruhaṃ padumaṃ. Hatthī ca kuñjaro nāgo”tiādivacanamiva pariyāyavacanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:119_5: tasmā “vaṅka”nti padassa “kuṭila”nti attho na gahetabbo. Atha vā yathā “yathā āraññakaṃ
anya-e0804n:119_6: nāgaṃ, dantiṃ anveti hatthinī”ti ettha nāgasaddassa dantīsaddassa ca aññamaññapariyā
anya-e0804n:119_7: yavacanattepi dantinti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṃvaṇṇito, tathā “baḷisaṃ vaṅka”nti
anya-e0804n:119_8: imesampi aññamaññaṃ pariyāyavacanattepi vaṅkanti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo. Evañhi
anya-e0804n:119_9: sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti, desanā ca vilāsappattā, na pana “vaṅkaṃ
anya-e0804n:119_10: baḷisa”nti saddānaṃ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo “buddho bhagavā
anya-e0804n:119_11: verañjāyaṃ viharatī”tiādīsu “buddho bhagavā”ti imesaṃ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa
anya-e0804n:119_12: anicchitabbattā. Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.
anya-e0804n:122_0: “Buddhaṃ buddhaṃ nikhilavisayaṃ suddhiyā yāva suddhi”nti ca ādīsu pana anumato. Ettha
anya-e0804n:122_2: ca “parinibbuto”ti ca imāni “satthā”ti anena padena samānādhikaraṇāni. Tathā “buddhaṃ
anya-e0804n:122_3: buddha”nti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ pacchimaṃ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:123_0: Iti “yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita”nti ettha vaṅkasaddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṃ,
anya-e0804n:123_1: na guṇavācako. Evaṃ vaṅkasaddo baḷise vattati. “Kaṅkaṃ gacchāma pabbataṃ. Dūre vaṅkatapabbato”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:123_2: pana girivisese vattati. Ettha ca “vaṅkapabbato”ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṃ niruttinayena
anya-e0804n:123_3: majjhe animittaṃ takārāgamaṃ katvā “vaṅkatapabbato”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā vaṅkoyeva vaṅkatā,
anya-e0804n:123_4: yathā devo eva devatā. Yathā ca disā eva disatāti, evaṃ tāpaccayavasena vaṅkatā ca
anya-e0804n:123_5: sā pabbato cāti “vaṅkatapabbato”ti vuttaṃ, majjhe rassavasena cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha
anya-e0804n:123_6: vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti mantuatthe tapaccayo, yathā pabbamassa atthīti
anya-e0804n:123_7: pabbatoti. Evaṃ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato. “Vaṅkapabbato” icceva
anya-e0804n:123_8: vā paṇṇatti, pādakkharapāripūriyā pana “dūre vaṅkatapabbato”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:124_0: Loka dassane. Lokati. Loko. Ālokoti aññānipi rūpāni gahetabbāni. Curādigaṇaṃ pana
anya-e0804n:124_1: patvā imissā “loketi, lokayati, oloketi, olokayatī”tiādinā rūpāni bhavanti. Lokoti
anya-e0804n:124_2: tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha “eko loko, sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti
anya-e0804n:124_3: āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko. Sattā eva loko sattaloko. Cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto
anya-e0804n:124_4: okāso eva loko okāsaloko, yo “bhājanaloko”tipi vuccati. Tesu saṅkhāro lujjatīti lokoti.
anya-e0804n:124_5: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī”ti. Lokiyati
anya-e0804n:124_6: ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti satto loko. Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto
anya-e0804n:124_7: okāso loko. Yasmā pana lokasaddo samūhepi dissati, tasmā lokiyati samudāyavasena
anya-e0804n:124_8: paññāpiyatīti loko, samūhoti ayampi attho gahetabbo. Atha vā lokoti tayo lokā kilesaloko
anya-e0804n:124_9: bhavaloko indriyalokoti. Tesaṃ sarūpaṃ curādigaṇe kathessāma bahuvidhatañca. Bahiddhā
anya-e0804n:124_10: pana kavīhi “loko tu bhuvane jane”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:125_0: Siloka saṅghāte. Saṅghāto piṇḍanaṃ. Silokati, siloko, silokamanukassāmi. Akkharapadaniyamito
anya-e0804n:125_1: vacanasaṅghāto siloko. So pajjanti vuccati, tathā hi “siloko yasassi pajje”ti kavayo vadanti.
anya-e0804n:126: Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo ravo, ussāho vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
anya-e0804n:127: Reka saki saṅkāyaṃ. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṃ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
anya-e0804n:130: Kata loliye. Lolabhāvo loliyaṃ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Kakati, kāko, kākī. Ettha “kāko, dhaṅko, vāyaso, bali, bhoji, ariṭṭho”ti imāni kākābhidhānāni.
anya-e0804n:131: Kuka vaka ādāne. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako. Ettha kokoti araññasunakho. Vakoti khuddakavanadīpiko, byagghotipi vadanti.
anya-e0804n:132: Vaka dittiyaṃ paṭighāte ca. Ditti sobhā, vakati.
anya-e0804n:133_0: Kaki vaki sakka tika ṭika seka gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati,
anya-e0804n:133_1: osakkati, vadhāya parisakkanaṃ. Biḷāranisakkamattampi. Tekati, ṭekati, ṭīkā sekati.
anya-e0804n:133_2: Ettha ṭīkāti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṃvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā. Etā idhātuādikā sekapariyantā
anya-e0804n:133_3: dhātuyo “attanobhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṃ mate etā “te ante, taṃ antaṃ”iccādīnaṃyeva
anya-e0804n:134_0: Hikka abyattasadde. Abyattasaddo avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati,
anya-e0804n:134_1: hikkate. Imaṃ “ubhayatobhāsā”ti vadanti. Idaṃ tu pāvacanena saṃsandati. Parassattanobhāsānañhi
anya-e0804n:134_2: dhātūnaṃ “bhavati, bhavate, bādhate, bādhatī”tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.
anya-e0804n:137_0: Khā pakathane khyā ca. Pakathanaṃ ācikkhanaṃ desanaṃ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti. Āpubbatte
anya-e0804n:137_1: visadisabhāvena khātyakkharassa dvittaṃ, ākārassa ca saññogapubbattā rassattaṃ, akkhāti.
anya-e0804n:137_2: Akkhāsi purisuttamo. Akkheyyaṃ te ahaṃ ayye. Dhammo saṅkhāyati. Akkhāyati. Atra pana
anya-e0804n:137_3: kakāralopo. Svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo. Saṅkhāto. Akkhāto. Akkhātāro tathāgatā. Saṅkhātā
anya-e0804n:137_4: sabbadhammānaṃ vidhuro. Saṅkhā, paṭisaṅkhā. Kriyaṃ ākyāti kathetīti ākhyātaṃ. Keci
anya-e0804n:137_5: pana “svākhāto”ti ca “svākkhyāto”ti ca “svākhyāto”ti ca padamicchanti. Tattha pacchimāni
anya-e0804n:137_6: sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttāni, itaraṃ yathāṭhitarūpanipphattivasena, ato yathādassitapadāniyeva
anya-e0804n:137_7: pasatthatarāni. Tattha saṅkhāsaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate – saṅkhāsaddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanāsu
anya-e0804n:137_8: dissati. “Saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu hi ñāṇe dissati. “Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:137_9: koṭṭhāse. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Na sukaraṃ
anya-e0804n:140_0: Khi khaye. Khiyanadhammaṃ khīyati. Sāsanānurūpena sare ikārassa iyyādeso, khiyyati.
anya-e0804n:140_1: “Khayo, khaṃ” iccapi rūpāni ñeyyāni. Tattha khayoti khiyanaṃ khayo. Atha vā khiyanti
anya-e0804n:140_2: kilesā etthāti khayo, magganibbānāni. Khayasaṅkhātena maggena pāpuṇiyattā phalampi
anya-e0804n:140_3: khayo. Khanti tucchaṃ suññaṃ vivittaṃ rittaṃ, khanti vā ākāso.
anya-e0804n:141_0: Khi nivāse. Khīyati, khiyyati vā. Sāsanānurūpena ikārassa īya iyyādeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:141_1: Ayaṃ divādigaṇepi pakkhipitabbo. Khaṃ khayaṃ. Abhiramaṇīyaṃ rājakkhayaṃ. Tattha khīyatīti
anya-e0804n:141_2: nivasati. Khanti cakkhādiindriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhena. Khayanti nivesanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:147: Khe khādanasattāsu. Khāyati. Undūrā khāyanti. Vikkhāyitakaṃ. Gokhāyitakaṃ. Assirī viya khāyati. Disāpi me na pakkhāyanti. Etthādimhi kāyatīti khādati. Atha vā upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.
anya-e0804n:148_0: Sukha dukkha takriyāyaṃ. Takriyāti sukhadukkhānaṃ vedanānaṃ kriyā, sukhanaṃ dukkhananti
anya-e0804n:148_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ. Sukhito, dukkhito.
anya-e0804n:148_2: Sukhaṃ sātaṃ pīṇanaṃ, dukkhaṃ vighātaṃ aghaṃ kileso. Tattha sukhanti sukhayatīti
anya-e0804n:148_3: sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Dukkhanti dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:148_4: Yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti
anya-e0804n:148_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sukhadukkhasaddatthaṃ vadantehi garūhi sukhayati dukkhayatisaddānaṃ
anya-e0804n:148_6: kammatthamādāya vivaraṇassa katattā. Tathā hi “sukheti sukhayati, sukhāpeti sukhāpayati,
anya-e0804n:148_7: dukkheti dukkhayati, dukkhāpeti dukkhāpayatī”ti imāni tesaṃ kāritapadarūpāni, attānaṃ
anya-e0804n:148_8: sukheti pīṇetīti ca, sukhayati sukhaṃ, dukkhayatīti dukkhanti ca,
anya-e0804n:153_0: Pāḷiādidassanato. Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo curādigaṇeyeva
anya-e0804n:153_1: vuttā. “Sukhayati dukkhayatī”ti ca akāritāni suddhakattupadāni icchitāni. Mayaṃ tu
anya-e0804n:153_2: tesaṃ tabbacanaṃ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā,
anya-e0804n:153_3: tasmāyeva te imasmiṃ bhūvādigaṇe vuttā. Ayañhi suddhakattuvisaye asmākaṃ ruci “sukhatīti
anya-e0804n:154_0: Nanu ca bho “sukhati dukkhatī”ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:154_1: evaṃ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma. Na hi sabbathā
anya-e0804n:154_2: sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti, ekaccāni pana labbhanti, ekaccāni
anya-e0804n:154_3: na labbhanti. Evaṃ santepi nayavasena labbhantiyeva. “Kappayavho patissatā”ti hi
anya-e0804n:155_0: Tatra panāyaṃ nayo. Visuddhimaggādīsu hi “ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ gatassa vāyo
anya-e0804n:155_1: kuppati, gattāni dukkhantī”ti evaṃ bhūvādigaṇikaṃ akammakaṃ suddhakattuvācakaṃ “dukkhantī”ti
anya-e0804n:155_2: kriyāpadaṃ dissati. Tasmiṃ diṭṭhiyeva “sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi, sukhatha. Sukhāmi,
anya-e0804n:155_3: sukhāmā”tiādīni ca “dukkhati, dukkhanti. Dukkhasi, dukkhathā”tiādīnica diṭṭhāni nāma
anya-e0804n:155_4: honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā, tasmā “sukhatīti
anya-e0804n:155_5: sukhito, dukkhatīti dukkhito”ti bhūvādinayo eva gahetabbo, na pana curādinayo. Aparampettha
anya-e0804n:155_6: nibbacanaṃ, sukhaṃ sañjātaṃ etassāti sukhito, sañjātasukhoti attho. Esa nayo dukkhitoti
anya-e0804n:155_7: etthāpi. Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito. Esa nayo “dukkhito”ti etthāpi. Dullabhāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:156_0: Mokkha muccane. Akammakoyaṃ dhātu. Mokkhati. Mokkho. Pātimokkho. Kārite “mokkheti,
anya-e0804n:156_1: mokkhayati, mokkhāpeti, mokkhāpayatī”ti rūpāni. Keci panimaṃ “mokkha mocane”ti paṭhitvā
anya-e0804n:156_2: curādigaṇe pakkhipanti. Tesaṃ mate “mokkheti, mokkhayatī”ti suddhakattupadāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:156_3: Etāni pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti. Tathā hi “mokkhanti mārabandhanā. Na me
anya-e0804n:156_4: samaṇe mokkhasi. Mahāyaññaṃ yajissāma, evaṃ mokkhāma pāpakā”ti pāḷiyā virujjhanti.
anya-e0804n:156_5: “Yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho”ti aṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0804n:156_6: ca virujjhanti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “mokkhesi mokkhemā”ti ca avatvā “mokkhasi, mokkhāmā”ti
anya-e0804n:156_7: suddhakattuvācakaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca kho apādānavisayaṃ katvā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mokkheti,
anya-e0804n:156_8: mocetī”ti hetukattuvācakaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi apādānavisayaṃyeva katvā. Evaṃ imassa dhātuno
anya-e0804n:156_9: suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito, hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo vidito muca
anya-e0804n:156_10: paca chidādayo viya. Mokkhadhātu dvigaṇikoti ce? Na, anekesu sāṭṭhakathesu pāḷippadesesu
anya-e0804n:158: Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
anya-e0804n:160: Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
anya-e0804n:161: Rakkha pālane. Rakkhati. Rakkhā, rakkhaṇaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhito devadatto, sīlaṃ rakkhitaṃ devadattena, sīlaṃ rakkhako devadatto.
anya-e0804n:164_0: Nakkha gatiyaṃ. Nakkhati. Nakkhattaṃ. Ettha nakkhattanti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā
anya-e0804n:164_1: agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:164_2: Porāṇā pana “nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī”ti kathayiṃsu. “Nakkhattaṃ, joti,
anya-e0804n:169_0: Kakhi vakhi makhi kaṅkhāyaṃ. Satthari kaṅkhati. Vaṅkhati, maṅkhati. “Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā
anya-e0804n:169_1: kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsagāho āsappanā
anya-e0804n:169_2: parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho” iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā. Etesu pana –
anya-e0804n:172: Kakhi iccāyaṃ. Dhanaṃ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṃ. Abhikaṅkhitaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:173: Dakhi dhakhi ghoravāsite kaṅkhāyañca. Daṅkhati. Dhaṅkhati.
anya-e0804n:176: Jakkha bhakkhaṇe ca. Hasanānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ cakāro. Jakkhati.
anya-e0804n:177_0: Likha lekhane. Likhati, sallekhati. Atisallekhatevāyaṃ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṃ, lekhako,
anya-e0804n:177_1: likhitaṃ, sallekhapaṭipatti, etā dakhiādikā likhapariyantā “parassabhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:178: Dhukkha dhikkha sandīpanakilesanajīvanesu. Dhukkhati. Dhikkhati. Saddasatthavidū pana “dhukkhate dhikkhate”ti attanobhāsaṃ vadanti. Tathā ito parāni rūpānipi.
anya-e0804n:179_0: Rukkha vakkha varaṇe. Varaṇaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho. Ettha
anya-e0804n:179_1: ca vakkhoti rukkhoyeva. Tathā hi “sādūni ramaṇīyāni, santi vakkhā araññajā”ti jātakapāṭho
anya-e0804n:181: Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
anya-e0804n:182: Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo”ti.
anya-e0804n:183_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca sālasaddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto, nāñño ‘sālā phandanamāluvā’ti
anya-e0804n:183_1: payogadassanato, atha kimatthaṃ sālasaddena yo koci rukkho vutto”ti? Na sālarukkhoyeva
anya-e0804n:183_2: sālasaddena vutto, atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṃ kasmiñci
anya-e0804n:183_3: rukkhepi “sālo”ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā. Tathā hi sālarukkhopi
anya-e0804n:183_4: “sālo”ti vuccati. Yathāha “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṃ
anya-e0804n:183_5: sālavanaṃ, tañcassa elaṇḍehi sañchannaṃ. Antarena yamakasālāna”nti. Vanappatijeṭṭharukkhopi. Yathāha –
anya-e0804n:186: Yo koci rukkhopi. Yathāha “atha kho taṃ bhikkhave māluvabījaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sālamūle nipateyyā”ti. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:191_0: Sikkha vijjopādāne. Sikkhati. Sikkhā, sikkhanaṃ, sikkhitaṃ sippaṃ, sikkhako, sikkhito,
anya-e0804n:191_1: sekkho, asekkho. Kakāralope “sekho asekho”ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha sikkhitoti sañjātasikkho,
anya-e0804n:191_2: asikkhīti vā sikkhito, tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati “ahaṃ kho pana susikkhito anavayo
anya-e0804n:192_0: Bhikkha yācane. Bhikkhati. Bhikkhu, bhikkhā, bhikkhanaṃ, bhikkhako, bhikkhitaṃ bhojanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:192_1: Ettha pana “bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito anagāro tapassī tapodhano” iccetāni
anya-e0804n:192_2: pariyāyavacanāni. Etesu sāsane “bhikkhū”ti upasampanno vuccati. Kadāci pana “bhikkhusataṃ
anya-e0804n:192_3: bhojesi, bhikkhusahassaṃ bhojesī”tiādīsu sāmaṇerepiupādāya “bhikkhū”ti vohāro pavattati,
anya-e0804n:192_4: tāpasāpi ca samaṇasaddādīhi vuccanti, “ahū atītamaddhāne, samaṇo khantidīpano”tiādi ettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:193_0: Dakkha vuddhiyaṃ sīghatte ca. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho. Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā
anya-e0804n:193_1: etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti dakkhiṇā, dātabbavatthu.
anya-e0804n:193_2: Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho,
anya-e0804n:194_0: Dikkha muṇḍiopanayananiyamabbatādesesu. Dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye, upanayane, niyame, vate,
anya-e0804n:194_1: ādese ca pavattati. Dikkhati. Dikkhito muṇḍo. Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho sarabhaṅgajātake
anya-e0804n:194_2: “gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”ti etasmiṃ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi
anya-e0804n:194_3: “ciradikkhitānanti cirapabbajitāna”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi tattha “ciramuṇḍāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:194_4: Evaṃ sante kasmā idha “dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye vuttā”ti? Saccaṃ, tattha pana dikkhitasaddassa
anya-e0804n:194_5: pabbajite vattanato “cirapabbajitāna”nti vuttaṃ, na dhātuatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ.
anya-e0804n:194_6: Ida pana dhātuatthavibhāvanatthaṃ muṇḍiye vuttā. Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena dikkhitasaddena
anya-e0804n:194_7: vattuṃ yuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kesamassuṃ
anya-e0804n:194_8: ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe “tāpasapabbajjaṃ
anya-e0804n:194_9: pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārenti, tato paṭṭhāya parūḷhakese bandhitvā
anya-e0804n:194_10: vivaranti, tena vuttaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā”ti evaṃ attho saṃvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n:195: Ikkha dassanaṅkesu. Ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati. Upekkhā, apekkhā, paccavekkhaṇā. Kakāralope “upekhā, apekhā, upasampadāpekho”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:197_0: Cikkha cakkha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Cikkhati, ācikkhati, abbhācikkhati. Ācikkhako.
anya-e0804n:197_1: Cakkhati, cakkhu. Ettha cakkhūti cakkhatīti cakkhu, samavisamaṃ abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ
anya-e0804n:197_2: viya hotīti attho. Atha vā “sūpaṃ cakkhati, madhuṃ cakkhatī”tiādīsu viya yasmā assādatthopi
anya-e0804n:197_3: cakkhusaddo bhavati, tasmā “cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotī”ti
anya-e0804n:197_4: assādatthopi gahetabbo. “Cakkhuṃ kho māgaṇḍiyaṃ rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”nti
anya-e0804n:197_5: hi vuttaṃ. Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane eva cakkhusaddo
anya-e0804n:203: Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo vaccakaraṇaṃ. Gavati. Ge sadde. Gāyati. Gītaṃ.
anya-e0804n:204_0: Vagga gatiyaṃ. Vaggati. Vaggo, vaggitaṃ. Ettha samudāyavasena vagganaṃ pavattanaṃ
anya-e0804n:204_1: vaggo. Vaggitanti gamanaṃ. Tathā hi nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yo so majjhe assatarīrathena
anya-e0804n:204_2: catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena. Amhākaṃ putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharī dānapatī virocatī”ti
anya-e0804n:204_3: imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ vadantehi “suvaggitenāti sundaragamanenā”ti. Kiñci bhiyyo kriyāpadampi
anya-e0804n:205_0: Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati.
anya-e0804n:205_1: Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī, samaṅgitā, aṅgaṃ, aṅgaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:205_2: Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṃ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṃ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṃ.
anya-e0804n:205_3: Liṅgati. Liṅganaṃ. Ulliṅgati, ulliṅganaṃ. Taṅgati. Taṅganaṃ. Saṅgati. Saṅganaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0804n:205_4: aṅganti yesaṃ kesañci vatthūnaṃ avayavo, sarīrampi kāraṇampi ca vuccati. Aṅgaṇanti
anya-e0804n:205_5: katthaci kilesā vuccanti “rāgo aṅgaṇa”ntiādīsu. Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgipuggalā
anya-e0804n:205_6: nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti “aṅgaṇānī”ti vuccanti. Katthaci malaṃ vā paṅko vā “tasseva
anya-e0804n:205_7: rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”tiādīsu. Añjati makkhetīti hi aṅgaṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:205_8: malādi. Katthaci tathārūpo vivaṭappadeso “cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ, bodhiyaṅgaṇa”ntiādīsu. Añjati
anya-e0804n:205_9: tattha ṭhitaṃ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṃ, vivaṭo bhūmippadeso. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:210: Laga saṅgeca. Ca kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṃ. Baḷise laggo.
anya-e0804n:212: Agga kuṭilagatiyaṃ. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:213: Aggi dhūmasikho joti, jātavedo sikhī gini;
anya-e0804n:220: Gu uggame. Uggamo uggamanaṃ pākaṭatā. Gavati. Saddasatthavidū panimāsaṃ “gāte gavate”ti attanobhāsattaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:223: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāti. Ghānaṃ. Gandhaṃ ghatvā. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “gandhaṃ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā”ti. Etissā pana divādigaṇaṃ pattāya “ghāyati ghāyitvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:225: Jaggha hasane. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
anya-e0804n:227: Sighi āghāne. Āghānaṃ ghānena gandhānubhavanaṃ. Siṅghati, upasiṅghati. Upasiṅghitvā. Ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ. Etā “parassabhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:229: Raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. Gatyakkhepo gatiyā akkhepo. Raṅghati, laṅghati, ullaṅghati. Laṅghitā, ullaṅghikāpīti, laṅghitvā.
anya-e0804n:230: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.
anya-e0804n:232: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṃ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
anya-e0804n:233: Silāgha katthane. Katthanaṃ pasaṃsanaṃ. Silāghati. Silāghā. Buddhassa silāghate. Silāghitvā. “Attanobhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:239: Suca soke. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṃ, socanto, socantī, socantaṃ kulaṃ, socitvā.
anya-e0804n:240: Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:241: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
anya-e0804n:242: Luñca apanayane. Luñcati. Luñcako, luñcituṃ, luñcitvā.
anya-e0804n:243: Añcu gatipūjanāsu. Maggaṃ añcati. Buddhaṃ añcati. Uddhaṃ anuggantvā tiriyaṃ añcitoti tiracchāno. Kaṭukañcukatā.
anya-e0804n:244: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṃ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati. Santi pādā avañcanā. Avañcanāti vañcituṃ gantuṃ asamatthā.
anya-e0804n:245: Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ, corikā. Tassa kriyā theyyakaraṇaṃ. Gocati. Gaṇecati.
anya-e0804n:250: Taca saṃvaraṇe. Saṃvaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tacati. Taco.
anya-e0804n:254_0: Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Viyattassa esā viyatti, tissaṃ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, viyattāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:254_1: vācāyanti adhippāyo. Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0804n:254_2: Yathā pana kucchisaddatiracchānagatādisaddo “abyattasaddo”ti vuccati, na evaṃ vacanasaṅkhāto
anya-e0804n:254_3: saddo “abyattasaddo”ti vuccati viññātatthattā. “Vatti, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi” iccādīni
anya-e0804n:254_5: paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Vuccanti. Santo sappurisā loke, devadhammāti vuccare” iccādīni
anya-e0804n:254_6: kammapadāni. Garū pana vakārassa ukārādesavasena “uttaṃ uccate uccante”tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n:254_7: tāni sāsane appasiddhāni, sakkaṭabhāsānulomāni. Sāsanasmiñhi rakārāgamavisaye nipubbasseva
anya-e0804n:254_8: vacassa vassa ukārādeso siddho “nirutti, niruttaṃ, nerutta”nti. Vacanaṃ, vācā, vaco,
anya-e0804n:254_9: vacī, vuttaṃ, pavuttaṃ, vuccamānaṃ, adhivacanaṃ, vattabbaṃ, vacanīyaṃ, imāni nāmikapadāni.
anya-e0804n:254_10: Vattuṃ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna, imāni tumantādīni “parassabhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:255_0: Tattha vattīti vadati. Ākhyātapadañhetaṃ. Atthasaṃvaṇṇakehipi “vatti etāyāti vācā”ti
anya-e0804n:255_1: nibbacanamudāhaṭaṃ. Saddasatthe ca tādisaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Ettha paneke vadanti
anya-e0804n:255_2: “vacati, vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca
anya-e0804n:255_3: anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī”ti. Tanna, yasmā sāsane “avaca, avaciṃsū”ti suddhakattupadāni
anya-e0804n:255_4: ca “vāceti, vācentī”tiādīni hetukattupadāni ca dissanti, tasmā buddhavacanādīsu anāgatānipi
anya-e0804n:255_5: “vacati, vacantī”tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:256: Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṃ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṃ, vacimhe.
anya-e0804n:257: Hiyyattanīrūpāni vadāma – avacā, avacū. Avaco, avacuttha. Avocaṃ, avacumha. Avacuttha, avacutthuṃ. Avacase, avacuvhaṃ. Avaciṃ, avacamhase.
anya-e0804n:258: Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṃ, avaciṃsu. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṃ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṃ. Avocaṃ, avocimhe.
anya-e0804n:259: Bhavissantīrūpāni vadāma – vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma. Vakkhate, vakkhante. Vakkhase, vakkhavhe. Vakkhassaṃ vakkhamhe.
anya-e0804n:260_0: Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ “kathessati, kathessantī”tiādinā attho vattabbo. Vakkha roseti
anya-e0804n:260_1: dhātussa ca “vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasī”tiādīni vatvā avasāne uttamapurisekavacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n:260_2: “vakkhemī”ti vattabbaṃ. Attho panimesaṃ “rosati, rosantī”tiādinā vattabbo. Ayaṃ vacavakkhadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:260_4: sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti – vakkhissati, vakkhissanti. Vakkhissasi, vakkhissatha.
anya-e0804n:260_5: Vakkhissāmi, vakkhissāma. Vakkhissate, vakkhissante. Vakkhissase, vakkhissavhe. Vakkhissaṃ, vakkhissāmhe.
anya-e0804n:263: Imamhi kappe caritaṃ, pavakkhissaṃ suṇohi me”ti.
anya-e0804n:264_0: Gadratapañhepi “rājā tumhehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā gahapati patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ
anya-e0804n:264_1: ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī”ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati, tasmāyeva edisī
anya-e0804n:264_2: padamālā racitā. Vakkha roseti dhātussapi bhavissantīsahitāni rūpāni “vakkhissati,
anya-e0804n:264_3: vakkhissantī”tiādīni bhavanti. Attho panimesaṃ “rosissati, rosissantī”tiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0804n:265: Avacissā, vacissā, avacissaṃsu, vacissaṃsu. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Idha pana vuttasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0804n:266: Cu cavane. Cavati. Kārite “cāvetī”ti rūpaṃ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṃ padumaṃ. Cavituṃ, cavitvā.
anya-e0804n:271_0: Maca muci kakkane. Kakkanaṃ sarīre ubbaṭṭanaṃ. Macati. Muñcati. Maci dhāraṇucchāyapūjanesu.
anya-e0804n:271_1: Dhāraṇaṃ ucchāyo pūjananti tayo atthā. Tattha ucchāyo malaharaṇaṃ. Mañcati. Mañco,
anya-e0804n:272: Paca byattikaraṇe. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:275_0: Ruca dittiyaṃ rocane ca. Ditti sobhā. Rocanaṃ ruci. Rocati. Verocano. Samaṇassa rocate
anya-e0804n:275_1: saccaṃ. Tassa te saggakāmassa, ekattamuparocitaṃ. Ayañca divādigaṇe ruciatthaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0804n:275_2: “ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ janeti. Tena “gamanaṃ mayha ruccatī”ti pāḷi dissati. Curādigaṇe
anya-e0804n:275_3: pana ruciatthaṃ gahetvā “roceti rocayatī”ti rūpāni janeti. Tena “kiṃ nu jātiṃ na
anya-e0804n:276: Paca saṃpāke. Pacati, pacanti. Saddasatthavidū pana “attanobhāsā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n:278_0: Yāca yācanāyaṃ. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṃ yācito brāhmaṇena. Te taṃ
anya-e0804n:278_1: asse ayācisuṃ. So taṃ rathamayācatha. Devadattaṃ āyācati. Evaṃ suddhakattari rūpāni
anya-e0804n:278_2: bhavanti. Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti, yācāpayati.
anya-e0804n:278_3: Evaṃ hetukattari. Rājā brāhmaṇena dhanaṃ yāciyati, yācayiyati, yācāpiyati, yācāpayiyati.
anya-e0804n:278_4: Evaṃ kammani. Yācaṃ, yācanto, yācantī, yācantaṃ kulaṃ. Yācamāno, yācamānā, yācamānaṃ
anya-e0804n:278_5: kulaṃ. Yācako, yācanā, yācitabbaṃ, yācituṃ, yācitvāna, yācituna, yāciya, yāciyāna.
anya-e0804n:279_0: Paca pāke. Odanaṃ pacati. “Ubhayatobhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Yathā pana sāsane
anya-e0804n:279_1: “paṇḍitoti pavuccatī”ti vacadhātussa kammani rūpaṃ pasiddhaṃ, na tathā pacadhātussa.
anya-e0804n:279_2: Evaṃ santepi garū “tayā paccate odano”ti tassa kammani rūpaṃ vadanti. Sāsane pana
anya-e0804n:279_3: avisesato “paccate”ti vā “paccatī”ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko
anya-e0804n:279_4: payogo icchitabbo “devadatto niraye paccati. Yāva pāpaṃ na paccatī”tiādidassanato.
anya-e0804n:279_5: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya bhūvādigaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo
anya-e0804n:279_6: esa, tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho
anya-e0804n:279_7: vattabbo”ti tanna, “sayameva pīyate pānīya”nti ettha hi pānīyaṃ manussā pivanti,
anya-e0804n:279_8: na pānīyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivati. Manusseheva taṃ pīyate, na sayaṃ. Evaṃ parassa pānakriyaṃ
anya-e0804n:279_9: paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṃ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṃ viya
anya-e0804n:279_10: hotīti “sayameva pīyate pānīya”nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n:280_0: “Sayameva kaṭo kariyate”ti etthāpi kaṭaṃ manussā karonti, na kaṭaṃ kaṭo karoti. Manusseheva
anya-e0804n:280_1: kaṭo kariyate, na sayaṃ. Evaṃ parassa karaṇakriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi so sukaraṇa
anya-e0804n:280_2: kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya hotīti “sayameva kaṭo kariyate”ti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n:281_0: Ettha yathā sayaṃsaddo pānīyaṃ pānīyeneva pīyate, na amhehi. Kaṭo kaṭeneva kariyate,
anya-e0804n:281_1: na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṃ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthavisesaṃ
anya-e0804n:281_2: vadati, na tathā “devadatto niraye paccati, kammaṃ paccatī”tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito
anya-e0804n:281_3: sayaṃsaddo atthavisesaṃ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṃ payogānaṃ. Evaṃ “devadatto”tiādikassa
anya-e0804n:281_5: idaṃ divādigaṇikarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pacadhātu saddasatthe divādigaṇa vutto natthīti
anya-e0804n:281_6: ce? Natthi vā atthi vā, kimettha saddasatthaṃ karissati, pāḷi eva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0804n:281_7: mayaṃ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṃ pacadhātuṃ divādigaṇepi
anya-e0804n:281_8: pakkhipissāma. Tathā hi dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyādīhi abhisaṅkhatā divādigaṇikappayogā dissanti –-
anya-e0804n:283: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
anya-e0804n:285_0: Iccevamādayo. Ettha pana tesaṃ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti. Ye curādigaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena
anya-e0804n:285_1: bhūvādigaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa bhūdhātusseva bhūvādigaṇe pavattassa sakamakassapi
anya-e0804n:285_2: sato divādigaṇaṃ patvā akammakabhūtassa pacadhātussa sakammakattamicchanti. Etañhi
anya-e0804n:285_3: sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā, tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṃ saṃsayasamugghāṭatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:288_0: Puriso odanaṃ pacati. Sa bhūtapacaniṃ paci. Odano paccati. Kammaṃ paccati. Vīhisīsaṃ
anya-e0804n:288_1: paccati. Rukkhaphalāni paccanti. Nāgo pākāraṃ bhindati. Taḷākapāḷi bhijjati. Bhijjanadhammaṃ
anya-e0804n:288_2: bhijjati. Ettha ca sayaṃsaddaṃ ajjhāharitvā “sayameva odano paccatī”tiādinā vuttepi
anya-e0804n:288_3: “puriso sayameva pāṇaṃ hanati. Bhagavā sayameva ñeyyadhammaṃ abujjhī”ti payogesu
anya-e0804n:288_5: ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo sayaṃsaddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo,
anya-e0804n:288_6: taṃ na pamāṇaṃ. Sayaṃsaddo hi suddhakattuatthepi dissati, na kevalaṃ “sayameva pīyate
anya-e0804n:288_7: pānīya”ntiādīsu kammattheyeva, tasmā sāsanānurūpena attho gahetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:291: Kāmaguṇehi dibbati. Paccāmitte dibbati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:293: Payogato sakammā ca, akammā ca gamādayo.
anya-e0804n:294: Puriso maggaṃ gacchati. Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṃ gacchati. Dhammaṃ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
anya-e0804n:297: Pāsādaṃ passati, pāsādaṃ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:300: Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
anya-e0804n:305: Puriso gāmā niggacchati, dhanaṃ adhigacchati, puriso pāṇaṃ abhibhavati, himavatā pabhavanti mahānadiyo. Aññānipi payogāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:306_0: Tattha yadi sāsane pacadhātussa kammani rūpaṃ siyā, “purisena kammaṃ kariyatī”ti
anya-e0804n:306_1: payogo viya “purisena odano paciyatī”ti payogo icchitabbo. Ye pana garū “tayā paccate
anya-e0804n:306_2: odano”tiādīni icchanti, te saddasatthanayaṃ nissāya vadanti maññe. Evaṃ santepi upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0804n:306_3: yuttāni ce, gahetabbāni. Kārite “puriso purisena purisaṃ vā odanaṃ pāceti, pācayati,
anya-e0804n:306_4: pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Purisena puriso odanaṃ pāciyati, pācayiyati, pācāpiyati, pācāpayiyatī”ti
anya-e0804n:306_5: rūpāni bhavanti. “Yathā daṇḍena gopālo, gāvaṃ pāceti gocara”ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:307_0: Pacaṃ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṃ, pacitaṃ, pacitabbaṃ, pacanīyaṃ,
anya-e0804n:307_1: pacituṃ, pacitvā. Ettha ca “imassa maṃsañca pātabba”nti payogo udāharaṇaṃ. “Pacati,
anya-e0804n:312: Paraṃ na byākarissaṃ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
anya-e0804n:313: Chu chedane. Choti. Chotvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ. Acchocchuṃvata bho rukkhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:314: Milecha aviyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Milecchati, milakkhu. Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
anya-e0804n:316: Achi āyāme. Añcati. Dīghaṃ vā añchanto dīghaṃ añchāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0804n:318: Muccha mohamucchāsu. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
anya-e0804n:321: Uchi uñche. Uñcho pariyesanaṃ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.
anya-e0804n:323_0: Puccha pañhe pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā. Bhikkhu vinayadharaṃ
anya-e0804n:323_1: pañhaṃ pucchati. Pucchi, pucchituṃ. Pucchitvā. Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā
anya-e0804n:325: Vacchu chedane. Vucchati. Vuttā, vuttavā, vuttasiro. Vakāragatassa akārassa uttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:326_0: Vuttasaddo kesoharaṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu. Ettha
anya-e0804n:326_1: ca sirasaddena siroruhā vuttā yathā mañcasaddena mañcaṭṭhā, cakkhusaddena ca cakkhunissitaṃ
anya-e0804n:326_2: viññāṇaṃ. Ropitepi “yathā sāradikaṃ bījaṃ, khette vuttaṃ virūhatī”tiādīsu. Kathitepi
anya-e0804n:328: Kesohāre ropite ca, kathite ca yathākkamanti.
anya-e0804n:329_0: Aparo nayo – vuttasaddo “no ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati. “Pannalomo
anya-e0804n:329_2: “Gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samīhita”ntiādīsu pāvacanavasena pavattite. Loke pana “vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:333_0: Aparopi nayo – vuttasaddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre
anya-e0804n:333_1: jīvitavuttiyaṃ pamuttabhāve pāvacanavasena pavattite ajjhene kathaneti evamādīsu
anya-e0804n:335: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti
anya-e0804n:336_0: Ādīsu vapane āgato. “No ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe.
anya-e0804n:336_1: “Kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesoharaṇe. “Pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena
anya-e0804n:336_2: cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto
anya-e0804n:336_3: abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. “Yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:336_4: mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samīhita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke pana
anya-e0804n:336_5: “vutto gaṇo, vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu ajjhene. “Vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā, dhammadāyādā
anya-e0804n:336_6: me bhikkhave bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu kathane. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:341: Pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane cāti lakkhaye;
anya-e0804n:345_0: Jijaye. Jeti. Jayati, parājayati. Dhammaṃ caranto sāmikaṃ parājeti. Dhammaṃ caranto
anya-e0804n:345_1: parajjati. Rājānaṃ jayāpesuṃ. Jayāpetvā. Ettha jayāpesunti “jayatu bhava”nti āsīsavacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:345_2: vadiṃsūti attho. Jayanaṃ, jitaṃ, jayo, vijitaṃ, jino, jetā, jeto, jito māro, māraṃ
anya-e0804n:345_3: jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino, anodhijino, jito. Vijito,
anya-e0804n:345_4: jetuṃ, vijetuṃ, jitvā, vijitvā. Imassa pana dhātussa kiyādigaṇaṃ pattassa “jināti
anya-e0804n:346_0: Ji abhibhavane. Jeti. Jino. Pubbe viya rūpāni. Ettha ca “tumhehi ānanda sappurisehi
anya-e0804n:346_1: vijitaṃ, pacchimā janatāsālimaṃsodanaṃ atimaññissatī”ti pāḷi abhibhavanatthasādhakā.
anya-e0804n:347: Ju gatiyaṃ. Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṃ, javo, javaṃ, javanto, javanacittaṃ, javanapañño, javanahaṃso. Manojavaṃ gacchati yenakāmaṃ.
anya-e0804n:348: Jekhaye. Jīyati. Ekārassa īyādeso. Sāsanānurūpena “kiṃ maṃ dhanena jīyethā”ti hi pāḷi dissati. Saddasatthavidū pana “jāyatī”ti rūpaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:351: Vaja gatiyaṃ. Dhaja dhaji ca. Vajati. Abbajati. Manussattañca abbaje. Vajo, vajanaṃ, pavajanaṃ, pabbajjā, pabbajito, pabbājito.
anya-e0804n:352: Sakā raṭṭhā pabbājito, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato;
anya-e0804n:354: Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṃ. Ettha dhajoti ketu. Dhañjananti gamanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:355_0: Aja khepane ca. Gatiapekkhakoyeva cakāro. Ajati. Ajo. Ettha ajoti eḷako. Imāni panassa
anya-e0804n:355_1: pariyāyavacanāni “ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo”ti. Tattha urabbhoti eḷako, yo “ajo”tipi
anya-e0804n:355_2: vuccati. Avīti rattalomo eḷako. Meṇḍoti kuṭilasiṅgo eḷako. Tathā hi janakajātake
anya-e0804n:355_3: ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṃ vuttā. Apica ajeḷakanti ajato eḷakassa visuṃ vacanato
anya-e0804n:355_4: eḷakasaddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo, mahosadhajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi meṇḍeḷakānaṃ nibbisesatā vuttāti.
anya-e0804n:356: Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṃ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
anya-e0804n:358: Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṃ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho cakāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
anya-e0804n:360: Khaji gativekalle. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṃ, khañjituṃ, khañjitvā.
anya-e0804n:361: Khaja kampane. Khajati. Ejā. Ettha ca ejāti lābhādiṃ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, balavataṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0804n:362: Buja vajiranibbese. Vajiranigghoseti keci vidū vadanti. Bojati.
anya-e0804n:363: Khija kuji guji abyattasadde. Khijati. Kuñjati. Guñjati.
anya-e0804n:364: Laja lāja tajja bhassane. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
anya-e0804n:365: Laji dittiyañca. Bhassanāpekkho cakāro. Lañjati. Tatiyo nayalañjako. Lañjeti pakāseti suttatthanti lañjako.
anya-e0804n:366: Jaja jaji yuddhe. Yujjhanaṃ yuddhaṃ. Jajati. Jañjati.
anya-e0804n:368: Tuji balane ca. Balanaṃ balanakriyā. Hiṃsāpekkhako cakāro. Tuñjati.
anya-e0804n:369_0: Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati. Gajo gajjati, megho gajjati.
anya-e0804n:369_1: Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjati. Maṇi gajjati. Ñāṇagajjanaṃ gajjati.
anya-e0804n:369_2: Gajjituṃ samattho. Gajjitā. Gajjitvā. Tattha gajoti hatthī. Hatthissa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:370: Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
anya-e0804n:372: Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
anya-e0804n:373: Hatthipoto hatthicchāpo, bhiṅko ca kalabho bhave.
anya-e0804n:374: Caja cāge. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṃ. Cajaṃ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
anya-e0804n:375: Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṃ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṃ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṃ. Sajitvā.
anya-e0804n:377: Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṃ tāpakaraṇaṃ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.
anya-e0804n:378: Eja bheja bhāja dittiyaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Ejati. Bhejati. Bhājati.
anya-e0804n:379_0: Tija nisāne, khamāyañca. Nisānaṃ tikkhatākaraṇaṃ. Khamā khanti. Tejati. Titikkhati.
anya-e0804n:379_1: Tejano. Tejo. Tattha tejanoti kaṇḍo saro usu. Tejoti sūriyo. Atha vā tejoti tejanaṃ
anya-e0804n:379_2: usmā uṇhattaṃ tāpo. Tejoti vā ānubhāvo pabhāvo.
anya-e0804n:382: Rāja dittiyaṃ bhāja ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā. Virājitvā. Atra viññūnamatthavivaraṇe kosallajananatthaṃ silokaṃ racayāma –
anya-e0804n:384: Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0804n:385_0: Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade “me ahi mahī”ti chedo “puttā me atthi puttā matthī”ti
anya-e0804n:385_1: viya. “Mahi arāja mahārājā”ti ca chedo “yopi ayaṃ yopāya”nti viya. Ettha arājasaddo
anya-e0804n:385_2: “atikaramakarācariyā”ti ettha akarīti atthavācako akarasaddo viya ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko
anya-e0804n:385_3: daṭṭhabbo. Arāja virocīti attho. Ayaṃ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho “mahārāja me ahi arāja,
anya-e0804n:385_4: mama eva ahi arāja, na etassa iti vatvā dve ahituṇḍikajanā kalahaṃ kariṃsū”ti.
anya-e0804n:386_0: Ranja rāge. Bhikkhu cīvaraṃ rajati. Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṃ. Rajako. Rāgo.
anya-e0804n:386_1: Virāgo. Haliddirāgo. Rājā. Rājinī. Imassa ca divādigaṇaṃ pattassa “rajjati virajjatī”ti
anya-e0804n:386_2: rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha rajananti rajanavatthu. Rajakoti rajakāro vatthadhovanako.
anya-e0804n:386_3: Rāgoti rajjanti sattā tena, sayaṃ vā rañjati, rañjanamattameva vā etanti rāgo, taṇhā.
anya-e0804n:387: Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
anya-e0804n:388: Satti āsatti mucchā ca, lubbhitattañca lubbhanā.
anya-e0804n:389: Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
anya-e0804n:390: Vanañca vanatho ceva, apekkhā bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0804n:391: Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;
anya-e0804n:394_0: Virāgoti maggo nibbānañca. Rājāti pathavissaro. Ettha dhātudvayavasena nibbacanāni
anya-e0804n:394_1: niyyante. Nānāsampattīhi rājati dibbati virocatīti rājā. Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā
anya-e0804n:394_2: ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṃ rañjetītipi rājā.
anya-e0804n:394_3: Rājinīti rājabhariyā. Tesaṃ abhidhānāni vuccante sahābhidhānantarehi –
anya-e0804n:395: Rājā bhūpati devo ca, manujindo disampati;
anya-e0804n:406: Bhaja sevāyaṃ. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.
anya-e0804n:407_0: Yaja devapūjasaṅgatakaraṇadānadhammesu. Devapūjaggahaṇena buddhādipūjā gahitā. Saṅgatakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:407_1: samodhānakaraṇaṃ. Tathā hi adhimuttattheravatthumhi “yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo
anya-e0804n:407_2: vā yattha labbhatī”ti gāthāyaṃ saṅgatasaddena samodhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ pariccāgo.
anya-e0804n:407_3: Dhammo jhānasīlādi. Etesvatthesu yajadhātu vattati. Pupphehi buddhaṃ yajati. Devataṃ
anya-e0804n:407_4: yajati. Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṃ. Yañño. Yāgo. Dhammayāgo.
anya-e0804n:407_5: Yajamāno sake pure. Yiṭṭhuṃ, yajituṃ. Puthuyaññaṃ yajitvāna. Soḷasaparikkhāraṃ mahāyaññaṃ kattukāmo.
anya-e0804n:408: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ. Majjati. Bāhiraṃ parimajjati. Bhūmiṃ sammajjati. Majjanaṃ. Sammajjanī.
anya-e0804n:409: Niñji suddhiyaṃ. Niñjati. Paniñjati. Niñjituṃ. Paniñjituṃ. Niñjitvā. Paniñjitvā. Ayaṃ pana pāḷi “tato tvaṃ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī”ti.
anya-e0804n:411: Bhaja pāke. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
anya-e0804n:412: Uju ajjave. Ajjavaṃ ujubhāvo. Ojati. Uju.
anya-e0804n:413: Saja vissaggaparissajjanabbhukkiraṇesu. Sajati. Lokyaṃ sajantaṃ udakaṃ.
anya-e0804n:414: Ruja bhaṅge. Rujati. Rujā. Rogo. Ettha rujāti byādhi rujanaṭṭhena. Rogoti rujati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo, byādhiyeva, yo “ātaṅko”tipi “ābādho”tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:415_0: Bhuja koṭille. Āvipubbo aññatthesu ca. Urago bhujati. Ābhujati. Bhikkhu pallaṅkaṃ
anya-e0804n:415_1: ābhujati, ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhatīti attho. Mahāsamuddo ābhujati, āvaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:415_2: Keci pana “osakkatī”ti atthaṃ vadanti. “Vaṇṇadāna”nti ābhujati, manasi karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:415_3: Mūlāni vibhujatīti mūlavibhujo, ratho. Ettha ca vibhujatīti chindati. Bhogo. Bhogī.
anya-e0804n:415_4: Ābhogo. Ābhujitvā. Ettha ca bhogoti bhujayati kuṭilaṃ kariyatīti bhogo, ahisarīraṃ. Bhogīti sappo.
anya-e0804n:416_0: Raji vijjhane. Nāgo dantehi bhūmiṃ rañjati. Ārañjati. Ettha ca “tathāgatarañjitaṃ
anya-e0804n:416_1: itipī”ti nettipāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tassattho “idaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0804n:416_3: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ārañjanaṭṭhānantipi vuccatī”ti. Rañjitanti hi rañjati vijjhati
anya-e0804n:416_4: etthāti ruñjitaṃ, rañjanaṭṭhānaṃ. “Idaṃ nesaṃ padakkanta”ntiādimhi viya etassa saddassa
anya-e0804n:417_0: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Īkārantoyaṃ dhātu, tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi.
anya-e0804n:417_1: Vejati. Vego. Dhammasaṃvego. Saṃvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego, vātavego.
anya-e0804n:417_2: Ettha dhammasaṃvegoti sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ. “Vego, javo, rayo”ti ime ekatthā. Divādigaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:417_3: pana pattassa “vijjati saṃvijjati ubbijjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n:418: Lajja lajjane. Lajjati. Lajjā. Lajjāti hirī. Yā “viriḷanā”tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:420_0: Kujja adhomukhīkaraṇe. Kujjati. Nikujjati. Ukkujjati. Paṭikujjati. Nikujjitaṃ vā
anya-e0804n:420_1: ukkujjeyya. Aññissā pātiyā paṭikujjati. Avakujjo nipajjahaṃ. Tattha kujjati nikujjatīti
anya-e0804n:420_2: imāni “carati vicaratī”ti padāni viya samānatthāni, adhomukhaṃ karotīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n:420_3: Ukkujjatīti uparimukhaṃ karoti. Paṭikujjatīti mukhe mukhaṃ ṭhapeti.
anya-e0804n:421: Mujja osīdane. Mujjati. Nimujjati. Nimuggo. Ummuggo.
anya-e0804n:425: Jhe cintāyaṃ. Jhāyati, nijjhāyati, upanijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, sajjhāyati. Jhānaṃ, nijjhānaṃ, upanijjhānaṃ, ujjhāyanaṃ, sajjhāyanaṃ. Nijjhatti. Upajjhā, upajjhāyo. Jhāyī, ajjhāyako.
anya-e0804n:426_0: Tattha jhāyananti duvidhaṃ jhāyanaṃ sobhanamasobhanañca. Tesu sobhanaṃ “jhāyī tapati
anya-e0804n:426_1: brāhmaṇo. Jhāyāmi akutobhayo”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asobhanaṃ pana “tattha tattha jhāyanto
anya-e0804n:426_2: nisīdi. Adhomukho pajjhāyanto nisīdī”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
anya-e0804n:426_3: vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo. Jhāyī jhānavāti attho. Ajjhāyakoti
anya-e0804n:426_4: idaṃ “na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva
anya-e0804n:426_5: tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0804n:426_6: garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ, idāni pana taṃ ajjhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti
anya-e0804n:426_7: iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharantīti. Ayaṃ panattho “adhipubbassa i ajjhayane”ti
anya-e0804n:426_8: dhātussa vasena gahetabbo. Evaṃ adhipubbassa idhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṃ
anya-e0804n:427: Jhe dittiyaṃ. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha jhāyatīti jalati. Jhāyanajalanasaddā hi ekatthā.
anya-e0804n:429: Ujjha ussagge. Ussaggo chaḍḍanaṃ. Ujjhati. Ujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:432_0: Ñā avabodhane. “Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya, ñeyyu”ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:432_1: gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṃ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā,
anya-e0804n:433_0: Tattha ñātīti jānāti. Puna ñātīti bandhu. So hi “ayaṃ amhāka”nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñātīti.
anya-e0804n:433_1: Evaṃ ñātako. Aññoti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño, avidvā bāloti
anya-e0804n:433_2: attho. Ñattanti jānanabhāvo. “Yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṃ bālassa jāyatī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:433_3: Saññāṇanti cihanaṃ. Kārite “ñāpeti saññāpeti viññāpayatī”tiādīni bhavanti. Yasmā
anya-e0804n:433_4: pana “aññāti paṭivijjhati. Attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā ñassati. Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:433_5: Ekacce nabbhaññaṃsu, ekacce abbhaññaṃsū”ti pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā ñātītiādīni ākhyātikapadāni
anya-e0804n:433_6: diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena. Tathā hi aññātīti ettha āiti upasaggo, so parassakkharassa
anya-e0804n:433_7: saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṃ katvā niddiṭṭho. Ñātīti sāsane ākhyātikapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:433_8: tasmāyeva “ñāti, ñanti. Ñāsī”tiādinā padamālākaraṇe nattheva doso.
anya-e0804n:434: Ñā māraṇatosananisānesu. Māraṇaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedakaraṇaṃ. Tosanaṃ tuṭṭhi. Nisānaṃ tikkhatā. Ñatti. Manuññaṃ. Paññatti.
anya-e0804n:435_0: Ettha ñattīti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho. Ayañca ñattisaddo “vatti
anya-e0804n:435_1: etāyāti vācā”ti ettha vattisaddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ādatteti
anya-e0804n:435_2: ettha vibhattibhūtassa tesaddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa tisaddassa saññogabhāvo ca
anya-e0804n:435_3: dhātuantassarassa rassattañca. Manuññanti manaṃ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṃ. Ayamattho
anya-e0804n:435_4: manasaddūpapadassa āpubbassimassa ñādhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo. Paññattīti nānappakārato
anya-e0804n:435_5: pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ñatti māraṇaṃ paññatti. Atha vā dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ
anya-e0804n:435_6: dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṃ. Atikhiṇabuddhīnaṃ anekavidhena
anya-e0804n:435_7: ñāṇatikhiṇakaraṇañca paññatti nāma, tathā sotūnaṃ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca
anya-e0804n:445: Laṭa bālye ca. Pubbāpekkhāya cakāro. Laṭati. Lāṭo.
anya-e0804n:446: Saṭa rujāvisaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Rujā pīḷā. Visaraṇaṃ vippharaṇaṃ. Gatyāvasānaṃ gatiyā avasānaṃ osānaṃ abhāvakaraṇaṃ, nisīdananti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṭati. Sāṭo vuccati sāṭako.
anya-e0804n:448: Khiṭa uttāsane. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
anya-e0804n:450: Jaṭa ghaṭa saṅghāte. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī. Antojaṭā bahijaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā. Kārite “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe vijaṭeti nāmā”ti payogo.
anya-e0804n:451: Bhaṭa bhattiyaṃ. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṃ bhaṭako yathā.
anya-e0804n:452: Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṃ.
anya-e0804n:455_0: Piṭa saddasaṅghāṭesu. Peṭati. Peṭako, piṭakaṃ. Piṭakasaddo “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:455_1: pariyattiyaṃ dissati. “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā”tiādīsu yasmiṃ kismiñci bhājane.
anya-e0804n:456: Haṭa dittiyaṃ. Haṭati. Hāṭakaṃ, haṭakaṃ. Yaṃ jātarūpaṃ haṭakanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:461_0: Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṃ. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati. Paṭo icceva
anya-e0804n:461_1: nāmikapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Paṭati jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṭo. Paṭoti vatthaṃ. Vatthassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:462: Paṭo coḷo sāṭako ca, vāso vasanamaṃsukaṃ;
anya-e0804n:467: Ruṭi luṭi theyye. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
anya-e0804n:472: Ghaṭa cetāyaṃ. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. Ghaṭo vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n:473: Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
anya-e0804n:475: Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
anya-e0804n:478: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.
anya-e0804n:485_0: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ. Gatinivatti uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti.
anya-e0804n:485_1: Tiṭṭhati. Patiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭheti. Saṇṭhāti. Saṇṭhahati. Adhiṭṭhahati.
anya-e0804n:485_2: Upaṭṭhahati. Ṭhātu. Tiṭṭhatu. Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0804n:485_3: Yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati. Tiṭṭhissati. Upassuti tiṭṭhissatha. Aṭṭhissā, aṭṭhissaṃsu.
anya-e0804n:485_4: Atiṭṭhissā, atiṭṭhissaṃsu. Ṭhātuṃ, upaṭṭhātuṃ. Upaṭṭhahituṃ. Adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Adhiṭṭhahituṃ.
anya-e0804n:485_5: Ṭhatvā, adhiṭṭhitvā. Upaṭṭhahitvā, adhiṭṭhahitvā. Ṭhānaṃ, ṭhiti, saṇṭhiti, avaṭṭhiti.
anya-e0804n:485_6: Saṇṭhānaṃ, paṭṭhānaṃ. Upaṭṭhāko, ṭhito. Pabbataṭṭho bhūmaṭṭho. Upaṭṭhahaṃ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:486_0: Tattha ṭhānasaddo issariyaṭhitikhaṇakāraṇesu dissati. “Kiṃ panāyasmā devānamindo
anya-e0804n:486_1: kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati. “Ṭhānakusalo hoti akkhaṇavedhī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:486_2: ṭhitiyaṃ. “Ṭhānasopetaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭibhātī”tiādīsu khaṇe. “Ṭhānañca ṭhānaso ñatvā
anya-e0804n:486_3: aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānaso”tiādīsu kāraṇe. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
anya-e0804n:491_0: Paṭha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Dhammaṃ paṭhati. Pāṭho, nakkhattapāṭhako, so horapāṭhakaṃ
anya-e0804n:491_1: pucchi. Sabbapāṭhī bhavissati. Paṭhituṃ, paṭhitave, paṭhitvā, paṭhitvāna, paṭhituna, paṭhiya, paṭhiyāna.
anya-e0804n:492_0: Evaṃvidhaṃ tuṃpaccayantādivibhāgaṃ sabbattha yathārahaṃ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena
anya-e0804n:492_1: na vadāma. Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṃ sabbattha yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:492_2: Yattha pana pāḷinidassanādiviseso icchitabbo hoti, tatthevetaṃ dassessāma.
anya-e0804n:493_0: Vaṭha thūliye. Vaṭhati. Vaṭharo. Vaṭharoti thūlaghanasarīrasmiṃ vattabbavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:493_1: Tathā hi vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vaṭharoti thūlo, thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṃ bhikkhūti
anya-e0804n:497: Sāṭha balakkāre. Balakkāro nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṃ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṃ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
anya-e0804n:498: Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
anya-e0804n:500: Saṭha ketave ca. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati. Saṭho saṭhoti kerāṭiko vuccati.
anya-e0804n:502: Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Cakāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
anya-e0804n:504: Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṃ. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
anya-e0804n:505: Veṭha veṭhane. Veṭhati, nibbeṭhati. Veṭhanaṃ, nibbeṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:508: Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṃ. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:514: Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṃ gamanamatte ca. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno. Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna. Ye maṃ pure paccuḍḍenti.
anya-e0804n:516: Ito bahiddhā pāsaṇḍā, diṭṭhīsu pasīdanti te;
anya-e0804n:517: Na tesaṃ dhammaṃ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
anya-e0804n:518: Ettha ca pāsaṇḍāti pāsaṃ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā, sattānaṃ cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṃ khipantīti attho. Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṃ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.
anya-e0804n:519: Muḍi kaṇḍane. Muṇḍati. Kumāraṃ muṇḍiṃsu. Muṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:523: Huḍi piḍi saṅghāte. Huṇḍati. Piṇḍati. Piṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:526: Vaḍi maḍi veṭhane. Vaṇḍati. Maṇḍati. Maṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:529: Tuḍi toḷane. Tuṇḍati. Tuṇḍo. Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya.
anya-e0804n:531: Caḍi kope. Caṇḍati. Caṇḍo. Caṇḍālo, caṇḍikkaṃ.
anya-e0804n:534_0: Paḍi gatiyaṃ. Paṇḍati. Paṇḍā, paṇḍito. Ettha paṇḍāti paññā. Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu
anya-e0804n:534_1: paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṃ jānātīti “paṇḍā”ti vuccati. Paṇḍitoti
anya-e0804n:534_2: paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito. Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti paṇḍito. Paṇḍati
anya-e0804n:534_3: ñāṇagatiyā gacchatītipi paṇḍito. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “paṇḍantīti paṇḍitā.
anya-e0804n:540: Vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane. Vaḍḍhati. Sirivaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, vaḍḍhito, buḍḍho. Ettha ca vakārassa bakāro, akārassa cukāro.
anya-e0804n:541: Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.
anya-e0804n:544_0: Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde. Aṇati. Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṃ. Vaṇati.
anya-e0804n:544_1: Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo. Tattha brāhmaṇoti brahmaṃ
anya-e0804n:544_2: aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Akkharacintakā pana “brahmuno apaccaṃ
anya-e0804n:544_3: brāhmaṇo”ti vadanti. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇoti.
anya-e0804n:545: Brāhmaṇo sottiyo vippo, bhovādī brahmabandhu ca;
anya-e0804n:547: Raṇasaddo “saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā”tiādīsu kilesesu vattati. Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:550_0: Ettha yuddhe vattati. Raṇaṃ katvāti hi yuddhaṃ katvāti attho. “Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca
anya-e0804n:550_1: raṇaṃ karontā, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato”ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati.
anya-e0804n:550_2: Raṇaṃ karontāti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontāti attho. Evaṃ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:550_3: antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṃ, na dhātunānatthavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha
anya-e0804n:550_4: vā dhātūnamatthātisayayogopi bhavati, tena evaṃ atthavivaraṇaṃ katantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:551: Bhaṇa bhaṇane. Parittaṃ bhaṇati, vacanaṃ bhaṇati. Dīghabhāṇako, piyabhāṇī, bhāṇavāro. Ettha bhāṇavāroti –
anya-e0804n:560: Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
anya-e0804n:562: Paṇa byavahāre, thutiyañca. Paṇati vāṇijo, vohāraṃ karoti iccattho. Saddho buddhaṃ paṇati, thomayati iccattho, āpaṇaṃ, sāpaṇo gāmo.
anya-e0804n:567: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṃ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṃsabāhu.
anya-e0804n:570: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṃ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
anya-e0804n:572: Puṇa nipuṇe. Puṇati, nipuṇati. Nipuṇadhammo. Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:577: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti.
anya-e0804n:583_0: Te pālane. Pālanaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tāyati. Tāṇaṃ, gottaṃ, nakkhattaṃ. Aghassa tātā. Kicchenādhigatā
anya-e0804n:583_1: bhogā, te tāto vidhami dhamaṃ. Tattha gottanti gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. “Gotamo kassapo”ti
anya-e0804n:583_2: hi ādinā pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti
anya-e0804n:583_3: gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, tathā abhidhānaṃ
anya-e0804n:583_4: abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko
anya-e0804n:583_5: pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:584_0: Nakkhattanti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati
anya-e0804n:584_1: rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ, taṃ pana assayujādivasena sattavīsatividhaṃ hoti. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n:584_2: assayujo bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī
anya-e0804n:584_3: uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṃ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṃ pubbāsaḷhaṃ uttarāsaḷhaṃ
anya-e0804n:584_4: sāvaṇaṃ dhanasiṭṭhā satabhisattaṃ pubbabhaddapadaṃ uttarabhaddapadaṃ revatī cāti
anya-e0804n:584_5: sattavīsati nakkhattāni. Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci
anya-e0804n:584_6: sīghaṃ kiñci dandhaṃ, kadāci sīghaṃ, kadāci dandhaṃ, etto ito cāti evaṃ visamagatiyā
anya-e0804n:584_7: agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano vīthiyāva gacchantāni
anya-e0804n:584_8: maṇḍalākārena sineruṃ parivattanti. Evaṃ imāni nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti
anya-e0804n:584_9: nakkhattānīti vuccanti. Porāṇā pana kharadhātuvasena “nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī”ti
anya-e0804n:584_10: āvocuṃ, “nakkhattaṃ joti rikkhaṃ taṃ” iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṃ nāmāni. “Uḷu tārā
anya-e0804n:584_11: tārakā”ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāmāni. Osadhīti pana tārakāvisesassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0804n:585_0: Citi saññāṇe. Saññāṇaṃ cihanaṃ lakkhaṇakaraṇaṃ. Cetati. Cihanaṃ karotīti attho. Īkārantavasena
anya-e0804n:585_1: vuttattā asmā dhātuto saki saṅkāyanti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti. Esa nayo
anya-e0804n:586_0: Pata gatiyaṃ. Patati. Papatati papātaṃ, papateyyahaṃ. Pāpattaṃ nirayaṃ bhusaṃ. Ahaṃsaddena
anya-e0804n:586_1: yojetabbaṃ, pāpattaṃ papatitosmīti attho. Pāpattha nirayaṃ bhusaṃ, sokumāroti yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:586_2: pāpattha papatitoti attho. Parokkhāpadañhietaṃ dvayaṃ. “Pāvadaṃ pāvadā”tiādīsu viya
anya-e0804n:586_3: upasaggapadassa dīghabhāvo, tato aṃsaddassa ttaṃādeso, asaddassa ca tthādeso bhavati.
anya-e0804n:587_0: Ata sātaccagamane. Sātaccagamanaṃ nirantaragamanaṃ. Atati. Yasmā pana atadhātu sātaccagamanatthavācikā,
anya-e0804n:587_1: tasmā bhavābhavaṃ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṃ anekavihitaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ
anya-e0804n:587_2: atati satataṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti adhigacchatīti attātipi nibbacanamicchitabbaṃ. Atthantaravasena
anya-e0804n:587_3: pana “āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo”ti ca “sukhadukkhaṃ adati anubhavatīti
anya-e0804n:587_4: attā”ti ca “attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano”ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo, yattha yattha
anya-e0804n:587_5: yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.
anya-e0804n:589_0: Ati bandhane. Antati. Antaṃ. Antiyatibandhiyati antaguṇenāti antaṃ. Idha anta saddassa
anya-e0804n:589_1: atthuddhāro vuccate “antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariya”nti ettha dvattiṃsākārantogadhaṃ kuṇapantaṃ
anya-e0804n:589_2: antaṃ nāma. “Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati. Haritantaṃ vā”ti ettha antimamariyādanto
anya-e0804n:589_3: anto nāma. “Antamidaṃ bhikkhave jīvikāna”nti ettha lāmakanto. “Sakkāyo eko anto”ti
anya-e0804n:589_4: ettha koṭṭhāsanto. “Esevanto dukkhassa sappaccayasaṅkhayā”ti ettha koṭanto. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:592_0: Kita nivāse rogāpanayane ca. Ketati. Sāketaṃ na garaṃ, niketo, niketaṃ pāvisi. Āmodamāno
anya-e0804n:592_1: gacchati sanniketaṃ. Tikicchati, cikicchati, cikicchā, cikicchako. Tattha sāketanti
anya-e0804n:593_0: Yata patiyatane. Patiyatanaṃ vāyāmakaraṇaṃ. Yatati. Yati, yatavā, payatanaṃ, āyatanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:593_1: lokāyataṃ. Ettha āyatananti āyatanato āyatanaṃ, cakkhurūpādīni. Etāni hi taṃdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā
anya-e0804n:593_2: dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti
anya-e0804n:593_3: “āyatanānī”ti vuccanti. Ettha pana nītanudhātūnaṃ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo
anya-e0804n:594_0: Āyatanasaddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n:594_2: rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākare. Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:594_4: sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇe vattatīti veditabbo. So
anya-e0804n:595: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n:597_0: Lokāyataṃ nāma “sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ nucchiṭṭhaṃ. Seto kāko, kāḷo bako iminā
anya-e0804n:597_1: ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ, yaṃ
anya-e0804n:597_2: loke “vitaṇḍasattha”nti vuccati, yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito
anya-e0804n:597_3: “na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhana”nti āha. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati
anya-e0804n:597_4: na īhatīti lokāyataṃ, kintaṃ? Vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakriyāya
anya-e0804n:597_5: cittampi na uppādenti. Aññatthāpi hi evaṃ vuttaṃ “lokāyatasippanti ‘kāko seto, aṭṭhīnaṃ
anya-e0804n:597_6: setattā, balākā rattā, lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṃ paralokanibbānānaṃ
anya-e0804n:598: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṃ udīraṇaṃ. Yotati. Jotati.
anya-e0804n:599_0: Jutadittiyaṃ. Jotati, vijjotati. Juti, joti. Kārite “joteti, jotayitvāna saddhamma”nti
anya-e0804n:599_1: payogā. Ettha ca jutīti āloko siri vā. Jotīti patāpo. Atha vā jotīti candādīni. Vuttampi
anya-e0804n:599_3: Atha vā “joti jotiparāyaṇo”ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca
anya-e0804n:600_0: Sita vaṇṇo. Sitadhātu setavaṇṇe vattati. Kiñcāpettha vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi
anya-e0804n:600_1: idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati. Setaṃ vatthaṃ.
anya-e0804n:601: Setaṃ sitaṃ suci sukkaṃ, paṇḍaraṃ dhavalampi ca;
anya-e0804n:603: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṃvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:604: Kilota addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Kilotati, pakilotati, temetīti attho. Kārite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. Uṇhodakasmiṃ pakilotayitvā, temetvāti attho.
anya-e0804n:606: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṃ, ketako, saṅketo.
anya-e0804n:608: Kati chedane. Maṃsaṃ kantati, vikantati, ayokanto. Sallakanto mahāvīro. Mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n:609: Catī hiṃsāgandhesu. Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.
anya-e0804n:612_0: Thā gatinivattiyaṃ. Thāti. Avatthā, vavatthānaṃ, vavatthitaṃ, vanatho. “Chetvā vanaṃ
anya-e0804n:612_1: vanathañcā”ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṃ nāma, khuddakā pana tasmiṃ vane ṭhitattā
anya-e0804n:613: Thu thutiyaṃ. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
anya-e0804n:614: Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
anya-e0804n:616: Tehi thutippasattho so, yenidaṃ thavitaṃ ñāṇaṃ, buddhaseṭṭho ca thomito. Tatra thavanāti pasaṃsanā. Pasaṃsāya hi anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n:617: Thavanā ca pasaṃsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;
anya-e0804n:619_0: The saddasaṅghātesu. Thīyati, patitthīyati. Thī. Atrimā pāḷiyo – abhisajjati kuppati
anya-e0804n:619_1: byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti. Thiyo naṃ paribhāsiṃsūti.
anya-e0804n:619_2: Tatra “thīyati patitthīyatī”timāni ekārassīyādesavasena sambhūtāni. Thīyati saṅghātaṃ
anya-e0804n:619_3: gacchati gabbho etissāti thī. Ācariyā pana itthīsaddasseva evaṃ nibbacanaṃ vadanti, na thīsaddassa.
anya-e0804n:620: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti thī iti no ruci;
anya-e0804n:621: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti itthīti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n:623: Ayaṃ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṃ bho suṇātha me.
anya-e0804n:626: Appānaṃ bahutā ñāye, gahite sati yujjati;
anya-e0804n:627: Tathā hi “dve duve, taṇhā, tasiṇā”ti nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:630: Icchatīti nare itthī, icchāpetīti vā pana;
anya-e0804n:633: Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
anya-e0804n:634: Kantā sīmaninī mātu-gāmo piyā ca kāminī.
anya-e0804n:637: Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;
anya-e0804n:639_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccati. Dasavassikā kaññāti vuccati. Anibbiddhā
anya-e0804n:639_1: vā yobbanitthī kaññāti vuccati. Dvādasavassikā kumārītipi vuccati kumārikātipi. Atho
anya-e0804n:639_2: jaraṃ appattā yuvatītipi taruṇītipi māṇavikātipi vuccati. Jaraṃ pattā pana therītipi
anya-e0804n:639_3: mahallikātipi vuccati. Purisesupi ayaṃ nayo yathārahaṃ veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:640_0: Kiñcāpettha evaṃ niyamo vutto, tathāpi katthaci aniyamavasenapi vohāro pavattati.
anya-e0804n:640_1: Tathā hi “rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika”nti ca “acchā kaṇhājinaṃ kañña”nti
anya-e0804n:640_2: ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī dārikāsaddena vattabbā, sā kaññāsaddenapi
anya-e0804n:640_3: vattabbā jātā. Yāpi ca kaññāsaddena vattabbā, sāpi dārikāsaddena vattabbā jātā. Tathā
anya-e0804n:640_4: “rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika”nti ca “kumāriye upaseniye, niccaṃ nigaḷamaṇḍite”ti
anya-e0804n:640_5: ca imāsaṃ pana pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī dārikāsadena vattabbā, sā kumārikāsaddenapi
anya-e0804n:640_6: vattabbā jātā. Yā ca pana kumārīsaddena vattabbā, sāpi dārikāsaddena vattabbā jātā.
anya-e0804n:640_7: Apicettha “rājakaññā rucā nāmā”ti ca “tato maddimpi nhāpesuṃ, sivikaññā samāgatā”ti
anya-e0804n:640_8: ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā, yāva jaraṃ
anya-e0804n:640_9: na pāpuṇāti, tāva sā kaññāyeva nāmātipi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:641_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ – yaṃ tumhehi “aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:641_1: etasmiṃ pana vacane “yadāhaṃ dārako homi, jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko”ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso
anya-e0804n:641_2: dārako hotu, “tatthaddasakumāraṃ so, ramamānaṃ sake pure”ti pāḷiyaṃ pana puttadārehi
anya-e0804n:641_3: saṃvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṃ “kumāro”ti vattuṃ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā?
anya-e0804n:641_4: Yujjateva bhagavato icchāvasena. Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṃ
anya-e0804n:641_5: yaṃ veneyyajanānurūpaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ deseti eva, tasmā bhagavatā
anya-e0804n:641_6: tassa mātāpitūnaṃ atthitaṃ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṃ desanā katā.
anya-e0804n:641_7: Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva
anya-e0804n:641_8: vohariyati. “Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti ettha pana sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi
anya-e0804n:641_9: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo tasmiṃ there adhimattavissāso hutvā komāravādena
anya-e0804n:641_10: ovadanto kumārakoti avocāti gahetabbaṃ. Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sattā jātadivasato
anya-e0804n:641_11: paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṃ, tāva kumārakā, bālāti ca vuccanti, tato paraṃ vīsativassāni yuvāno”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:642: Mantha mattha viloḷane. Manthati. Manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya. Abhimatthati dummedhaṃ vajiraṃvamhamayaṃ maṇiṃ. Sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā.
anya-e0804n:643: Kuthi puthi luthi hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu. Kunthati. Kuntho, kunthakipillikaṃ. Disvāna patitaṃ sāmaṃ, puttakaṃ paṃsukunthitaṃ. Punthati. Lunthati.
anya-e0804n:644_0: Nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsāsu. Nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti
anya-e0804n:644_1: catūsvatthesu vattati. Tenāhu porāṇā “nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsati
anya-e0804n:644_2: pattheti, parasantānagataṃ vā kilesabyasanaṃ upatāpeti, “sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0804n:644_3: kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti
