anya-e0804n:644_4: attho, paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti
anya-e0804n:644_5: paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho”ti. Saddasatthavidū pana
anya-e0804n:644_6: tesu catūsu atthesu nātha nādha iti dhātudvayaṃ paṭhanti. Attanobhāsattā pana tassa
anya-e0804n:645_0: Ettha siyā “yadi yācanatthena nāthatīti nātho, evaṃ sante yo koci yācako daliddo,
anya-e0804n:645_1: so eva nātho siyā. Yo pana ayācako samiddho, so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā”ti?
anya-e0804n:645_2: Na, nāthasaddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho,
anya-e0804n:645_3: bhagavā ca uttamesu sātisayaṃ uttamo, tena taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti nāthasaddassattho
anya-e0804n:645_4: vutto. Anāthasaddo pana ittarajanesu nirūḷho, so ca kho “na nāthoti anātho. Natthi
anya-e0804n:645_5: nātho etassāti vā anātho”ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena, na pana “na nāthati na yācatīti
anya-e0804n:645_6: anātho”ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena. Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so
anya-e0804n:645_7: nātho, yo ca aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti, nāpi attano añño saraṇaṃ gati
anya-e0804n:645_8: patiṭṭhā hoti, so anāthoti vuccati saṅketavasena. Tathā hi “saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:645_9: lokasammutikāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne “lokanātho
anya-e0804n:645_10: tuvaṃ eko, saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇina”nti ca “anāthānaṃ bhavaṃ nātho”ti ca –
anya-e0804n:648_0: Pāḷiyo nidassanāni bhavanti. Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako “nātho”ti na vuccati,
anya-e0804n:648_1: ayācako ca “anātho”ti. Lokassa pana saraṇaṃ “nātho”ti vuccati. Yassa saraṇaṃ na vijjati,
anya-e0804n:648_2: so “anātho”ti vuccati, tathā samiddho “nātho”ti vuccati, asamiddho “anātho”ti. Tasmā
anya-e0804n:648_3: paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṃ
anya-e0804n:648_4: attho gahetabbo. Ayañca nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n:650: Satha seṭhille. Sathati. Sathalo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ. Siṭhilotipi pāḷi dissati. Tadā ṭhikāro muddhajo gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:652_0: Kattha silāghāyaṃ. Katthati, vikatthati. Katthanā, vikatthanā. Tattha katthatīti
anya-e0804n:652_1: pasaṃsati. Vikatthatīti virūpaṃ katthati abhūtavatthudīpanato. Ettha ca “bahumpi
anya-e0804n:652_2: so vikattheyya, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato”ti ca “idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī, so katthati
anya-e0804n:652_3: ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti” ca ādayo payogā.
anya-e0804n:653: Byatha dukkhabhayacalanesu. Byathati. Bhantā byathitamānasā. Tato kumārābyathitā, sutvā luddassa bhāsitaṃ. Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca.
anya-e0804n:654: Sutha kutha katha hiṃsāyaṃ. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.
anya-e0804n:655_0: Patha gatiyaṃ. Pathati. Patho. Pathoti maggo. So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo
anya-e0804n:655_1: pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo
anya-e0804n:655_2: cāti. Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
anya-e0804n:655_3: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṃ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṃ gahetvā pathiyati
anya-e0804n:655_4: paṭipajjiyatīti patho. Atha vā pātheti kārakaṃ puggalaṃ gameti nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti
anya-e0804n:655_5: vā patho, paṭipadāyeva. Maggābhidhānaṃ curādigaṇe maggadhātukathanaṭṭhāne kathessāma.
anya-e0804n:658: Potha pariyāyanabhāve. Pothati. Pothako. Pothetīti ayaṃ curādigaṇepi vattati. Tena “samantā anupariyeyyuṃ, nippothentā catuddisā”ti payogo dissati.
anya-e0804n:663_0: Dā dāne. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Saddho dānaṃ dadāti deti, sīlaṃ ādadāti ādeti. Imāni suddhakattupadāni
anya-e0804n:663_1: taddīpakattā. Saddho assaddhaṃ dānaṃ dāpeti, sīlaṃ ādapeti, samādapeti. Ye dhammamevādapayanti
anya-e0804n:663_2: santo. Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā. Saddhena dānaṃ
anya-e0804n:663_3: dīyati, sīlaṃ ādīyati, samādīyati, imāni kammapadāni taddīpakattā. Ayañca dā dāneti
anya-e0804n:663_4: dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṃ patvā supanakriyaṃ vadanto “dāyati niddāyati
anya-e0804n:663_5: niddā”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto “diyati
anya-e0804n:663_6: dānaṃ dātta”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Suddhiṃvadanto “dāyati vedāyati
anya-e0804n:663_7: vodāna”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati, imasmiṃ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṃ
anya-e0804n:663_8: vadanto āpubbavasena gahaṇañca vadanto “dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṃ ādāna”nti
anya-e0804n:663_9: sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Tathā kucchitagamanaṃ vadanto “dāti suddāti
anya-e0804n:663_10: suddo suddī”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā
anya-e0804n:663_11: cettha, evamaññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ viseso upaparikkhitabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:664_0: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. “Dānaṃ, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ, brahmadeyyaṃ, dinnaṃ,
anya-e0804n:664_1: dāyako, dāyikā, dakkhiṇā” iccādīni, “dātuṃ, padātuṃ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna,
anya-e0804n:664_2: dadātuna, daditvā, daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṃ, ādāya, ādiya” iccādīni ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:665_0: Tattha dānanti dātabbaṃ, dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:665_1: Kasmā pana tattha dinnasaddoyeva kathiyati, na dattasaddoti? Akathane kāraṇamatthi.
anya-e0804n:665_2: “Dānaṃ dinna”ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati, tasmā na kathiyati.
anya-e0804n:667: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ”, iti dinnapadaṃ viya.
anya-e0804n:670_0: Tasmā “devadatto”tiādīsu “devena dinno”ti samāsaṃ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa
anya-e0804n:670_1: dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena. Upari hi “dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya”nti lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:670_2: passissatha. Ayameva hi sāsane nīti avilaṅghanīyā. Idaṃ panettha vavatthānaṃ –
anya-e0804n:681: Ediso pāḷiyaṃ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;
anya-e0804n:691: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṃ saddaracanamakāsi –
anya-e0804n:696_0: Ettha ca brahmadattanti idaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na pāḷito. Pāḷinayañhipatvā
anya-e0804n:696_2: bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā hi “bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṃsū”ti
anya-e0804n:696_3: pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. Tasmā etthevaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0804n:699: Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṃ padakkamo bhavati.
anya-e0804n:700_0: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha.
anya-e0804n:700_1: Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā. Dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ. Dadeyyuṃ,
anya-e0804n:700_2: dajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjuṃ. Dadeyyāsi, dajjāsi, dajjesi iccapi. Dajjāsi abhayaṃ
anya-e0804n:700_3: mama. Mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino. Sīlavantesu dajjesi, dānaṃ maddi
anya-e0804n:700_4: yathārahaṃ. Dadeyyātha, dajjātha. Dadeyyāmi, dajjāmi, dadeyyāma, dajjāma. Dadetha,
anya-e0804n:700_5: daderaṃ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho, dajjāvho. Dadeyyaṃ, dajjaṃ. Neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:700_6: Dadeyyāmhe, dajjāmhe. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. Garūnaṃ pana khanti aññathā bhavati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:704: Na hi sabbappakārena, pāḷiyo paṭibhanti no.
anya-e0804n:705_0: Tattha asmākaṃ khantiyā “dajjā dajja”ntiādīni yyakārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe
anya-e0804n:705_1: sijjhanti. “Dajjā sappuriso dāna”nti ettha hi “dajjā idaṃ “dadeyyā”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0804n:705_2: yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ saṃyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu
anya-e0804n:705_3: dvinnaṃ sarūpānamekassa lopañca dyakārasaññogassa ca jakāradvayaṃ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā
anya-e0804n:705_4: animittaṃ dīghabhāvaṃ katvā nipphajjati. Evaṃ sāsanassānurūpo vaṇṇasandhi bhavati.
anya-e0804n:705_5: Duvidho hi sandhi padasandhi vaṇṇasandhīti. Tesu yattha padacchedo labbhati, so padasandhi.
anya-e0804n:705_6: Yathā? Tatrāyaṃ. Yattha pana na labbhati, so vaṇṇasandhi. Yathā? Atrajo. Yathā ca
anya-e0804n:705_7: sugato, yathā ca paddhāni. Evaṃ duvidhesu sandhīsu “dajjā”ti ayaṃ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
anya-e0804n:707: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
anya-e0804n:709_0: Dassanato. Ettha hi dajjāti datvāti attho. Idaṃ pana datvāsaddena samānatthaṃ “dadiyya”
anya-e0804n:709_1: iti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā saññogesu sarūpalopañca
anya-e0804n:709_2: tato dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṃ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n:710_0: Athāparopi rūpanayo bhavati kammani yapaccayavasena. Tathā hi “petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:710_1: dajjā”ti ca “dakkhiṇā dajjā”ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti. Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti
anya-e0804n:710_2: dātabbāti attho kammani yapaccayavasena. Idha pana dādhātuto yapaccayaṃ katvā dhātussa
anya-e0804n:710_3: dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato yakāre pare saralopaṃ saññogabhāvañca jjakāradvayañca
anya-e0804n:710_4: itthiliṅgattā āpaccayādiñca katvā “dajjā”ti nipphajjati. Evaṃ “dajjā dadeyyā”ti ca
anya-e0804n:710_5: “dajjā dadiyya datvā”ti ca “dajjā dātabbā”ti ca etāni paccekaṃ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:710_6: “Dajjuṃ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho, dajja”nti etānipi “dadeyyuṃ
anya-e0804n:710_7: dadeyyāsī”tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ saññogesu sarūpalopaṃ
anya-e0804n:710_8: dyakārasamaññogassa jjakāradvayañca katvā nipphajjanti. Etesu dajjāsīti yaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0804n:710_9: tassāvayavassa ākārassa ekāraṃ katvā aparampi “dajjesī”ti rūpaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:711_0: Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti, gambhīro dukkhogāḷho,
anya-e0804n:711_1: na yena kenaci lakkhaṇena sādhetabbo, yathātanti viraciteheva lakkhaṇehi sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n:711_2: Tathā hi “khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī”tiādīsu yakāre pare saralopo bhavati, tena “athetthekasataṃ
anya-e0804n:711_3: khatyā. Evampi titthyā puthuso vadanti. Ārāmarukkhacetyānī”ti payogā dissanti. Tathā
anya-e0804n:711_5: ca padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sahasaddassa hakāralopaṃ, saṃsadde ca niggahītalopaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n:711_6: sakāragatassa sarassa dīghaṃ katvā yakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato thyakārasaññogassa
anya-e0804n:711_7: cchayugaṃ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati. Tena “sākacchati
anya-e0804n:711_8: taccha”nti rūpāni sijjhanti. Tathā hi “aññamaññaṃ sākacchiṃsu. Kālena dhammasākacchā.
anya-e0804n:711_9: Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ. Yathātathiyaṃ viditvāpi dhammaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti savikapāni
anya-e0804n:711_11: yakāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva. Vividho hi sāsanānukūlo rūpanipphādanupāyo, upari
anya-e0804n:711_12: ca etesaṃ sādhanatthaṃ “saralopo yamanarādīsū”tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –
anya-e0804n:714_0: Atridaṃ vattabbaṃ, kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “mātaraṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino”ti
anya-e0804n:714_1: ettha dajjanti padassa “dammī”ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva.
anya-e0804n:714_2: Ācariyā hi “sattamīpayogo aya”nti jānantāpi “kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu”nti
anya-e0804n:714_3: āsaṅkāya evaṃ vivaraṇamakaṃsu. Tathā kiñcāpi tehi “anāparādhakammantaṃ, na dajjaṃ
anya-e0804n:714_4: dakarakkhino”ti ettha na dajjanti padassa “nāhaṃ dakarakkhassa dassāmī”ti bhavissantīvasena
anya-e0804n:714_5: vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva, anāgataṃ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā
anya-e0804n:714_6: evaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ. “Neva dajjaṃ mahosadha”nti ettha pana “na tveva dadeyya”nti
anya-e0804n:714_7: sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṃ katanti. Evaṃ dajjaṃpadassa vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:715_0: Idāni parokkhādivasena padakkamo kathiyati. “Dada, dadū. Dadū”ti ca idaṃ “nārado
anya-e0804n:715_1: iti nāmena, kassapo iti maṃ vidū”tiādīsu vidūsaddena samaṃ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṃ,
anya-e0804n:716_0: Ettha ca daditthoti idaṃ “sañjagghittho mayā saha. Mā kisittho mayā vinā. Mā naṃ
anya-e0804n:716_1: kalale akkamittho”tiādīsu “sañjagghittho”tiādīhi samaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena
anya-e0804n:717_0: Adadā, adadū. Adade, adadattha. Adadaṃ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadatthuṃ. Adadase,
anya-e0804n:717_1: adadavhaṃ. Adadiṃ adadamhase. Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṃ gahetabbaṃ “yesaṃ no na dadamhase”ti
anya-e0804n:718: Adadi, adaduṃ, adadiṃsu. Adado, adadittha. Adadiṃ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase, adadivhaṃ. Adadaṃ, adadimhe. Ajjatanīsahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:720: “Adadisā, dadissā, adadissaṃsu, dadissaṃsu” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:721_0: Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi,
anya-e0804n:721_1: dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Attanopadāni appasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n:721_2: Sattamīnayo ca parokkhānayo ca appasiddho. Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci
anya-e0804n:721_3: koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā, sakkā ca “adā, adū, ado, ada”ntiādinā yojetuṃ. Tathā
anya-e0804n:721_4: hi nayo dissati. Adā dānaṃ purindado. Varañceme ado sakka. Brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gajaṃ.
anya-e0804n:721_5: Adāsime. Adaṃsu te mamokāsaṃ. Adāsiṃ brāhmaṇe tadāti. “Dassati, dassanti” iccādi
anya-e0804n:721_6: sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. “Adassā, dassā, adassaṃsu, dassaṃsu, dassiṃsu” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:722_0: Tathā ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma. Kaccāyanamate “ādatte”ti
anya-e0804n:722_1: attanopadaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ “ādadātu, ādadeyya” iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Ādetu ādeyya iccādi
anya-e0804n:722_2: yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evameva ca “dāpeti, ādāpetī”tiādīnipi yathārahaṃ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:723_0: Dākucchite gamane. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī. Tattha suddoti suddātīti suddo, parapothanādiluddācārakammunā
anya-e0804n:723_1: dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchatīti attho. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n:723_2: su iti sīghatthe nipāto, dā iti garahattho dhātu kucchitagativācakattā. Suddassa bhariyā suddī.
anya-e0804n:724: Du gatiyaṃ. Davati. Dumo. Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātīti dumo.
anya-e0804n:725: Desodhane. Sodhanaṃ pariyodāpanaṃ. Dāyati. Dāyanaṃ. Yathā gāyati, gāyanaṃ. Dāyituṃ, dāyitvā, dhātāvayavassekārassa āyādeso. “Dātuṃ, datvā” iccapi rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:726_0: Tatra dātunti sodhetuṃ. Datvāti sodhetvāti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi “bālo abyatto
anya-e0804n:726_1: nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṃ dātu”nti ettha dātunti padassa sodhetunti attho.
anya-e0804n:726_2: Keci “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo parehi anuyuñjiyati, so
anya-e0804n:726_3: anuyogaṃ deti nāmāti. Tasmā “ācariyassa anuyogaṃ datvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgacchī”tiādīsupi
anya-e0804n:726_4: anuyogaṃ datvāti anuyogaṃ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo. Tathā hi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0804n:726_5: “anuyogadāpanattha”nti etasmiṃ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṃ? Anuyogadāpanatthanti
anya-e0804n:726_6: anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti
anya-e0804n:726_7: nāma, anuyuñjanto ca naṃ sodhāpeti nāmāti. Idampi ca tehi vuttaṃ. Dātunti sodhetuṃ.
anya-e0804n:726_8: Keci “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhanādaṃ nadati, so eva
anya-e0804n:726_9: tattha anuyogaṃ detīti. Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṃvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0804n:726_10: “dānaṃ datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodāpetvā”ti sodhanattho vutto. Dullabhā ayaṃ nīti
anya-e0804n:727_0: De pālane. Dīyati. Dānaṃ, uddānaṃ dāyituṃ, dāyitvā. Tattha dānanti duggatito dāyati
anya-e0804n:727_1: rakkhatīti dānaṃ, dānacetanā. Uddānanti vuttassa atthassa vakkhamānassa vā vippakiṇṇabhāvena
anya-e0804n:727_2: nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. Atha vā uddānanti
anya-e0804n:728: Khāda bhakkhane. Khādati. Khādikā, khādanaṃ, aññamaññakhādikā. Pubbaphalakhādikā, khajjaṃ, khādanīyaṃ, khandhā.
anya-e0804n:729_0: Tattha khajjanti pūvo. Khādanīyanti pūvaphalāphalādi. “Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti
anya-e0804n:729_1: visuṃ bhojanīyassa vacanato khādanaṃ nāma khajjassa vā khādanīyassa vā bhakkhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:729_2: Apica hiṃsāpi “khādana”nti vuccati. Jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi khajjantīti khandhā,
anya-e0804n:730: Bada theriye. Thirabhāvo theriyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:733: Khada dhitihiṃsāsu ca. Theriyāpekkhāya cakāro. Khadati. Khadiro.
anya-e0804n:734: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Gadati. Āgadanaṃ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.
anya-e0804n:735: Rada vilekhane. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra radanoti danto.
anya-e0804n:736: Nada abyattasadde. Sīho nadati, paṇadati. Nādo, nadī. Pabbatesu vanādīsu nadatīti nadī. Nada i iti dhātudvayavasena pana “nadantī gacchatīti nadī”tipi nibbacanaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:737_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ yā panesā “nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā, sā kiṃniccamabyattasaddeyeva
anya-e0804n:737_1: vattati, udāhu katthaci viyattiyampi vācāyaṃ vattatī”ti? Niccamabyattasaddeyeva vattatīti.
anya-e0804n:737_3: abyattasaddo hotu, “sīho viya ayaṃ puriso nadatī”tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo
anya-e0804n:737_4: siyāti? Tanna viyattāpi samānā manussabhāsā sīho viyāti evaṃ samupekkhāvasena sīhapadatthassāpekkhanato
anya-e0804n:737_5: nadasaddena niddisiyati, na purisāpekkhanavasena. Yathā hi valāhakūpamāvasena kathitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:737_6: “kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ gajjanaṃ vassanañca puggale
anya-e0804n:737_8: vattabbameva hoti, evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho
anya-e0804n:737_9: viya nadatīti avibhāvitatthavantena nadasaddena manussabhāsāpi niddisitabbā hoti.
anya-e0804n:738_0: Ettha ca ambaphalūpamādayopi āharitvā dassetabbā. Na hi pakkāmakatādīni puggalesu
anya-e0804n:738_1: vijjanti, atha kho ambaphalādīsu eva vijjanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatā aññenākārena
anya-e0804n:738_2: sadisattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ambaphalūpamādayo vuttā, evameva nadasaddo abyattasaddabhāvena
anya-e0804n:738_3: tiracchānagatasaddādīsu eva vattabbopi atthantaravibhāvanatthaṃ “sīho viya nadatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:738_4: manussabhāsāyampi rūḷhiyā vutto, na sabhāvato. Tathā hi sabhāvato nadasaddenapi vassitasaddādīhipi
anya-e0804n:738_5: manussabhāsā niddisitabbā na hotīti. Yadi evaṃ –
anya-e0804n:741_0: Ettha kasmā vassitasaddena manussabhāsā niddisiyatīti? Saccaṃ manussabhāsāpi vassitasaddena
anya-e0804n:741_1: niddiṭṭhā dissati, evaṃ santepi sā “suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañca vassita”nti
anya-e0804n:741_2: vassitasaddavasena payogassa vacanato tadanurūpaṃ niddisituṃ arahatīti mantvā vassitasaddasadisī
anya-e0804n:741_3: niddiṭṭhā. Na hi “manusso vassatī”tiādinā visuṃ payogā dissanti, “sakuṇo vassati,
anya-e0804n:741_4: kūjatī”tiādinā pana payogā dissanti, tasmā “saṅgāmaṃ otaritvāna, sīhanādaṃ nadi kuso”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:741_5: viya yathārahaṃ attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ nadadhātu sabhāvato abyattasaddeyeva hoti,
anya-e0804n:746: Khadda daṃsane. Daṃsanamiha dantasukatakattikā kriyā abhidhīyate. Sabhāvattā dhātuyā sādhanappayogasamavāyī. Khaddati.
anya-e0804n:747_0: Adi bandhane. Andati. Andu. Andusaddopanettha itthiliṅgo gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgappayogadassanato
anya-e0804n:747_1: “seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha ayaṃ aciravatī nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā, atha
anya-e0804n:747_2: puriso āgaccheyya pāratthiko pāragavesī pāragāmī pāraṃ taritukāmo, so orimatīre daḷhāya
anya-e0804n:747_3: anduyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanabandho”ti. Tatra andūti yaṃ kiñci bandhanaṃ vā. “Yathā
anya-e0804n:747_4: andughare puriso”ti hi vuttaṃ. Bandhanaviseso vā, “andubandhanādīni chinditvā palāyiṃsū”ti
anya-e0804n:747_5: hi vuttaṃ. Apica andanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena andu viyātipi andu, pañca kāmaguṇā.
anya-e0804n:747_6: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ime kho vāseṭṭha pañca kāmaguṇā ariyassa vinaye andūtipi bandhanantipi
anya-e0804n:747_7: vuccantī”ti. Niggahītāgamavasenāyaṃ dhātu vuttā. Katthaci pana vigataniggahītāgamopi
anya-e0804n:747_8: hoti, taṃ yathā? “Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva
anya-e0804n:747_9: ahirika”nti pāḷi. Ettha anuandati anubandhatīti anvadi. Anvadi eva anvadevāti kitaviggaho
anya-e0804n:747_10: sandhiviggaho ca veditabbo. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anvadevāti anubandhamānamevā”ti
anya-e0804n:747_11: vuttaṃ, taṃ avijjamahirikaṃ anubandhamānameva hotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:749: Ettha indoti adhipatibhūto yo koci. So hi indati paresu issariyaṃ pāpuṇātīti indoti vuccati. Apica indoti sakko. Sakkassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:757: Evaṃ anekāni nāmāni. Ekopi hi attho anekasaddappavattinimittatāya anekanāmo. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n:758_0: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi, tasmā
anya-e0804n:758_1: “maghavā”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṃ
anya-e0804n:758_2: adāsi, tasmā “purindado”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno
anya-e0804n:758_3: sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā “sakko”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto
anya-e0804n:758_4: samāno āvāsaṃ adāsi, tasmā “vāsavo”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo sahassaṃ
anya-e0804n:758_5: atthānaṃ muhuttena cinteti, tasmā “sahassakkho”ti vuccati. Sakkassa mahāli devānamindassa
anya-e0804n:758_6: sujā nāma asurakaññā pajāpati, tasmā “sujampatī”ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo
anya-e0804n:758_7: devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti, tasmā “devānamindo”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n:760_0: Tathā hi yena pavattinimittena tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha
anya-e0804n:760_1: sakkādisaddā pavattā, atha kho aññena. Tathā yena sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ paññāsaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n:760_2: na tena tattha vijjādisaddā. Yena sampayuttadhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvena uppannadhammasmiṃ
anya-e0804n:760_3: cittasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha viññāṇādisaddā. Na hi vinā kenaci pavattinimittena
anya-e0804n:760_4: saddo pavattatīti. Ekopi attho sammutyattho ca paramattho ca anekasaddappavttinimittatāya
anya-e0804n:761_0: Ettha siyā “nāmānīti vadatha, kiṃ nāmaṃ nāmā”ti. Vuccate – īdise ṭhāne atthesu saddappavattinimittaṃ
anya-e0804n:761_1: “nāma”nti gahitaṃ, yaṃ “liṅga”ntipi vuccati. Tathā hi “nāma”nti ca “liṅga”nti ca
anya-e0804n:761_2: saddopi vuccati, “aññaṃ sobhanaṃ nāmaṃ pariyesissāmi. Liṅgañca nippajjate”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:761_4: vuccati “nāmagottaṃ na jīrati. Sataliṅgo”tiādīsu viya. Iti nāmasaddenapi liṅgasaddenapi
anya-e0804n:761_5: saddappavattinimittassa kathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddappavattinimittañca nāma lokasaṅketasiddho
anya-e0804n:761_6: taṃtaṃvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāravisesoti gahetabbaṃ. So evaṃbhūtoyeva sāmaññākāraviseso
anya-e0804n:761_7: nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā vadanti. So hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe saddaṃ nāmeti tassa
anya-e0804n:761_8: tassa atthassa nāmasaññaṃ karotīti nāmaṃ, pakārehi ñāpanato paññatti ca. Saviññattivikārassa
anya-e0804n:761_9: pana saddassa sammutiparamatthasaccānaṃ pakārehi ñāpanato paññattibhāve vattabbameva
anya-e0804n:761_10: natthi. Saddasseva hi ekantena paññattibhāvo icchitabbo “niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā”ti
anya-e0804n:761_12: ca pāḷidassanato. Idha pana saddappavattinimittādhikārattā nāmavasena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n:761_13: Evaṃ anekavidhassa sāmaññākāravisesoti pubbācariyehi gahitassa nāmapaññattisaṅkhātassa
anya-e0804n:761_14: saddappavattinimittassa vasena ekopi ñeyyattho anekaliṅgoti gahetabbo. Tenāha āyasmā
anya-e0804n:764: Evaṃ sabbābhidhānesupi iminā nayena yathārahaṃ attho vibhāvetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:765: Vidi avayave. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, “vindo”ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:766: Khidi avayaveti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṃ mate “khindatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:767: Nidi kucchāyaṃ. Kucchāsaddo garahattho. Nindati. Nindā.
anya-e0804n:771: Avaṇṇo aguṇo nindā, garahā ayasopi ca;
anya-e0804n:772: Asiloko akitti ca, asilāghā ca atthuti.
anya-e0804n:773_0: Nanda samiddhiyaṃ. Akammikā dhātu. Nandati puttehi puttimā. Nandāya nuna maraṇena.
anya-e0804n:773_1: Nandasi sirivāhana. Nandanaṃ vanaṃ. Abhisaddayoge panāyaṃ sakammakopi. Abhinandanti
anya-e0804n:774: Sirīva rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ;
anya-e0804n:775: Tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu.
anya-e0804n:776: Rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ yena, na diṭṭhaṃ sugatālayaṃ;
anya-e0804n:777: Na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññe mahesayaṃ.
anya-e0804n:780: Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṃ sukhanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.
anya-e0804n:781_0: Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṃ, gandhasāro, malayajo, suvaṇṇacandanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:781_1: haricandanaṃ, rattacandanaṃ, gosītacandanaṃ. Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya
anya-e0804n:781_2: sattānaṃ paliḷāhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ sukhaṃ uppādetīti candanaṃ. Candoti somo, sopi candayati
anya-e0804n:781_3: hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṃ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamento sukhaṃ
anya-e0804n:781_4: uppādetīti candoti vuccati. Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti cando. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0804n:781_5: pana “chandaṃ janetīti cando”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:782: Cando nakkhattarājā ca, indu somo nisākaro;
anya-e0804n:783: Candimā mā nisānātho, osadhī so nisāpati.
anya-e0804n:784: Uḷurājā sasaṅko ca, himaraṃsi sasīpi ca;
anya-e0804n:787: Sudhaṃ sudhi dhūpi yūpa-rasmi ceva khamākaro;
anya-e0804n:788: Nakkhatteso ca rajanī-karo subbhaṃsu eva ca.
anya-e0804n:790: Kadi kaladi avhāne rodane ca. Kandati, pakkandati. Pakkanduṃ, kandanto, kalandako.
anya-e0804n:793: Khanda gatisosanesu. Khandati. Khando. Khando nāma eko devo, yo “kumāro sattidharo”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:795: Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṃ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.
anya-e0804n:796: Vanda abhivādanathutīsu. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṃ, vandako.
anya-e0804n:797: Ettha pana vandatīti padassa namassati thometi vāti attho. Tathā hi suttantaṭīkākāro “vandeti vandāmi thomemi vā”ti āha.
anya-e0804n:798: Bhadi kallāṇe sokhiye ca. Kallāṇaṃ kalyāṇaṃ, sokhiyaṃ sukhino bhāvo, sukhamiccevattho. Bhandati. Bhandako, bhaddo, bhadro.
anya-e0804n:800_0: Ettha pana mandoti aññāṇīpi bāladārakopi vuccati. Tattha aññāṇī mandati aññāṇabhāvena
anya-e0804n:800_1: appasaṃsitabbampi puggalaṃ thometīti mando. Mandati amoditabbaṭṭhānepi modatīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_2: Mandati dānasīlādipuññakriyāsu pamajjatīti mando. Mandati attano ca paresañca hitāhitaṃ
anya-e0804n:800_3: acintento khādanīyabhojanīyādīhi attano kāyaṃ sañjātamedaṃ kurumāno supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_4: Mandati ayuttaṃ paresaṃ kriyaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena gacchati gaṇhātīti mando. Atha
anya-e0804n:800_5: vā mandati punappunaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gabbhaṃ gacchatīti mando. Vuttañhi
anya-e0804n:800_6: bhagavatā “punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando”ti. Bāladārako pana mandati yuttāyuttamajānanto
anya-e0804n:800_7: uttānaseyyaṃparivattanaseyyaṃ vā supatīti mando. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:804: Idaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyakā”ti
anya-e0804n:805_0: Vuttaṃ, iti uttānasayanato paṭṭhāya yāva mandadasakaṃ, tāva “mando”ti “dārako”ti
anya-e0804n:805_1: daṭṭhabbo. Appatthavācakopi pana mandasaddo hoti, so pāṭipadikattā idha nādhippeto,
anya-e0804n:805_2: atha vā mandati appabhāvena gacchati pavattatīti nipphannapāṭipadikavasenapi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:806: Muda hāse. Hasanaṃ hāso tuṭṭhi. Modati, pamodati. Sammodati. Sammodako. Sammodamānā gacchanti muditā. Mudā.
anya-e0804n:807: Hada karīsossagge. Karīsossaggo nāma karīsassa ossajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Hadati. Uhadati. Hadano.
anya-e0804n:808_0: Ettha ca “yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipī”ti ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:808_1: tatra uhadantipīti vaccampi karonti. Ummihantipīti passāvampi karonti. Pacchimapadassattho
anya-e0804n:808_2: miha secaneti dhātuvasena daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana curādigaṇepi vattati dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n:808_3: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne “mutteti ohadeti cā”ti cariyāpiṭakapāḷippadeso nidassanaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0804n:808_4: muttetīti passāvaṃ karoti. Ohadetīti karīsaṃ vissajjeti.
anya-e0804n:809: Uda mode kīḷāyañca. Udati. Udānaṃ. Udaggo.
anya-e0804n:810_0: Tattha udānanti kenaṭṭhena udānaṃ? Udānanaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ udānanaṃ nāma? Pībhivegasamuṭṭhāpito
anya-e0804n:810_1: udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃgahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā
anya-e0804n:810_2: gacchati, taṃ “avaseko”ti vuccati. Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā
anya-e0804n:810_3: gacchati, taṃ “ogho”ti vuccati, evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ
anya-e0804n:810_4: hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā vacīdvārena nikkhamanto
anya-e0804n:811: Kuda khuda guda kīḷāyameva. Kodati. Khodati. Godati.
anya-e0804n:812: Sūda paggharaṇe. Sūdati. Suttaṃ. Sūdo. Rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n:813_0: Ettha ca suttanti sūdati dhenu viya khīraṃ atthe paggharāpetīti suttaṃ, tepiṭakaṃ
anya-e0804n:813_1: buddhavacanaṃ. Sakammikadhātuttā pana “paggharāpetī”ti kāritavasena attho kathetuṃ
anya-e0804n:813_2: labbhati. Tathā hi “karotī”ti padassa “nipphādetī”ti attho kathetuṃ labbhati. Sūdoti
anya-e0804n:813_3: bhattakāro. Yo “āḷāriko, odaniko, sūpakāro, rasako”ti ca vuccati. Sūdati “evañcevañca
anya-e0804n:813_4: kate khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sugandhaṃ manāpaṃ surasañca bhavissatī”ti randhanakriyāya
anya-e0804n:815: Hilādi sukhe ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkhako. Hilādati. Hilādanaṃ, hilādo, mettāsahāyakatasattamahāhilādo.
anya-e0804n:817: Mida snehe. Sneho nāma vasāsaṅkhāto sneho pītisnehoti duvidho. Idha pana vasāsaṅkhāto sneho adhippeto, medati medo.
anya-e0804n:818_0: Ettha ca medatīti medasahito bhavati ayaṃ purisoti attho. Medo nāma thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ
anya-e0804n:818_1: pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho, so vaṇṇena haliddivaṇṇo
anya-e0804n:818_2: hoti. Kārite “medeti medayatī”ti rūpāni. Tathā hi “te imaṃ kāyaṃ balaṃ gāhenti nāma
anya-e0804n:818_3: brūhenti nāma medenti nāmā”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha medentīti sañjātamedaṃ karontīti
anya-e0804n:818_4: attho. Imissā pana dhātuyā divādigaṇaṃ pattāya pītisinehatthe “mejjatī”ti suddhakatturūpaṃ
anya-e0804n:818_5: bhavati. Curādigaṇaṃ pana pattāya “medeti medayatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:820: Sanda pasavane. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ avicchedappavatti. Sandati udakaṃ. Mahanto puññābhisando.
anya-e0804n:821: Ettha ca puññābhisandoti puññappavāho, puññanadītipi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0804n:822: Madda maddane. Maddabhi, pamaddati. Mārasenappamaddano. Kaṇṭakaṃ maddati.
anya-e0804n:827_0: Sīda visaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Visaraṇaṃ vippharaṇaṃ. Gatyāvasānaṃ gamanassa avasānaṃ
anya-e0804n:827_1: osānaṃ abhāvakaraṇaṃ, nisīdananti attho. Sīdati, lābūni sīdanti. Saṃsīdati, osīdati,
anya-e0804n:827_2: pasīdati, vippasīdati. Pasādo. Pasanno. Vippasanno. Pasādako. Pasādito. Pāsādo. Osīdāpako.
anya-e0804n:827_3: Kusīto. Āsīno. Nisinno. Nisinnako. Sannisīvesu pakkhisu. Nisīdanaṃ, nisinnaṃ. Nisajjā.
anya-e0804n:827_4: Gonisādo, upanisā. Sīdeti. Sīdayati. Sīdāpeti. Sīdāpayati. Pasādeti. Nisīdituṃ. Nisīdāpetuṃ,
anya-e0804n:827_5: nisādetuṃ, nisīdāpeti, nisīdāpetvā. Ucchaṅge maṃ nisādetvā, pitā atthānusāsati. Nisīditvātipi
anya-e0804n:827_6: pāṭho. Nisīditvā. Nisīditvāna. Nisīdituna. Nisīdiya. Nisīdiyāna. Saṃsīditvā. Avasīditvā. Osīditvā.
anya-e0804n:828_0: Tattha kusītoti vīriyenādhigantabbassa atthassa alābhato kucchitenākārena sīdatīti
anya-e0804n:828_1: kusīto. Atha vā sayampi kucchitenākārena sīdati aññepi sīdāpeti taṃ nissāya aññesaṃ
anya-e0804n:828_2: sīdanassa sambhavatoti kusīto. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
anya-e0804n:831_0: Kusītoti cettha dassa tattaṃ “sugato”ti ettha viya “satasmīti hotī”ti ettha viya
anya-e0804n:831_1: ca. Tathā hi sīdatīti sataṃ, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iminā ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n:831_2: Sataiti cettha avibhattiko niddeso. Sannisīvesūti parissamavinodanatthaṃ sabbaso
anya-e0804n:831_3: nisīdantesu, vissamamānesūti attho, dakārassa vakāraṃ katvā niddeso. Nisīdananti
anya-e0804n:831_4: nisīdanakriyā. Mañcapīṭhādikaṃ vā āsanaṃ. Tañhi nisīdanti etthāti nisīdananti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:831_5: Nisinnanti nisīdanakriyā eva. Ettha pana “gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite
anya-e0804n:831_6: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti. Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnanti kukkuccaṃ
anya-e0804n:831_7: upadahatītiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Ettha hi gamanaṃ gabhaṃ, ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:831_8: nisīdanaṃ nisannaṃ, supanaṃ suttaṃ, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgaritaṃ, bhāsanaṃ bhāsitanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:831_9: Nisajjāti nisīdanā. Gonisādoti gonisajjanā. Upanisāti upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti
anya-e0804n:831_10: upanisā, kāraṇaṃ. Nisādetunti nisīdāpetuṃ. Nisādetvāti nisīdāpetvā.
anya-e0804n:832: Bhāve napuṃsako ñeyyo, nisinnanti ravo pana;
anya-e0804n:836: Nida neda kucchāsannikarisesu. Kucchā garahā. Sannikarisaṃ vohāraviseso. Nidati. Nedati.
anya-e0804n:837: Bundi nisāne. Nisānaṃ tejanaṃ tikkhatā. Bundati. Bondi.
anya-e0804n:838_0: Ettha ca bondīti sarīraṃ. Tañhi bundāni tikkhāni pisuṇapharusavācādīni vā paññāvīriyādīni
anya-e0804n:838_1: vā ettha santīti bondīti vuccati, saññogaparattepi ukārassokārādeso, pāpakalyāṇajanavasenesa
anya-e0804n:839: “Nāhaṃ puna na ca puna, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
anya-e0804n:842: Kāyo dehaṃ sarīrañca, vapu bimbañca viggahaṃ;
anya-e0804n:843: Bondi gattaṃ tanu ceva, attabhāvo tathūpadhi;
anya-e0804n:845_0: Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Vadati, vajjati. Vadeti, ovadati, ovadeti, paṭivadati. Abhivadati,
anya-e0804n:845_1: anuvadati, upavadati, apavadati. Nivadati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Tattha “vajjantu
anya-e0804n:845_2: bhonto amma”nti pāḷidassanato vajjatīti padaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana garū “vajjetī”ti
anya-e0804n:845_3: rūpaṃ icchanti, taṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttañce gahetabbaṃ, “upāsako bhikkhuṃ vadeti.
anya-e0804n:845_4: Tena yogena janakāyaṃ, ovadeti mahāmunī”ti ca dassanato vadeti ovadetīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:846: Ovādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayati. Vajjento, vajjayanto, imāni hetukattupadāni.
anya-e0804n:847_0: Kamme “vadiyati, ovadiyati, vajjiyati. Vadiyamāno, vajjamāno, ovadiyamāno, ovajjamāno
anya-e0804n:847_1: na karoti sāsanaṃ” iccādīni bhavanti. “Vādo, ovādo, paṭivādo, pavādo, abhivādanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:847_2: anuvādo, upavādo, apavādo, vivādo, nivādanaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadanaṃ” iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:848: “Vadituṃ, vaditvā, vivaditvā” iccevamādīni ca tumantādīni padāni.
anya-e0804n:849_0: Tattha vādoti kathā. Vaditabbaṃ vattabbanti vajjaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Vacanaṃ. Etena saccavajjena,
anya-e0804n:849_1: samaṅginī sāmikena homīti ettha hi vacanaṃ “vajja”nti vuccati. Vadanti etenāti vadanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:850: Vadanaṃ lapanaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, mukha massañca ānanaṃ;
anya-e0804n:852: Tatra vadatīti pitā puttaṃ vadati. Apica vadatīti bherī vadati, nādaṃ muñcatīti attho. Esa nayo vajjatīti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n:853: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā, vadati, vadanti. Vadasi, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadate, vadante. Vadase, vadavhe. Vade, vadamhe.
anya-e0804n:854: Vadatu, vadantu. Vadāhi, vada, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadataṃ, vadantaṃ. Vadassu, vadavho. Vade, vadāmase.
anya-e0804n:855: Vajjati, vajjanti. Vajjasi, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjate, vajjante. Vajjase, vajjavhe. Vajje, vajjamhe.
anya-e0804n:856_0: Vajjatu, vajjantu. Vajjāhi, vajja, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjataṃ, vajjantaṃ.
anya-e0804n:856_1: Vajjassu, vajjavho. Vajje, vajjāmhase. Imā dve padamālā vadadhātussa vajjādesavasena
anya-e0804n:856_2: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atrāyaṃ sukhumatthavinicchayo, “mānussakā ca dibbā ca, tūriyā
anya-e0804n:856_3: vajjanti tāvade”ti pāḷi. Ettha vajjantīti idaṃ suddhakattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Kiṃ viya?
anya-e0804n:858: Nadantu bheī sannaddhā, vaggū vadantu dundubhī”ti
anya-e0804n:859_0: Ettha “udīrayantu vadantu”ādīni viya. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vajjantīti vajjiṃsūti
anya-e0804n:859_1: atītavacane vattamānavacanaṃ veditabba”nti suddhakattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tasmā
anya-e0804n:860: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū;
anya-e0804n:862_0: Ettha pana vajjantīti hetukattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Tañca kho vaṇṇasandhivisayattā
anya-e0804n:862_1: vādayantīti kāritapadarūpena siddhaṃ. Tathā hi “vādayantī”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0804n:862_2: yakāre pare saralopo kato, dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṃ pubbakkharassa rassattañca
anya-e0804n:862_3: bhavati. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti hetukattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:862_4: Tathā hi “devatā nabhe accherakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā antalikkhe etāni
anya-e0804n:862_5: saṅkhapaṇavādīni tūriyāni vādayantī”ti hetukattuvasena attho gahetabbo bhavati, tasmā
anya-e0804n:862_6: īdisesu ṭhānesu vadassa vajjādeso na bhavati.
anya-e0804n:863_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “antalikkhamhi vajjanti, disvānaccherakaṃ nabhe”ti etthāpi “vajjantī”ti
anya-e0804n:863_1: padaṃ suddhakattupadameva, na hetukattupadaṃ “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti vivaraṇe katepi,
anya-e0804n:863_2: tathā hi “ye kecime diṭṭhiparibbasānā, “idameva sacca’nti vivādayantī”ti ca “evampi
anya-e0804n:863_3: viggayha vivādayantī”ti ca evamādīsu vadantipadena samānatthaṃ “vādayantī”ti padañca
anya-e0804n:863_4: sāsane diṭṭha”nti? Tanna, “disvā”ti dassanakriyāvacanato. Na hi saṅkhapaṇavādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n:863_5: pāṭihāriyādidassanaṃ upapajjati dassanacittassa abhāvatoti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi –
anya-e0804n:866: Ettha viya upacaritattā upapajjateva dassanavacanaṃ. Tasmā “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti vivaraṇaṃ suddhakattuvasena katanti? Tanna, heṭṭhā –
anya-e0804n:869_0: Iminnā gāthāya “vādentīti vādayanti devatā”ti sapāṭhasesassa atthavivaraṇassa hetukattuvasena
anya-e0804n:869_1: katattā. Athāpi vadeyyuṃ “saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū’ti paccattavacanavasena
anya-e0804n:869_2: vuttattā vajjantīti padaṃ kammavācakapada”nti ce? Tampi na, kammavasena vivaraṇassa
anya-e0804n:869_3: akatattā, kattuvasena pana katattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:870_0: Ayamettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Dvigaṇiko vadadhātu bhūvādigaṇiko ca curādigaṇiko
anya-e0804n:870_1: ca. So hi bhūvādigaṇe vattanto “vadati vajjatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā “vādeti,
anya-e0804n:870_2: vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayatī”ti cattāri hetukatturūpāni janeti, curādigaṇe pana
anya-e0804n:870_3: “vādeti, vādayatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā “vādāpeti, vādāpayatī”ti ca dve hetukatturūpāni
anya-e0804n:870_4: janeti, tasmā sāsane “vādenti vādayantī”ti suddhakattupadāni dissanti. “Vadeyya,
anya-e0804n:870_5: vadeyyuṃ” iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. “Vajjeyya, vajjeyyuṃ” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ vajjādesavasena.
anya-e0804n:871_0: Atha vā vadeyya, vadeyyuṃ, vajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjunti padamiva. Ettha ca “vajjuṃ
anya-e0804n:871_1: vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Vadeyyuṃ vāna vadeyyuṃvāti
anya-e0804n:871_2: attho. Vadeyyāsi, vajjāsi, vajjesi iccapi. Vutto vajjāsi vandanaṃ. Vajjesi kho tvaṃ
anya-e0804n:871_3: vāmūraṃ. Vadeyyātha, vajjātha. Ammaṃ arogaṃ vajjātha. Vadeyyāmi, vajjāmi, vadeyyāma,
anya-e0804n:871_4: vajjāma. Vadetha, vaderaṃ. Vadetho, vadeyyāvho, vajjāvho. Vadeyyaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadeyyāmhe,
anya-e0804n:871_5: vajjāmhe. Pubbe viya idhāpi yakāre pare saralopo daṭṭhabbo. Aññānipi upaparikkhitvā gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:872_0: Idāni parokkhādirūpāni kathayāma. Vada, pāvada, yathā babhuva. Dakāralope “pāva”
anya-e0804n:872_1: itipi rūpaṃ bhavati, “paṭipaṃ vadehi bhaddante”ti ettha “paṭipa”nti padaṃ viya. Tathā
anya-e0804n:872_2: hi “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāva” iti pāḷi dissati. Ettha pasaddo upasaggo dīghaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n:872_3: vutto “pāvadati pāvacana”ntiādīsu viya, pāvāti ca idaṃ atītavacanaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:872_4: pana atītavacanaṃ idanti jānantopi garu vattamānavacanavasena “pāvāti vadatī”ti vivaraṇamakāsi
anya-e0804n:873_0: Āyasmāpi ca sāriputto niddese “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti padaṃ nikkhipitvā ātumā
anya-e0804n:873_1: vuccati attā, sayameva pāvāti sayameva attānaṃ pāvadati, “ahamasmi sīlasampanno”ti
anya-e0804n:873_2: vā “vatasampanno”ti vāti vattamānavacanena atthaṃ niddisi. Atha vā pāvāti idaṃ na
anya-e0804n:873_3: kevalaṃ vadadhātuvaseneva nipphannaṃ, atha kho udhātuvasenapi. Tathā hi idaṃ papubbassa
anya-e0804n:873_4: usadde iti dhātussa payoge ukārassa okārādesaṃ katvā tato parokkhābhūte akāre pare
anya-e0804n:873_5: okārassa āvādesaṃ tato ca sandhikiccaṃ katvā sijjhati, tasmā udhātussa vadadhātuyā
anya-e0804n:873_6: samānatthattā tannipphannarūpassa ca vadadhātuyā nipphannarūpena samānarūpattā “sayameva
anya-e0804n:874_0: Idāni vicchinnā padamālā ghaṭīyati. Vada, vaduṃ. Vade, vadittha, vadaṃ, vadimha.
anya-e0804n:874_1: Vadittha, vadire. Vadittho, vadivho. Vadiṃ, vadimhe. Pāvada, pāva iccapi. Pāvadu.
anya-e0804n:874_2: Pāvade, pāvadittha. Pāvadaṃ, pāvadimha. Pāvadittha, pāvadire. Pāvadittho, pāvadivho.
anya-e0804n:874_3: Pāvadiṃ, pāvadimhe. Tathā “vajja, vajju” iccādīni parokkhārūpāni.
anya-e0804n:876: “Avadi, vadi, avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu. Avajji, vajji” iccādīni ajjatanīrūpāni.
anya-e0804n:878_0: “Avadissā, vadissā, avajjissā, vajjissā” iccādīni kālātipattirūpāni. Sesāni sabbānipi
anya-e0804n:878_1: yathāsambhavaṃ vitthāretabbāni. Yā panettha vadadhātu viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vuttā, sā
anya-e0804n:878_2: katthaci “vadantaṃ ekapokkharā. Bherivādako”tiādīsu abyattasaddepi vattati upacaritavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:879_0: Vida ñāṇe. Ñāṇaṃ jānanaṃ. Vidati. Vedo. Vidū. Kārite “vedeti. Vedayati. Sayaṃ abhiññā
anya-e0804n:879_1: sacchikatvā pavedeti. Vedayanti ca te tuṭṭhiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho”ti payogā. Tattha
anya-e0804n:879_2: pavedetīti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. Vedoti vidati sukhumampi kāraṇaṃ ājānātīti vedo,
anya-e0804n:879_3: paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. “Vedehamunī”ti ettha hi ñāṇaṃ vedoti vuccati. Vedoti vā vedaganthassapi
anya-e0804n:879_4: nāmaṃ vidanti jānanti etena uccāritamattena tadādhāraṃ puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇo aya”nti,
anya-e0804n:879_5: vidanti vā etena brāhmaṇā attanā kattabbakiccanti vedo. So pana iruvedayajuvedasāmavedavasena
anya-e0804n:879_6: tividho. Āthabbaṇavedaṃ pana paṇītajjhāsayā na sikkhanti parūpaghātasahitattā. Tasmā
anya-e0804n:879_7: pāḷiyaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū”ti vuttaṃ. Eteyeva “chando, manto, sutī”ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:884: Vidūti paṇḍitamanusso. So hi yathāsabhāvato kammañca phalañca kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidatīti “vidū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:885: Ruda assuvimocane, sakammikavasenimissā attho gahetabbo. Rodati, rudati iccapi. Ruṇṇaṃ. Ruditaṃ. Rodanaṃ. Rodanto. Rodamāno. Rodantī. Rodamānā. Rudamukhā. Rudaṃ. Rudanto.
anya-e0804n:886_0: Tattha rodatīti kiṃ rodati? Mataṃ puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā rodati. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “nāhaṃ
anya-e0804n:886_1: bhante etaṃ rodāmi, yaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā evamāha”. Ayaṃ panettha attho – “yaṃ maṃ
anya-e0804n:886_2: bhante bhagavā evamāha, ahaṃ etaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na parodāmi na paridevāmi
anya-e0804n:886_3: na anutthunāmī’ti evaṃ sakammikavasenattho veditabbo, na assumuñcanamattena.
anya-e0804n:887: ‘Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
anya-e0804n:888: Jīvantaṃ amma passanti, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī’ti
anya-e0804n:889_0: Ayañcettha payogo”ti idamaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ. Idaṃ pana ṭīkāvacanaṃ – “yathā sakammakā
anya-e0804n:889_1: dhātusaddā atthavisesavasena akammakā honti ‘vibuddho puriso vibuddho kamalasaṇḍo’ti,
anya-e0804n:889_2: evaṃ atthavisesavasena akammakāpi sakammakā hontīti dassetuṃ ‘na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti
anya-e0804n:889_3: āha. Anutthunasaddo sakammakavasena payujjati ‘purāṇāni anutthuna’ntiādīsu. Ayañcettha
anya-e0804n:889_4: payogoti iminā gāthāya anutthunanaṃ rudanaṃ adhippetanti dassetī”ti.
anya-e0804n:890_0: Dalidda duggatiyaṃ. Dukkhassa gati patiṭṭhāti duggatīti ayaṃ attho “apāyaṃ duggatiṃvinipātaṃ
anya-e0804n:890_1: nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu yujjati, idha pana idaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā añño attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:890_2: Kathaṃ duggatīti? Dukkhena kicchena gati gamanaṃ annapānādilābho duggatīti. Daliddati.
anya-e0804n:890_3: Daliddo, daliddī, dāliddiyaṃ. Tattha daliddatīti sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ paraṃ yācitvā
anya-e0804n:890_4: eva dukkhena adhigacchati, na ayācitvāti attho. Duliddoti duggatamanusso. Daliddīti
anya-e0804n:890_5: duggatā nārī. Daliddassa bhāvo dāliddiyaṃ. Ettha ca sabbameva “daliddatī”ti lokikappayogadassanato
anya-e0804n:890_6: “daliddatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. Sāsane pana taṃ kriyāpadaṃ na āgataṃ, “daliddo
anya-e0804n:890_7: daliddī”ti nāmapadāniyeva āgatāni. Anāgatampi taṃ “nāthatī”ti padamiva sāsanānulomattā
anya-e0804n:890_8: gahetabbameva. Garū pana kaccāyanamatavasena dala duggatimhīti duggativācakadaladhātuto
anya-e0804n:891: Tuda byathane. Tudati, vitudati. Kammani “tujjati, vitujjamāno, vedanābhibhunno”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:896: Nuda peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ, nudati, panudati. Panudanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:897: Vidi lābhe. Vindati. Uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ. Govindo.
anya-e0804n:898: Khadi parighāte. Parighātaṃ samantato hananaṃ. Khandati.
anya-e0804n:901_0: Dhā dhāraṇe. Dadhāti, vidadhāti. Yaṃ paṇḍito nipuṇaṃ saṃvidheti. Nidhiṃ nidheti.
anya-e0804n:901_1: Nidhi nāma nidhīyati. Tāva sunihito santo. Yato nidhiṃ parihari. Nidahati. Kuhiṃ
anya-e0804n:901_2: deva nidahāmi. Paridahati. Yo vattaṃ paridahissati. Dhassati. Paridhassati. Bāloti
anya-e0804n:901_3: paraṃ padahati. Sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti. Saddahati tathāgatassa
anya-e0804n:901_4: bodhiṃ. Saddhā, saddahanā, saddhātabbaṃ, saddahitabbaṃ, saddhāyiko, paccayiko. Saddheyyavacasā
anya-e0804n:901_5: upāsikā. Saddahituṃ, saddahitvā. Visesādhānaṃ. Sotāvadhānaṃ. Sotaṃ odahati. Ohitasoto.
anya-e0804n:901_6: Sotaṃ odahitvā. Maccudheyyaṃ, māradheyyaṃ, nāmadheyyaṃ, dhātu, dhātā, vidhātā. Vidhi.
anya-e0804n:901_7: Abhidhānaṃ, abhidheyyaṃ, nidhānavatī vācā, ādhānagāhī, sandhi. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:902: Vipubbo dhā karotyatthe, abhipubbo tu bhāsane;
anya-e0804n:904_0: Imasmā pana dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti,
anya-e0804n:904_1: kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti. Atra lopo vuccate, dvāraṃ pidahati, dvāraṃ pidahanto,
anya-e0804n:904_2: pidahituṃ, pidahitvā, evaṃ akāralopo bhavati. Dvāraṃ apidahitvā, evaṃ akāralopo na
anya-e0804n:904_3: bhavati. Ettha hi akāro apiupasaggassa avayavo na hoti. Kinti ce? Paṭisedhatthavācako
anya-e0804n:904_4: nipātoyeva, upasaggāvayavo pana adassanaṃ gato, ayaṃ niccālopo. Evaṃ dhādhātuto pubbassa
anya-e0804n:904_5: api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti, kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti.
anya-e0804n:904_6: Idaṃ acchariyaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ. Yatra hi nāma bhagavato pāvacane evarūpapopi nayo
anya-e0804n:904_7: sandissati viññūnaṃ hadayavimhāpanakaro, yo ekasmiṃyeva dhātumhi ekasmiṃyeva upasagge
anya-e0804n:904_8: ekasmiṃyevatthe kvaci lopālopavasena vibhajituṃ labbhati. Idāni mayaṃ sotūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:904_9: tadubhayampi ākāraṃ ekajjhaṃ karontā tadākāravatiṃ jinavarapāḷiṃ ānayāma –
anya-e0804n:905: “Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
anya-e0804n:906: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati;
anya-e0804n:907: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
anya-e0804n:910: Dhu gatitheriyesu. Gati gamanaṃ, theriyaṃ thirabhāvo. Dhavati. Dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0804n:911_0: Ettha ca dhuvanti thiraṃ. “Nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo”tiādīsu viya, tasmā
anya-e0804n:911_1: dhuvanti thiraṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ. Atha vā dhuvanti idaṃ gatitheriyatthavasena nibbānasseva
anya-e0804n:911_2: adhivacanaṃ bhavitumarahati. Tañhi jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādito muccitukāmehi dhavitabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:911_3: gantabbanti dhuvaṃ, uppādavayābhāvena vā niccasabhāvattā dhavati thiraṃ sassataṃ
anya-e0804n:911_4: bhavatīti dhuvaṃ. Yañhi sandhāya bhagavatā “dhuvañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi dhuvagāminiñca
anya-e0804n:911_5: paṭipada”nti vuttaṃ. Dhuvasaddo “vacanaṃ dhuvasassata”nti ettha thire vattati. “Dhuvañca
anya-e0804n:911_6: bhikkhave desessāmī”ti ettha nibbāne. “Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti ettha pana ekaṃse
anya-e0804n:912: Dhū vidhūnane. Ūkārassa ūvattaṃ. Dhūvati. Dhūvitā, dhūvitabbaṃ. Rassatte “dhuto, dhutavā” iccapi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:914_0: Ettha ca dhenūti dhayati pivati ito khīraṃ potakoti dhenu, “godhenu, assadhenu, migadhenū”ti
anya-e0804n:914_1: dhenusaddo sāmaññavasena sapotikāsu tiracchānagatitthīsu vattati, evaṃ santepi yebhuyyena
anya-e0804n:914_2: gāviyaṃ vattati. Tathā hi “satta dhenusate datvā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:915_0: Sidhu gatiyaṃ sedhati, nisedhati, paṭisedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, nisiddho, paṭisiddho,
anya-e0804n:915_1: paṭisedhito, paṭisedhako, paṭisedho, paṭisedhituṃ, paṭisedhitvā. Idha acinteyyabalattā
anya-e0804n:915_2: upasaggānaṃ taṃyoge sidhudhātussa nānappakārā atthā sambhavanti, aññesampi evameva.
anya-e0804n:916: Sidhu satthe maṅgalye ca. Satthaṃ sāsanaṃ, maṅgalyaṃ pāpavināsanaṃ vuddhikāraṇaṃ vā. Sedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, pasiddhi.
anya-e0804n:917_0: Dadha dhāraṇe. Janassa tuṭṭhiṃ dadhateti dadhi. Dhakārassa hakāratte “dahatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:917_1: Ayaṃ itthī imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ dahati. Ime purisā imaṃ purisaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti.
anya-e0804n:918: Edha vuddhiyaṃ lābhe ca. Edhati. Edho, sukhedhito. Gambhīre gādhamedhati.
anya-e0804n:919: Ettha ca edhoti edhati. Vaḍḍhati etena pāvakoti edho. Indanaṃ, upādānaṃ. Sukhedhitoti sukhena edhito, sukhasaṃvaḍḍhitoti attho. Gādhamedhatīti gādhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ edhati labhati.
anya-e0804n:920: Baddha saṃharise. Saṃhariso vinibaddhakriyā. Baddhati, vinibaddhati. Vinibaddhā.
anya-e0804n:921: Gādha patiṭṭhānissayagandhesu. Gādhati. Gādhaṃ kattā. Gambhīrato agādhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:922: Bādha viloḷane bādhati, vibādhati. Ābādho. Ābādhati cittaṃ viloḷetīti ābādho.
anya-e0804n:924: Bandha bandhane bandhati. Bandhanako, bandho, bandhāpito, paṭibandho, bandhanaṃ, bandho, sambandhanaṃ, sambandho, pabandho, bandhu.
anya-e0804n:925_0: Tattha bandhananti bandhanti satte etenāti bandhanaṃ, saṅkhalikādi. “Ayaṃ amhākaṃ
anya-e0804n:925_1: vaṃso”ti sambandhitabbaṭṭhena bandhu, theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “pemabandhanena bandhū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:926: Dadhi asīghacāre. Asīghacāro asīghappavatti. Dandhati. Dandho, dandhapañño. Yo dandhakāle tarati, taraṇīye ca dandhati.
anya-e0804n:927: Vaddha vaddhane. Vaddhati. Vaddhi, vuddhi, vaddho, vuddho, jātivuddho, guṇavuddho, vayovuddho.
anya-e0804n:929: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e0804n:934_0: Medha hiṃsāyaṃ saṅgame ca. Medhati. Medhā, medhāvī. Atra medhāti asani viya siluccaye
anya-e0804n:934_1: kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Medhati vā siriyā sīlādīhi ca sappurisadhammehi saha
anya-e0804n:934_2: gacchati na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatīti medhā, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:939: Vuttaṃ. Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya ca samannāgato puggalo.
anya-e0804n:940: Sadhu madhu unde. Sadhati. Madhati. Madhu.
anya-e0804n:941_0: Budha bodhane. Bodhati. Buddho. Abhisambuddhāno. Sambuddhaṃ. Asambuddhaṃ. Bodhi.
anya-e0804n:941_1: Divādigaṇepi ayaṃ dissati. Tatrahi “bujjhatī”ti rūpaṃ, idha pana “bodhatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:941_2: “Yo nindaṃ apabodhatī”ti pāḷi dissati. Kārite pana “bodheti” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:942: Yudha sampahāre. Yodhati. Yodho. Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena. Yuddhaṃ. Caraṇāyudho, caraṇāvudho vā. Āvudhaṃ. Divādigaṇikassa panassa “yujjhatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:943: Dīdhi dittivedhanesu. Dīdhati. Dīdhiti. Ettha ca dīdhitīti rasmi. Anekāni hi rasmināmāni.
anya-e0804n:944: Rasmi ābhā pabhā raṃsi, ditti bhā ruci dīdhiti;
anya-e0804n:945: Marīci juti bhāṇva’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo;
anya-e0804n:949_0: Nī naye. Neti, nayati, vineti. Vineyya hadaye daraṃ. Āneti. Ānayati. Netā. Vinetā.
anya-e0804n:949_1: Nāyako. Neyyo. Veneyyo. Venayiko. Vinīto puriso. Nīyamāne pisācena, kinnu tāta udikkhati.
anya-e0804n:949_2: Nīyanto. Nettaṃ. Netti. Bhavanetti samūhatā. Nettiko. Udakañhi nayanti nettikā. Nettā.
anya-e0804n:949_3: Nette ujuṃ gate sati. Nayo. Vinayo. Āyatanaṃ. Netuṃ. Vinetuṃ. Netvā. Vinetvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:950_0: Tattha nettanti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nettaṃ, cakkhu. Nettīti nenti
anya-e0804n:950_1: etāya satteti netti, rajju. Bhavanettīti bhavarajju, taṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tāya hi sattā
anya-e0804n:950_2: goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ niyyanti, tasmā bhavanettīti vuccati. Nettikāti
anya-e0804n:950_3: kassakā. Nettāti gavajeṭṭhako yūthapati. Nayoti nayanaṃ gamanaṃ nayo, pāḷigati. Atha
anya-e0804n:950_4: vā tattha tattha netabboti nayo, sadisabhāvena netabbākāro. Nīyatīti nayo, tathattanayādi.
anya-e0804n:951_0: Tathā hi chabbidho nayo tathattanayo pattinayo desanānayo antadvayavivajjananayo
anya-e0804n:951_1: acinteyyanayo adhippāyanayoti. Tesu tathattanayo antadvayavivajjananayena nīyati,
anya-e0804n:951_2: pattinayo acinteyyanayena, desanānayo adhippāyanayena nīyati. Etthādimhi tividho
anya-e0804n:951_3: nayo kammasādhanena nīyatīti “nayo”ti vuccati, pacchimo pana tividho nayo karaṇasādhanena
anya-e0804n:951_4: nīyati etena tathattādinayattayamiti “nayo”ti vuccati. Imasmiṃ atthe papañciyamāne
anya-e0804n:952: Aparopi catubbidho nayo ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṃdhammatānayoti.
anya-e0804n:953_0: Vineti satte ettha, etenāti vā vinayo. Kāyavācānaṃ vinayanatopi vinayo. Āyatananti
anya-e0804n:953_1: anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayateva
anya-e0804n:954: Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro. “Āyatananti assānaṃ kambojo āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyaanaṃ nāma. “Manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā.
anya-e0804n:955_0: Chāyaṃ chāyatthino yanti, phalatthaṃ phalabhojino”ti ettha samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Pañcimāni
anya-e0804n:955_1: bhikkhave vimuttāyatanānī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. Aññepi pana payogā yata patiyataneti ettha pakāsitā.
anya-e0804n:958: Thana pana dhana sadde. Thanati. Panati. Dhanati.
anya-e0804n:960_0: Ettha ca yobbanibhāve ṭhitattā rūpavilāsena kanati dippati virocatīti kaññā. Atha
anya-e0804n:960_1: vā kaniyati kāmiyabhi abhipatthiyati purisehītipi kaññā, yobbanitthī. Kanakanti kanati,
anya-e0804n:960_2: kanīyatīti vā kanakaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Suvaṇṇassa hi anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n:961: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ hemaṃ, kañcanaṃ haṭakampi ca;
anya-e0804n:964: Vana sana sambhattiyaṃ. Vanati. Vanaṃ. Sanati.
anya-e0804n:965: Tattha vananti. Taṃ sambhajanti mayūrakokilādayo sattāti vanaṃ, araññaṃ. Vanati sambhajati saṃkilesapuggalanti vanaṃ, taṇhā.
anya-e0804n:969: Ettha ca “kasmā te eko bhujo janati, eko te na janatī bhujo”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha janatīti sunati saddaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n:970: Khanu avadāraṇe khanati. Sukhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ. Khato āvāṭo.
anya-e0804n:971_0: Tattha sukhanti suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ. Duṭṭhu khanati kāyikacetasikasukhanti
anya-e0804n:971_1: dukkhaṃ. Aññamaññapaṭipakkhā hi ete dhammā. Dvidhā cittaṃ khanatīti vā dukkhaṃ. Curādigaṇavasena
anya-e0804n:971_2: pana “sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, dukkhayatīti dukkha”nti nibbacanāni gahetabbāni. Samāsapaavasena
anya-e0804n:971_3: “sukaraṃ khamassāti sukhaṃ, dukkaraṃ khamassāti dukkha”nti nibbacanānipi vividhā
anya-e0804n:974_0: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu. Ettha pana hiṃsāvacanena pharusāya vācāya pīḷanañca daṇḍādīhi paharaṇañca
anya-e0804n:974_1: gahitaṃ, tasmā hana hiṃsāpaharaṇagatīsūti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi “rājāno coraṃ
anya-e0804n:974_2: gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā”ti. Pāṭhassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentehi “haneyyunti potheyyuñceva
anya-e0804n:974_3: chindeyyuñcā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca chedanaṃ nāma hatthapādādichedanaṃ vā sīsacchedavasena
anya-e0804n:974_4: māraṇaṃ vā. Hanassa vadhādeso ghātādeso ca bhavati, hanti hanati, hananti. Hanasi,
anya-e0804n:975_0: Hiṃsādayo cattāro atthā labbhanti. “Hanti hatthehi pādehī”ti ettha pana hantīti paharatīti
anya-e0804n:975_1: attho. “Kuddho hi pitaraṃ hanti. Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ vara”nti.
anya-e0804n:975_2: Ettha hantīti mārentīti attho. “Vadhati, vadheti, ghāteti” iccapi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:975_3: Tattha “vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:975_4: vadho paharaṇaṃ. Pāṇaṃ vadheti. Pāṇavadho. “Esa vadho khaṇḍahālassa. Satte ghātetī”ti
anya-e0804n:976_0: “Upāhanaṃ, vadhū”ti ca ettha hanavadhasaddatthogamanaṃ. “Purisaṃ hanati. Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ
anya-e0804n:976_1: paṭihanati” iccādīni kattupadāni. Devadatto yaññadattena haññati. Tato vātātape ghore,
anya-e0804n:976_3: padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, iccādīni kammapadāni. Hantā. Hato. Vadhako. Vadhū. Āghāto.
anya-e0804n:976_4: Upaghāto. Ghātako. Paṭigho. Saṅgho. Byaggho. Sakuṇagghi. Hantuṃ, hanituṃ, hantvā,
anya-e0804n:976_5: hanitvā. Vajjhetvā, vadhitvā iccādīni sanāmikāni tumantādipadāni.
anya-e0804n:977_0: Tattha upāhananti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upahananti upagacchanti tato ca āhananti āgacchanti
anya-e0804n:977_1: etenāti upāhanaṃ. Vadhūti kilesavasena sunakhampi upagamanasīlāti vadhū, sabbāsaṃ
anya-e0804n:977_2: itthīnaṃ sādhāraṇametaṃ. Atha vā vadhūti suṇisā. Tathā hi “tena hi vadhu yadā utunī
anya-e0804n:977_3: ahosi, pupphaṃ te uppannaṃ, atha me āroceyyāsī”ti ettha vadhūti suṇisā vuccati. Sā
anya-e0804n:977_4: pana “ayaṃ no puttassa bhariyā”ti sassusasurehi adhigantabbā jānitabbāti vadhūti
anya-e0804n:977_5: vuccati. Gatyatthānaṃ katthaci buddhiyatthakathanato ayamattho labbhateva. “Suṇhā,
anya-e0804n:977_6: suṇisā, vadhū” iccete pariyāyā. Saṅghoti bhikkhusamūho. Samaggaṃ kammaṃ samupagacchatīti
anya-e0804n:977_7: saṅgho, suṭṭhu vā kilese hanti tena tena maggāsinā māretītipi saṅgho, puthujjanāriyavasena
anya-e0804n:977_8: vuttānetāni. Vividhe satte āhanati bhuso ghātetīti byaggho. So eva “viyaggho, vaggho”ti
anya-e0804n:977_9: ca vuccati. Aparampi puṇḍarīkoti tassa nāmaṃ. Dubbale sakuṇe hantīti sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0804n:977_10: seno, ayaṃ pana hanadhātu divādigaṇe “paṭihaññatī”ti akammakaṃ kattupadaṃ janeti.
anya-e0804n:977_11: Tathā hi “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī”tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n:978_0: Ana pāṇane. Pāṇanaṃ sasanaṃ. Anati. Ānaṃ, pānaṃ. “Tattha ānanti assāso. Pānanti passāso.
anya-e0804n:978_1: Etesu assāsoti bahi nikkhamanavāto. Passāsoti anto pavisanavāto”ti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:978_2: vuttaṃ, suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana uppaṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ. Tattha yasmā sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
anya-e0804n:978_3: mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati, pacchā bāhiravāto
anya-e0804n:978_4: sukhumaṃ rajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyati, tasmā vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:978_5: “assāsoti bahi nikkhamanavāto, passāsoti anto pavisanavāto”ti vuttaṃ. Etesu dvīsu
anya-e0804n:978_6: nayesu vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ assāso, bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ passāso. Suttantanayena
anya-e0804n:978_7: pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso. Anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato passāso.
anya-e0804n:978_8: Ayameva ca nayo “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena
anya-e0804n:978_9: cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti, “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0804n:978_10: satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti
anya-e0804n:978_11: iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:979_0: Dhana dhaññe. Dhananaṃ dhaññaṃ, siripuññapaññānaṃ sampadāti attho. Dhātuattho hi
anya-e0804n:979_1: yebhuyyena bhāvavasena kathiyati ṭhapetvā vakkarukkhataceti evamādippabhedaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0804n:979_2: bhāvatthe vattamānena yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa yyakāraṃ katvā thenanaṃ theyyanti
anya-e0804n:979_3: vuccati, evamidha yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa ññakāraṃ katvā dhananaṃ dhaññanti
anya-e0804n:979_4: vuccati. Dhanino vā bhāvo dhaññaṃ, tasmiṃ dhaññe. Dhanti, dhanati. Dhanitaṃ. Dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:979_5: Yasmā pana dhaññasaddena siripuññapaññāsampadā gahitā, tasmā “dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ
anya-e0804n:979_6: puttaṃ vijāyī”tiādīsu dhaññasaddena siripaññāva gahetabbā puññassa visuṃ vacanato.
anya-e0804n:981: Ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava.
anya-e0804n:983: Ye pāde paṇamissanti, tepi dhaññā guṇandhara.
anya-e0804n:986_0: Evamādīsu pana dhaññasaddena puññasampadā gahetabbā, puññasampadāya vā saddhiṃ siripaññāsampadāpi
anya-e0804n:986_1: gahetabbā. Idamettha nibbacanaṃ “dhaññaṃ siripuññapaññāsampadā etesaṃ atthīti dhaññā”ti.
anya-e0804n:986_2: “Dhaññaṃ maṅgalasammata”nti ettha tu “uttamaratanaṃ ida”nti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddhāyitabbanti
anya-e0804n:986_3: dhaññaṃ, sirisampannaṃ puññasampannaṃ paññāsampannantipi attho yujjati. “Dhaññaṃ
anya-e0804n:986_4: dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpa”nti ca ādīsu “natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhana”nti vacanato dhanāyitabbanti
anya-e0804n:986_5: dhaññaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Pubbaṇṇaṃ. Apica osadhivisesopi dhaññanti vuccati. Dhanasaddassa
anya-e0804n:986_6: ca pana samāsavasena “adhano, niddhano”ti ca natthi dhanaṃ etassāti atthena daliddapuggalo
anya-e0804n:986_7: vuccati. “Nidhanaṃ yātī”tiettha tu kampanatthavācakassa dhūdhātussa vasena vināso
anya-e0804n:988: Cine maññanāyaṃ. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, yathā gile, yathā ca mile. Cināyati, ocināyati. “Sabbo taṃ jano ocināyatū”ti idamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Ocināyatati avamaññatūti.
anya-e0804n:993: Pā pāne. Pānaṃ pivanaṃ. “Pāti, pānti. Pātu, pāntu” iccādi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:994: Khippaṃ gīvaṃ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0804n:995: Ayañhite mayā rūḷho, saro pāssati lohitanti.
anya-e0804n:996_0: Atra hi pāssatīti pivissati. “Pāssati, pāssanti. Pāssasi, pāssatha. Pāssāmi, pāssāma”
anya-e0804n:996_1: iccādinā, “apassā, apassaṃsu” iccādinā ca nayena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:996_2: Ko hi samattho sabbāni buddhavacanasāgare vicitrāni vippakiṇṇarūpantararatanāni uddharitvā
anya-e0804n:996_3: dassetuṃ, tasmā sabbāsupi dhātūsu saṅkhepena gahaṇūpāyamattameva dassitaṃ. Pivati,
anya-e0804n:996_4: pivanti. Pivaṃ, pivanto, pivamāno, pivaṃ bhāgirasodakaṃ. Kārite kumāraṃ khīraṃ pāyeti.
anya-e0804n:996_5: Muhuttaṃ taṇhāsamanaṃ, khīraṃ tvaṃ pāyito mayā. Kamme pīyati, pītaṃ. Tumādīsu “pātuṃ,
anya-e0804n:996_6: pivituṃ, pitvā, pivitvā, pāyetvā” iccādīni yojetabbāni. Aññesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena
anya-e0804n:997: Pā rakkhaṇe. Pāti. Nipāti. Pitā, gopo.
anya-e0804n:999_0: Vippoti brāhmaṇo. So hi vippeti pūreti visiṭṭhena veduccāraṇādinā attano brāhmaṇakammena
anya-e0804n:999_1: lokassa ajjhāsayaṃ attano ca hadaye vedānīti vippoti vuccati. “Jāto vippakule aha”nti
anya-e0804n:999_2: ettha hi brāhmaṇo “vippo”ti vuccati. Tassa kulaṃ vippakulanti.
anya-e0804n:1000: Pū pavane. Pavati. Putto, puññaṃ. Ettha puttoti attano kulaṃ pavati sodhetīti putto. Kiyādigaṇaṃ pana patvā “punātī”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1011_0: Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. “Puttī, dhītā, duhitā, attajā”ti iccete pariyāyā. Evaṃ atrajāti
anya-e0804n:1011_1: itthivācakassa itthiliṅgassa dassanato sutasaddādīsupi itthiliṅganayo labbhamānālabbhamānavasena
anya-e0804n:1011_2: upaparikkhitabbo. Tathā hi loke “vesso, suddo, naro, kiṃpuriso” iccādīnaṃ yugaḷabhāvena
anya-e0804n:1011_3: “vessī, suddī, nārī, kiṃpurisī”tiādīni itthivācakāni liṅgāni dissanti. “Puriso pumā”
anya-e0804n:1011_4: iccādīnaṃ pana yugaḷabhāvena itthivācakāni itthiliṅgāni na dissanti. Puññanti ettha
anya-e0804n:1011_5: pana attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ. Kiyādigaṇaṃ pana patvā punātīti puññanti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1014: Paraṃ pujjabhavaṃ janetīti puññaṃ. Sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti puññaṃ. Janaṃ attakāraṃ punātīti puññaṃ. Asesaṃ apuññaṃ punātīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1017_0: Pe gatiyaṃ. Peti, penti. Pesi, petha. Idha bhikkhave ekacco assakhaḷuṅko pehīti vutto
anya-e0804n:1017_1: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭisakkati, piṭṭhito rathaṃ paṭivatteti.
anya-e0804n:1018_0: Pe vuddhiyaṃ payati. Pāyo, apāyo. Ettha apāyoti natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo.
anya-e0804n:1018_1: Ayadhātuvasenapi attho netabbo, ayato vuddhito, sukhato vā apetoti apāyo, nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayaasurakāyā.
anya-e0804n:1019: Pe sosane. Pāyati, payati vā. Nipako. Ettha nipako nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, sampajāno.
anya-e0804n:1022: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
anya-e0804n:1028: Gupa gopanajigucchanesu. Gopati, jigucchati. Jigucchaṃ, jigucchamāno. Jegucchī. Jigucchitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:1030: Kapu sāmatthiye. Idaṃ amhākaṃ kappati. Netaṃ amhesu kappati.
anya-e0804n:1031: Kapa karuṇāyaṃ. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṃ. Tattha kapatīti karuṇāyati, kāpaññanti kapaṇabhāvo.
anya-e0804n:1032: Sapa akkose. Sapati. Sapatho, abhisapatho, abhisapito, sapanako.
anya-e0804n:1033: Vapa bījanikkhepe. Bījaṃ vapati. Vāpako. Vāpitaṃ dhaññaṃ. Vuttaṃ bījaṃ purisena. Bījaṃ vappati. Vappamaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1034: Supa sayane. Supati. Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṃ, suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1035: Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ. Khepati. Khepako.
anya-e0804n:1036: Khipa abyattasadde. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṃ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
anya-e0804n:1037: Khipa chaḍḍano. Khipati, ukkhipati, vikkhipati, avakhipati, saṃkhipati. Khittaṃ, ukkhittaṃ, pakkhittaṃ, vikkhittaṃ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:1038: Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṃ kheḷapātanaṃ. Opati. Osadhaṃ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṃ opi.
anya-e0804n:1039: Lipi upalepe. Lepati. Littaṃ paramena tejasā.
anya-e0804n:1042_0: Nidapi nidampane. Nidampanaṃ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṃ vā varakasīsaṃ vā acchinditvā
anya-e0804n:1042_1: khuddakasākhaṃ vā abhañjitvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva
anya-e0804n:1042_2: vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṃ. Puriso vīhisīsaṃ nidampati, rukkhapattaṃ nidampati.
anya-e0804n:1043: Tapa dittiyaṃ. Ditti virocanaṃ. Divā tapatiādicco.
anya-e0804n:1044: Tapa ubbege. Ubbego utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṃ, ottappiyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1045: Tapa dhūpa santāpe. Tapati. Tapodhanaṃ, ātāpo. Ātāpī. Ātapaṃ. Dhūpati, sandhūpano, kamme tāpiyati. Dhūpiyati. Bhāve tāpanaṃ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1048_0: Puppha vikasane. Akammako cāyaṃ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṃ, pupphanaṃ, pupphito,
anya-e0804n:1048_1: pupphituṃ, pupphitvā. Pupphanti pupphino dumā. Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti
anya-e0804n:1048_2: tāvade. Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati.
anya-e0804n:1050: Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṃ. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
anya-e0804n:1058: Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṃ. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
anya-e0804n:1059: Abba sabba hiṃsāyañca. Gatyāpekkhāya cakāro. Abbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n:1061: Lubi tubi addane. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṃ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.
anya-e0804n:1062_0: Cubi vadanasaṃyoge. Puttaṃ muddhani cumbati. Mukhe cumbati. Ettha siyā “yadi vadanasaṃyoge
anya-e0804n:1062_1: cubidhātu vattati, kathaṃ ambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe
anya-e0804n:1062_2: ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vutta”nti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena
anya-e0804n:1062_3: sambhavaṃ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ, yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena
anya-e0804n:1062_4: sambhūtattā “rodante dārake disvā, ubbiddhā vipulā dumā”ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṃ
anya-e0804n:1062_5: dassanaṃ vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:1062_6: cumbanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṃ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi, saviññāṇakānaṃyeva
anya-e0804n:1062_7: tāni hontīti. Ayaṃ nayo kamu padavikkhepetiādīsupi netabbo.
anya-e0804n:1063_0: Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthā. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā.
anya-e0804n:1063_1: Dhubbati. Ettha dubbāti dabbatiṇaṃ, yaṃ “tiriyā nāma tiṇajātī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ.
anya-e0804n:1063_2: Ettha ca dubbāti itthiliṅgaṃ, dabbanti napuṃsakaliṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1066_0: Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati. Etta siyā “nanu bho pubbasabbasaddā
anya-e0804n:1066_1: sabbanāmāni, kasmā panete dhātucintāyaṃ gahitā”ti? Vuccate – sabbanāmesu ca tumantādivirahitesu
anya-e0804n:1066_2: ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi, imāni pana sabbanāmāni na honti.
anya-e0804n:1066_3: Kevalaṃ sutisāmaññena sabbanāmāni viya upaṭṭhahanti, tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:1066_4: pubbācariyehi gahitā “pubbati sabbatī”ti payogadassanatoti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā buddhavacane
anya-e0804n:1066_5: etāni rūpāni na santīti? Anāgamanabhāvena na santi, na avijjamānabhāvena. Kiñcāpi
anya-e0804n:1066_6: buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi, tathāpi porāṇehi anumatā purāṇabhāsāti gahetabbāni,
anya-e0804n:1066_7: yathā “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha “nāthatī”ti rūpaṃ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:1066_8: hoti, evaṃ imānipi. Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṃ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā
anya-e0804n:1066_9: lokikappayogā gahetabbāti “pubbati sabbatī”ti rūpāni gahitāni. Esa nayo aññesupi ṭhānesu veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:1068: Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
anya-e0804n:1069: Abi dabi sadde. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.
anya-e0804n:1070_0: Labi avasaṃsane. Avasaṃsanaṃ avalambanaṃ. Lambati, vilambati, byālambati. Nīce co’lambate
anya-e0804n:1070_1: sūriyo. Ālambati. Ālambanaṃ, tadālambanaṃ, tadālambaṇaṃ, tadālambaṃ vā. Lābu. Alābu
anya-e0804n:1073: Bhā dittiyaṃ. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṃ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṃ. Vibhātā ratti.
anya-e0804n:1074: Bhī bhaye. Bhāyati. Bhayaṃ, bhayānako, bhīmo, bhīmaseno, bhīru, bhīruko, bhīrukajātiko. Kārite “bhāyeti, bhāyayati, bhāyāpeti, bhāyāpayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:1076: Sumbha bhāsane ca. Cakāro hiṃsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
anya-e0804n:1077: Ettha sumbhoti āvāṭo. “Sumbhaṃ nikkhanāhī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Kusumbhoti khuddakaāvāṭo, “pabbatakandarapadarasākhāparipūrā kusumbhe paripūrentī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1078: Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṃ. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.
anya-e0804n:1079_0: Ettha abbhoti megho. So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti “abbho”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1079_1: “Vijjumālī satakkakū”ti vuttaṃ. Satakkakūti ca anekasatapaṭalo. Ettha ca abbhasaddo
anya-e0804n:1079_2: tiliṅgiko daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi ayaṃ “abbhuṭṭhitova sa yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti
anya-e0804n:1079_3: ettha pulliṅgo. “Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhū”ti ettha itthiliṅgo. “Abbhāni candamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0804n:1081: Megho valāhako laṅghi, jīmūto ambudo ghano;
anya-e0804n:1083: Yabha methune. Mithunassa janadvayassa idaṃ kammaṃ methūnaṃ, tasmiṃ methune yabhadhātu vattati. Yabhati. Yābhassaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1084_0: Ettha ca “methuna”nti esā sabbhivācā, lajjāsampannehi puggalehi vattabbabhāsābhāvato.
anya-e0804n:1084_1: Tathā hi “methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo”ti ca “na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti
anya-e0804n:1084_2: methuno”ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṃ bhāsā āgatā. “Yabhatī”tiādikā pana bhāsā “sikharaṇī”tiādikā
anya-e0804n:1084_3: bhāsā viya asambhivācā. Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
anya-e0804n:1084_4: Evaṃ santepi adhimattukkaṃsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo
anya-e0804n:1084_5: lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi. Aho tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāti.
anya-e0804n:1087: Byathayo gāmadhammo ca, yābhassaṃ mohanaṃ rati.
anya-e0804n:1091: Debha abhi dabhi sadde. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
anya-e0804n:1092: Ettha ca ambho vuccati udakaṃ. Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṃ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṃ ambhati saddaṃ karotīti ambhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1094: Pānīyaṃ udakaṃ toyaṃ, jalaṃ pāto ca ambu ca;
anya-e0804n:1095: Dakaṃ kaṃ salilaṃ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
anya-e0804n:1096: Nīrañca kepukaṃ pāni, amataṃ elameva ca,
anya-e0804n:1098: Ettha ca “vālaggesu ca kepuke. Pivitañca tesaṃ bhusaṃ hoti pānī”tiādayo payogā dassetabbā.
anya-e0804n:1099: Thabhi khabhi paṭibaddhe thambhati, vitthambhati. Khambhati, vikkhambhati. Thambho. Thaddho, upatthambho. Upatthambhinī. Vikkhambho. Vikkhambhitakileso.
anya-e0804n:1100: Jabha jabhi gattavināme. Jabhati. Jambhati, vijambhati. Vijambhanaṃ, vijambhitā. Vijambhanto, vijambhamāno, vijambhito.
anya-e0804n:1104_0: Ettha gabbhoti mātukucchipi vuccati kucchigataputtopi. Tathā hi “yamekarattiṃ paṭhamaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1104_1: gabbhe vasati māṇavo”ti ettha mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuccati. “Gabbho me deva patiṭṭhito.
anya-e0804n:1104_2: Gabbho ca patito chamā”ti ca ettha pana kucchigataputto. Apica gabbhoti āvāsaviseso.
anya-e0804n:1105: Rabha rābhasse. Āpubbo rabha hiṃsākaraṇavāyamanesu. Rābhassaṃ rābhasabhāvo. Taṃsamaṅgino pana pāḷiyaṃ “caṇḍā ruddhā rabhasā”ti evaṃ āgatā.
anya-e0804n:1106_0: Tattha rabhasāti karaṇuttariyā. Rabhati, ārabhati, samārabhati, ārambhati. Rabhaso.
anya-e0804n:1106_1: Ārambho. Samārambho, ārabhanto. Samārabhanto. Āraddhaṃ me vīriyaṃ. Sārambhaṃ. Anārambhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1106_2: Sārambho te na vijjati. Pakāraṇārambho. Vīriyārambho. Ārabhituṃ. Ārabhitvā. Ārabbha.
anya-e0804n:1107: Ettha vīriyārambhoti vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho. Ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kriyāya vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
anya-e0804n:1110_0: Ettha hi kammaṃ ārambhoti āgataṃ. “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
anya-e0804n:1110_1: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphallā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikriyā. “Ārambhatha
anya-e0804n:1110_2: nikkamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti ettha vīriyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:1110_3: ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā. “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n:1113: Labha lābhe. Labhati, labbhati. Lābho, laddhaṃ, alattha, alatthuṃ.
anya-e0804n:1114: Subha dittiyaṃ. Sobhati. Sobhā, sobhanaṃ, sobhito.
anya-e0804n:1115: Khubha sañcalane. Khobhati, saṅkhobhati. Hatthināge padinnamhi, khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā. Khobhā, saṅkhobho.
anya-e0804n:1118_0: Lubha vimohane. Lobhati, palobhati. Thullakumārīpalobhanaṃ. Kārite pana “lobheti,
anya-e0804n:1118_1: palobheti, palobhetvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti. Divādigaṇaṃ pana patvā giddhiyatthe “lubbhatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:1120: Rubhi nivāraṇe. Rumbhati, sannirumbhati. Sannirumbho, sannirumbhitvā.
anya-e0804n:1121: Ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe. Ubhati. Ubbhati. Umbhati. Ubhanā. Ubbhanā. Umbhanā. Obho. Keṭubhaṃ. Ubbhaṃ. Kumbho. Kumbhī. Kārite “obheti. Ubbheti. Umbhetī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1122_0: Tattha keṭubhanti kriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakāriyasatthaṃ. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:1122_1: kiṭeti gameti kriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato keṭento gamento obheti
anya-e0804n:1122_2: pūretīti keṭutaṃ kiṭaubhadhātuvasena. Ubbhati ubbheti pūretīti ubbhaṃ, pūraṇanti
anya-e0804n:1122_3: attho. Cariyāpiṭakepi hi īdisī saddagati dissati, taṃ yathā? “Mahādānaṃ pavattesi,
anya-e0804n:1122_4: accubbhaṃ sāgarūpama”nti. Tattha ca accubbhanti ativiya yācakānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1122_5: Akkhumbhantipi pāṭho. Kumbhoti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena ubbhetabboti kumbho, so eva
anya-e0804n:1122_6: itthiliṅgavasena kumbhī. Ettha ca “kumbhī dhovati onato”ti payogo.
anya-e0804n:1127: Mā māne sadde ca. Māti. Mātā. Ettha mātāti janikā vā cūḷamātā vā mahāmātā vā.
anya-e0804n:1128: Mū bandhane. Mavati. Kiyādigaṇassa panassa “munātī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1130_0: Ettha medhāti paññā. Sā hi sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti
anya-e0804n:1130_1: cāti medhāti vuccati. Ettha pana metīti gaṇhāti. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ “asani
anya-e0804n:1130_2: viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā”ti.
anya-e0804n:1130_3: Saṅgamatthavācakassa pana medhadhātussa vasena medhati sīlasamādhiādīhi saddhammehi
anya-e0804n:1130_4: siriyā ca saṅgacchatīti medhāti attho gahetabbo. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:1133: Omā sāmatthiye. Sāmatthiyaṃ samatthabhāvo. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, omāti, omanti.
anya-e0804n:1134: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “omāti bhante bhagavā iddhiyā manomayena kāyena brahmalokaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti. Tattha omātīti pahoti sakkoti.
anya-e0804n:1135: Timu addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Temati. Tinto, temiyo. Temitukāmā temiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:1136: Ettha temiyoti evaṃnāmako kāsirañño putto bodhisatto. So hi rañño ceva mahājanassa ca hadayaṃ temento addabhāvaṃ pāpento sītalabhāvaṃ janento jātoti “temiyo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1137: Nitami kilamane. Nitammati. Hadayaṃ dayhate nitammāmi.
anya-e0804n:1138: Camu chamu japu jhamu umu jimu adane. Camati. Camū. Camūti senā. Chamati. Jamati. Jhamati. Umati. Jemati.
anya-e0804n:1139_0: Kamu padavikkhepe. Padavikkhepo padasā gamanaṃ. Idaṃ pana vohārasīsamattaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1139_1: tasmā “nāssa kāye aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamatī”tiādīsu apadavikkhepatthopi
anya-e0804n:1139_2: gahetabbo. Kamati. Caṅkamati, atikkamati. Abhikkamati. Paṭikkamati. Pakkamati. Parakkamati.
anya-e0804n:1139_3: Vikkamati. Nikkamati. Saṅkamati. Saṅkamanaṃ. Saṅkanti. Kamanaṃ. Caṅkamanaṃ. Atikkamo.
anya-e0804n:1139_4: Abhikkamo. Paṭikkamo. Pakkamo. Vikkamo. Nikkamo. Atikkanto puriso. Abhikkantā ratti.
anya-e0804n:1139_5: Nikkhamati. Abhinikkhamati. Kārite nikkhāmeti. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Yasmā panāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:1139_6: dhātu curādigaṇaṃ patvā icchākanti yatthesu vattati, tasmā tepi atthe upasaggavisesite
anya-e0804n:1139_7: katvā idha abhikkantasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari curādigaṇeyeva kathessāma.
anya-e0804n:1140: Yamu uparame. Uparamo viramanaṃ. Yamabhi. Yamo. “Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Tattha yamāmaseti uparamāma, nassāma, marāmāti attho.
anya-e0804n:1141: Nama bahutte sadde. Bahutto saddo nāma uggatasaddo. Namati.
anya-e0804n:1142: Ama dama hamma mima chama gatimhi. Amati. Damati. Hammati. Mimati. Chamati. Chamā.
anya-e0804n:1143_0: Chamāti pathavī. Chamāsaddo itthiliṅgo daṭṭhabbo, “na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa
anya-e0804n:1143_1: agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti ca “chamāyaṃ parivattāmi vāricarova
anya-e0804n:1143_2: ghamme”ti ca payogadassanato. So ca kho sattahi aṭṭhahi vā vibhattīhi dvīsu ca vacanesu
anya-e0804n:1144_0: Dhama saddaggisaṃ yogesu. Dhamadhātu sadde ca mukhavātena saddhiṃ aggisaṃyoge ca
anya-e0804n:1144_1: vattati. Tattha paṭhamatthe “saṅkhaṃ dhamati. Saṅkhadhamako. Bheriṃ dhamati. Bheridhamako.
anya-e0804n:1144_2: Dhame dhame nātidhame”ti payogo. Dutiyatthe “aggiṃ dhamati. Samuṭṭhāpeti attānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1146_0: Namu namane. Namati. Namo. Nataṃ, namanaṃ. Nati. Namaṃ. Namamāno. Namanto. Namito.
anya-e0804n:1146_1: Nāmaṃ. Nāmitaṃ. Namituṃ. Natvā, natvāna. Namitvā, namitvāna, namituna. Kārite “nāmeti,
anya-e0804n:1146_2: nāmayati. Nāmetvā. Nāmayitvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tatra hi “namati namitvā”ti evaṃpakārāni
anya-e0804n:1146_3: padāni namanatthe vandanāyañca daṭṭhabbāni, “namo natvā”ti evaṃpakārāni pana vandanāyameva.
anya-e0804n:1151_0: Ettha namoti padaṃ nipātesupi labbhati. Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni
anya-e0804n:1151_1: dissanti “devarāja namo tyatthu. Namo katvā mahesino”ti. Upasaggehipi ayaṃ yojetabbā
anya-e0804n:1152: Khamu sahane. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṃ, evaṃ bhāve. Kattari pana “khantā. Khamitā. Khamo hoti sītassapi uṇhassapī”ti payogā.
anya-e0804n:1158: Gamu gatiyaṃ. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṃ. Kārite “gameti, gamayati, gacchāpetī”tiādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1159_0: Ramu kīḷāyaṃ. Ramati. Viramati. Paṭiviramati. Uparamati. Ārati. Virati. Paṭivirati.
anya-e0804n:1159_1: Uparati. Veramaṇi. Viramaṇaṃ. Rati. Ramaṇaṃ. Rato. Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.
anya-e0804n:1161: Dhīratthu taṃ visaṃ vantaṃ, yamahaṃ jīvitakāraṇā;
anya-e0804n:1162: Vantaṃ paccāvamissāmi, mataṃ me jīvitā varaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1163_0: Tattha vammikoti vamatīti, vantakoti, vantussayoti, vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n:1163_1: So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi
anya-e0804n:1163_2: vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi
anya-e0804n:1163_3: porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ
anya-e0804n:1163_4: deve vassantepi na vippakirayati, nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā
anya-e0804n:1163_5: pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati, evaṃ vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n:1164_0: Ettha pana “bhagavā, himavā”tiādīni padāni na kevalaṃ vantupaccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni,
anya-e0804n:1164_1: atha kho vamudhātuvasenapi nipphādetabbāni, tenāha visuddhimaggakārako “yasmā pana
anya-e0804n:1164_2: tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ, tasmā “bhavesu vantagamano’ti vattabbe
anya-e0804n:1164_3: bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ, gamanasaddato gakāraṃ, vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n:1164_4: ādāya bhagavāti vuccati, yathā loke ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā”ti
anya-e0804n:1165_0: Ettha, siyā “visamamidaṃ nidassanaṃ, yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha mekārakhakāralākārānaṃ
anya-e0804n:1165_1: kamato gahaṇaṃ dissati, “bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana bhakāravakāragakārānaṃ
anya-e0804n:1165_2: kamato gahaṇaṃ na dissatī”ti? Saccaṃ, idha pana “aggāhito, vijjācaraṇasampanno”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:1165_3: viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena “bhavesu gamanavanto”ti vattabbepi evamavatvā
anya-e0804n:1165_4: saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṃ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṃ
