anya-e0804n:2365_1: Akarāti puriso kammaṃ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā
anya-e0804n:2365_2: hi “rajjassa kira so bhīto, akarā ālaye bahū”ti pāḷi dissati. “Mā metaṃ akarā kammaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2365_3: mā me udakamāharī”ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato
anya-e0804n:2365_4: hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo pañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “tvaṃ mā karosi,
anya-e0804n:2366_0: Kiñca bhiyyo “jarādhammaṃ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṃ ṭhāna”ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve
anya-e0804n:2366_2: paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “jarādhammaṃ mā jīrīti
anya-e0804n:2366_3: yaṃ mayhaṃ jarāsabhāvaṃ, taṃ mā jīritu. Esa nayo sesesupī”ti. Yaṃ panamhehi “akara
anya-e0804n:2366_4: iti rassapāṭhopī”ti vuttaṃ, tassa “atikara’makarā’cariya, mayhampetaṃ na ruccatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2366_5: imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā. Tassāyamattho “ācariya bhavaṃ atikkantakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2366_6: akarā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo. Apica “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe “tva”nti
anya-e0804n:2366_7: vacanaṃ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena “ācariya tvaṃ atikkantakaraṇaṃ karosī”ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n:2367_0: Akaro, akattha, akarotha. Akaraṃ, akaṃ, akaramha, akamha. Ettha “saṃvaḍḍhayitvā puḷinaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2367_1: akaṃ puḷinacetiya”nti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Akattha, akatthuṃ. Akuruse, akaravhaṃ. Akariṃ,
anya-e0804n:2368_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo. Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava
anya-e0804n:2368_1: apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena. Tattha padāvayavo sekāro “tvaṃ
anya-e0804n:2368_2: kammaṃ kuruse, tvaṃ atthakusalo abhavase”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Apadāvayavo pana “tasmā
anya-e0804n:2368_3: evaṃ vademase. Mūlā akusalā samūhatāse”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Anekantapadāvayavo “arogā
anya-e0804n:2368_4: ca bhavāmase. Maṇiṃ tāta gaṇhāmase”ādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṃ
anya-e0804n:2368_6: gaṇhāmase”ti padānaṃ avayavo hoti. Yadi pana āgamo, pañcamīvibhattiyuttānaṃ patthanāsīsanatthānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2368_7: “bhavāma, gaṇhāmā”ti padānaṃ avayavo na hoti, evaṃ “bhavāmase”tiādīsu sekārassa anekantapadāvayavattaṃ
anya-e0804n:2368_8: veditabbaṃ. Sosaddattho “esese eke ekaṭṭhe”ti ettha daṭṭhabbo. Eseseti imassa hi
anya-e0804n:2368_9: “esoso eko ekaṭṭho”ti attho. Ādeso “akaramhasa te kicca”nti ettha, “okkantāmasi bhūtānī”ti
anya-e0804n:2368_10: cettha daṭṭhabbo ekārassa akārikārādesakaraṇavasena. Tattha “akaramhasa te kicca”nti
anya-e0804n:2368_11: imassa “akaramhase te kicca”nti attho. “Akaramhase”ti cettha sace sekāro āgamo, tadā
anya-e0804n:2368_12: “karamhā”ti padaṃ hiyyattanīparassapade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṃ. Sace pana mhasevacanassāvayavo,
anya-e0804n:2368_13: tadā “akaramhase”ti padaṃ hiyyattanīattanopade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṃ. Evaṃ pañcavidho
anya-e0804n:2369: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṃ, akariṃsu, akaṃsu, akaṃsuṃ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n:2370_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṃ akaroti yojetabbaṃ. “Akaro” iti hi padaṃ “varañce me ado sakkā”ti
anya-e0804n:2370_1: ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṃ “ado”ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānattepi
anya-e0804n:2370_2: nayavasena gahetabbattā. Garū pana “akaro”ti vuttaṭṭhāne “akāsī”ti majjhimapurisavacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2370_3: icchanti. Tādisañhi padaṃ yebhuyyena paṭhamapurisavacanameva hoti. Tathā hi “adāsi
anya-e0804n:2370_4: me, akāsi me”ti paṭhamapurisapāḷiyo bahū sandissanti. “Mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṃ, mā kho
anya-e0804n:2370_5: sūkaramukho ahū”tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato “tvaṃ pāpaṃ mā akāsi, mā sūkaramukho ahosī”ti
anya-e0804n:2371: Akariṃ, kariṃ, akāsiṃ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha. Akarā, akarū. Akaruse, akarivhaṃ. Akaraṃ, akarimhe. Ajjatanīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2372_0: Karissati, karissanti. Karissasi, karissatha. Karissāmi, karissāma. Karissate, karissante.
anya-e0804n:2372_1: Karissase, karissavhe. Karissaṃ, kassaṃ iccapi. Tathā hi pāḷi dissati “kassaṃ purisakāriya”nti.
anya-e0804n:2372_2: Karissamhe. Tathā kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Kāhiti, kāhinti.
anya-e0804n:2372_3: Kāhisi iccevamādinā yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Bhavissantīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2373: Akarissā, akarissa, akarissaṃsūti sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kālātipattivasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2374: Kayirati, kayiranti. Kayirasi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayirate. Sesaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2375: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2376_0: Kayirā, kuyirā. Kayiruṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “kumbhimhipa’ñjaliṃ kuyirā, cātañcāpi padakkhiṇa”nti.
anya-e0804n:2376_1: Tattha kumbhimhipi añjalinti chedo. Kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayiretha,
anya-e0804n:2376_2: kayireraṃ. Kayiretho, kayirāvho. Kayiraṃ, kayirāmhe. Sattamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2377_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṃ “puññañce puriso kayirā”ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2377_1: “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti etthāpi “sārathi bhavaṃ adhammaṃ kareyyā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena
anya-e0804n:2377_2: yojetabbaṃ, na majjhimapurisavasena. Atha vā “kayirāsī”ti vattabbe sikāralopaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n:2378_0: Ettha pana siyā – yathā “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti pāḷiyaṃ “labhethā”ti imassa padassa
anya-e0804n:2378_2: paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṃ katvā “labheyya”nti uttamapurisavasenattho
anya-e0804n:2378_3: aṭṭhakathācariyehi gahito, tathā tumhehipi “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha “kayirā”ti
anya-e0804n:2378_4: padassa purisavipallāsaṃ katvā “kareyyāsī”ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo, aṭṭhakathācariyehipi
anya-e0804n:2378_5: “kareyyāsī”ti tadattho vuttoti? Saccaṃ, evaṃ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu
anya-e0804n:2378_7: vattabbe atthe tvaṃsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena “kareyyāsī”ti attho
anya-e0804n:2378_8: vutto, na purisavipallāsavasena. Tathā hi “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:2378_10: sārathi kayirā”ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kayirā”ti ulliṅgitvā “kareyyāsī”ti vivaraṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2378_11: kataṃ, tasmā “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo. Atha
anya-e0804n:2378_12: vā yathā “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti ettha ca “kāye rajo na limpethā”tiādīsu ethavacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2378_13: gahitaṃ, evaṃ ethavacanaṃ aggahetvā “labhe athā”ti padacchedo karaṇīyo. Evañhi sati
anya-e0804n:2378_14: purisavipallāsena kiccaṃ natthi. Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṃ “vajjhañcāpi
anya-e0804n:2378_15: pamocaye”ti padamiva. Athāti adhikārantare nipāto padapūraṇe vā. Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena
anya-e0804n:2378_16: aparampi varaṃ puttaṃ labheyyanti attho. Yasmā panettha dvinnamatthānaṃ uppatti dissati,
anya-e0804n:2378_17: yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo, tasmā dvepi atthā gahetabbāva.
anya-e0804n:2379_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso
anya-e0804n:2379_1: purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti chabbidho vipallāso āharitvā dassetabbo, tathāpi
anya-e0804n:2379_2: so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito. Tatra kayirāthāti padaṃ sattamiyā parassapadavasena
anya-e0804n:2379_3: attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati, tathā majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena
anya-e0804n:2379_4: ca. Tathā hi “yathā puññāni kayirātha, dadantā aparāpara”nti ettha “kayirāthā”ti
anya-e0804n:2379_5: idaṃ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṃ. Yathānurūpaṃ
anya-e0804n:2379_6: puññāni kareyyāthayevāti hi attho. “Kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti ettha pana “kayirāthā”ti
anya-e0804n:2379_7: idaṃ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṃ. Kareyyāti
anya-e0804n:2379_8: hi attho. Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n:2380_0: Attano phalaṃ karotīti kāraṇaṃ. Karotīti kattā, evaṃ kārako kārakaṃ vā. Ettha hi
anya-e0804n:2380_1: kārakasaddo yattha kattukārakakammakārakādivācako, tattha pulliṅgopi hoti, yebhuyyena
anya-e0804n:2380_2: napuṃsakaliṅgopi. Yattha pana rajatakārakammakāralohakārādivācako, tattha pulliṅgo
anya-e0804n:2380_3: eva. Kārāpetīti kārāpako. Karaṃ, kubbaṃ, krubbaṃ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno,
anya-e0804n:2380_4: pakruṃbbamāno. Kārikā, kārāpikā. Karontī, kubbantī. Kārakaṃ kulaṃ. Kārāpakaṃ, karontaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2380_5: kubbantaṃ, kurumānaṃ. Saṅkhāro, parikkhāro, parikkhato, purakkhato, karaṇaṃ, kriyā.
anya-e0804n:2380_6: Akkharacintakā pana “kriyā” iccapi padamicchanti. Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi “aphalā
anya-e0804n:2380_7: hoti akrubbato”tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṃyogavantāni padāni dissanti, tathāpi klesasaddo
anya-e0804n:2380_8: viya pāḷiyaṃ na dissati, adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n:2381: Kātuṃ, kattuṃ. Kātave, kāretuṃ. Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā, karitvāna, kacca, adhikacca, kariya, kariyāna, purakkhitvā, kāretvā. Aññānipi tumantādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2382_0: Tatra kaccāti katvā. Adhikaccāti adhikaṃ katvā. Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṃ
anya-e0804n:2382_1: nissāya “adhikicca” iti rūpaṃ icchanti, mayaṃ panetādisaṃ rūpaṃ pāḷiyā anukūlaṃ na
anya-e0804n:2382_2: hotīti na icchāma. Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṃ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane “padakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2382_3: kacca nipacca pāde”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha hi padakkhiṇaṃ katvāti attho. Kaccāti
anya-e0804n:2382_4: padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti, esa nayo aññatrāpi yathārahaṃ veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:2383: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṃ atthātisayayogaṃ kathayāma – taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇā. Pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno. Sante na kurute piyanti.
anya-e0804n:2384_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṃ taṇhaṃ lobhaṃ karoti hiṃsatīti taṇhaṅkaro. Atha vā
anya-e0804n:2384_1: rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṃ sinehaṃ karoti janetīti
anya-e0804n:2384_2: taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇāti hiṃsanā. Pakrubbamānoti hiṃsamāno. Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise
anya-e0804n:2384_3: attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho. Atha vā piyaṃ piyāyamāno tussamāno
anya-e0804n:2384_4: modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho. Yathā “rājānaṃ sevatī”ti etasmiṃ atthe
anya-e0804n:2384_5: rājānaṃ piyaṃ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti, dullabhāyaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n:2385_0: Ettha ca parikkhārasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate, “parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi
anya-e0804n:2385_1: suparikkhittaṃ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati. “Ratho setaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2385_2: alaṅkāro. “Ye cime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”tiādīsu sambhāro. Etthetañhi vuccati –
anya-e0804n:2388: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṃ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n:2389: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2396: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:2403_0: Cura theyye. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ, corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ theyye curadhtu vattati.
anya-e0804n:2403_1: Coreti, corayati, coro, corī, corikā, coretu, corayituṃ, coretvā, corayitvā. Kattutthesu
anya-e0804n:2403_2: ṇeṇayatā curādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kārite – corāpeti, corāpayati, corāpetuṃ, corāpayituṃ,
anya-e0804n:2403_3: corāpetvā, corāpayitvā. Kammedhanaṃ corehi coriyati, coritaṃ dhanaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0804n:2405_0: Loka dassane. Loketi, lokayati, oloketi, olokayati, ulloketi, ullokayati, apaloketi,
anya-e0804n:2405_1: apalokayati, āloketi, ālokayati, viloketi, vilokayati. Loko, āloko, lokanaṃ, olokanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2405_2: ullokanaṃ, ālokanaṃ, vilokanaṃ, apalokanaṃ, avalokanaṃ. Oloketuṃ, olokayituṃ, oloketvā,
anya-e0804n:2405_3: olokayitvā. Kārite pana “olokāpeti, olokāpayati, olokāpetuṃ, olokāpayituṃ, olokāpetvā,
anya-e0804n:2405_4: olokāpayitvā” iccevamādīni yojetabbāni. Esa nayo sabbatthāpi.
anya-e0804n:2406_0: Tattha lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha “eko loko sabbe
anya-e0804n:2406_1: sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo. “Sassato loko’ti vā ‘asassato
anya-e0804n:2412_0: Atha vā lokoti tividho loko kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti. Tattha rāgādikilesabahulatāya
anya-e0804n:2412_1: kāmāvacarasattā kilesaloko. Jhānābhiññāparibuddhiyā rūpāvacarasattā bhavaloko. Āneñjasamādhibahulatāya
anya-e0804n:2412_2: visadindriyattā arūpāvacarasattā indriyaloko. Atha vā kilissanaṃ kileso, vipākadukkhanti
anya-e0804n:2412_3: attho. Tasmā dukkhabahulatāya apāyesu sattā kilesaloko. Tadaññe sattā sampattibhavabhāvato
anya-e0804n:2412_4: bhavaloko. Tattha ye vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā, so indriyalokoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2414_0: “Saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsaloko khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātulokoti anekavidho
anya-e0804n:2414_1: loko. Ettha ‘eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā…pe… aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo’ti
anya-e0804n:2414_2: ettha saṅkhāraloko vutto. Khandhalokādayo tadantogadhāyeva. ‘Ayaṃ loko paro loko
anya-e0804n:2414_3: brahmaloko sadevako’tiādīsu pana sattaloko vutto. ‘Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharanti,
anya-e0804n:2414_4: disā bhanti virocamānā. Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha tevattate vaso’ti ettha okāsaloko vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2415_0: Atthato pana indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho santāno ca sattaloko, rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya
anya-e0804n:2415_1: satto, lokiyati ettha kusalākusalaṃ tabbipāko cāti. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpānaṃ samūho
anya-e0804n:2415_2: santāno ca okāsaloko, lokiyanti ettha tasā thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti, tadādhāraṇatāya
anya-e0804n:2415_3: hesa “bhājanaloko”tipi vuccati. Duvidhopi cesa rūpādidhamme upādāya paññattattā upādāpaññattibhūto
anya-e0804n:2415_4: aparamatthasabhāvo sappaccaye pana rūpārūpadhamme upādāya paññattattā tadubhayassāpi
anya-e0804n:2415_5: upādānānaṃ vasena pariyāyato paccayāyattavuttitā upacaritabbā, tadubhaye khandhā
anya-e0804n:2415_6: saṅkhāraloko, paccayehi saṅkhariyanti, lujjanti palujjanti cāti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya
anya-e0804n:2415_8: adhippetattā natthi lokatāpajjanaṃ. Tathā hi te “lokuttarā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0804n:2416_0: Ālokoti rasmi, ālokenti etena bhuso passanti janā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vāti āloko. Olokananti
anya-e0804n:2416_1: heṭṭhā pekkhanaṃ. Vilokananti uddhaṃ pekkhanaṃ. Ālokananti purato pekkhanaṃ. Vilokananti
anya-e0804n:2416_2: dvīsu passesu pekkhanaṃ, vividhā vā pekkhanaṃ. Apalokananti “saṅghaṃ apaloketvā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2416_3: viya jānāpanaṃ. Avalokananti “nāgāvalokitaṃ avaloketvā”tiādīsu viya purimakāyaṃ parivattetvā
anya-e0804n:2416_4: pekkhanaṃ. “Ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hotī”ti etthāpi bhāvavasena ālokanaṃ ālokitaṃ
anya-e0804n:2417: Thaka paṭighāte. Thaketi, thakayati dvāraṃ puriso.
anya-e0804n:2418: Takka vitakke. Takketi, vitakketi, vitakkayati. Takko, vitakko, vitakkitā.
anya-e0804n:2419_0: Tattha takkanaṃ takko, ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti, evaṃ vitakko. Atha vā vitakkenti etena,
anya-e0804n:2419_1: sayaṃ vā vitakketi, vitakkanamattameva vā etanti vitakko. “Takko, vitakko, appanā,
anya-e0804n:2419_2: byappanā, cetaso abhiniropanā”ti abhidhamme pariyāyasaddā vuttā. Vitakketīti vitakkitā,
anya-e0804n:2420_0: Aki lakkhaṇe. Lakkhaṇaṃ saññāṇaṃ, sañjānanakāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atridaṃ sallakkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2420_1: Ye imasmiṃ curādigaṇe anekassarā asaṃyogantā ikārānubandhavasena niddiṭṭhā dhātavo,
anya-e0804n:2420_2: te evaṃvuttehi imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatā ākhyātattaṃ nāmikattañca pāpuṇantā
anya-e0804n:2420_3: ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpāyeva bhavanti, na katthacipi vigataniggahītāgamarūpāni
anya-e0804n:2420_4: bhavanti. Aṅketi, aṅkayati. Aṅkanaṃ, aṅko. Samāse pana “sasaṅko, cakkaṅkitacaraṇo”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2421: Sakka vakka bhāsane. Sakketi, sakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n:2422: Nakka vakka nāsane. Nakketi, nakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n:2423: Cakka cukka byathane. Cakketi, cakkayati. Cukketi, cukkayati. Cakkaṃ. Cakkanti kenaṭṭhena cakkaṃ? Cakketi byathati hiṃsatīti atthena cakkaṃ. Cakkasaddo –
anya-e0804n:2426_0: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ
anya-e0804n:2426_1: sampattiyaṃ dissati. “Pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇe. “Cakkaṃva vahato
anya-e0804n:2426_2: pada”nti ettha rathaṅge. “Catucakkaṃ navadvāra”nti ettha iriyāpathe. “Dada bhuñja
anya-e0804n:2426_3: ca mā cappamādo, cakkaṃ vattassu pāṇina”nti ettha dāne. “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosī”ti
anya-e0804n:2426_4: ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti ettha dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa posassa,
anya-e0804n:2426_5: cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha khuracakke. “Khurapariyantena cepi cakkenā”ti ettha
anya-e0804n:2428_0: Akka thavane. Thavanaṃ thuti. Akketi, akkayati. Akko. Akkoti sūriyo. So hi mahājutitāya
anya-e0804n:2428_1: akkiyati abhitthaviyati tappasannehi janehīti akko. Tathā hi tassa “natthi sūriyasamā
anya-e0804n:2428_2: ābhā. Udetayaṃ cakkhumā ekarājā”tiādinā abhikkhuti dissati.
anya-e0804n:2431_0: Bukka bhassane. Ettha sunakhabhassanaṃ bhassananti gahetabbaṃ, na vācāsaṅkhātaṃ bhassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2431_1: Bukketi, bukkayati. Ettha ca “bukkayati sā core” iti lokiyappayogo veditabbo. Bhūvādigaṇe
anya-e0804n:2431_2: pana “bukkati sā”ti rūpaṃ bhavati. Añño tu “bukka paribhāsane” iti paṭhati, evaṃ
anya-e0804n:2432: Daka laka assādane. Daketi, dakayati. Laketi, lakayati.
anya-e0804n:2433: Takka loka bhāsāyaṃ. Takketi, takkayati. Loketi, lokayati.
anya-e0804n:2434: Cika sika āmasane. Ciketi, cikayati. Siketi, sikayati.
anya-e0804n:2437: Lakkha dassanaṅkesu. Dassanaṃ passanaṃ. Aṅko lañjanaṃ. Lakkheti, lakkhayati. Sallakkheti, sallakkhayati. Lakkhaṃ vijjhati usunā, lakkhaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n:2438: Gaṅgāya vālukā khīye, udakaṃ khīye mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0804n:2439: Mahiyā mattikā khīye, lakkhe na mama buddhiyā.
anya-e0804n:2440: Kappalakkhaṇaṃ. Golakkhaṇaṃ. Itthilakkhaṇaṃ. Dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Sallakkhanā. Upalakkhanā. Paccupalakkhanā. Lakkhadhātuyā yupaccayantāya samādipubbānaṃ rūpānaṃ nakāro dantajo.
anya-e0804n:2441: Bhakkha adane. Bhakkheti, bhakkhayati. Bhakkho no laddho. Bhakkhayanti migādhamā. Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bhakkhatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2443_0: Makkha makkhane. Makkheti, makkhayati. Makkho, makkhī. Tattha makkhoti parehi kataguṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2443_1: makkheti pisatīti makkho, guṇadhaṃsanā. “Makkhaṃ asahamāno”ti ettha pana attani parehi
anya-e0804n:2444_0: Yakkha pūjāyaṃ. Yakkheti, yakkhayati. Yakkho. Yakkhoti mahānubhāvo satto. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n:2444_1: “pucchāmi taṃ mahāyakkha, sabbabhūtānamissarā”ti ettha sakko devarājā “yakkho”ti
anya-e0804n:2444_2: vutto. Atha vā yakkhoti yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbattasatto. Sabbepi vā sattā “yakkhā”ti
anya-e0804n:2444_3: vuccanti. “Paramayakkhavisuddhiṃ paññāpentī”ti ettha hi yakkhasaddo satte vattati.
anya-e0804n:2444_4: Tathā hi yakkhopi sattopi devopi sakkopi khīṇāsavopi yakkhoyeva nāma, mahānubhāvatāya
anya-e0804n:2444_5: yakkhiyati saraṇagatehi janehi nānāpaccayehi nānābalīhi ca pūjiyatīti yakkho.
anya-e0804n:2445: Satte deve ca sakke ca, khīṇāsave ca rakkhase;
anya-e0804n:2447: Lakkha ālocane. Lakkheti, lakkhayati. Lakkhaṃ vijjhati usunā.
anya-e0804n:2449_0: Rukkha phārusse. Phārussaṃ pharusabhāvo. Rukkheti, rukkhayati. Samāse “rukkhakeso,
anya-e0804n:2449_1: atirukkhavacano”ti rūpāni. Ettha ca “samaṇo ayaṃ pāpo atirukkhavāco”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2452_0: Liṅga cittīkaraṇe. Cittīkaraṇaṃ vicitrabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Liṅgeti, liṅgayati, liṅgaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2452_1: Ettha liṅgaṃ nāma dīgharassakisathūlaparimaṇḍalādibhedaṃ saṇṭhānanti gahaṇe atīva
anya-e0804n:2452_2: yujjati. Tañhi nānappakārehi vicitraṃ hoti, liṅgīyati vicittaṃ kariyati avijjātaṇhākammehi
anya-e0804n:2452_3: utunā vā cuṇṇādīhi vā sarīramiti liṅgaṃ, ajjhattasantānatiṇarukkhādikuṇḍalakaraṇḍakādīsu
anya-e0804n:2452_4: pavattasaṇṭhānavasenetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Liṅgasaddo sadde saddappavattinimitte itthibyañjane
anya-e0804n:2452_5: purisabyañjane saññāṇe ākāre cāti imesu atthesu dissati. Ayañhi “rukkhoti vacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2452_6: liṅga”nti ettha sadde dissati. “Sataliṅgassa atthassā”ti ettha saddappavattinimitte.
anya-e0804n:2452_7: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavatī”ti ettha itthibyañjane.
anya-e0804n:2452_9: buddho bhavissatī”ti ettha saññāṇe. “Tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi tehi ākārehi āgantukabhāvo
anya-e0804n:2453: Sadde ca tannimitte ca, kāṭakoṭacikāya ca;
anya-e0804n:2455: Maga anvesane. Mageti, magayati. Migo, mago, mago, magayamāno.
anya-e0804n:2456_0: Ettha ca “yathā biḷāro mūsikaṃ magayamāno”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. “Migo”ti ca “mago”ti
anya-e0804n:2456_1: ca catuppado pavuccati. Ettha migoti magayati ito cito gocaraṃ anvesati pariyesatīti
anya-e0804n:2456_2: migo. Evaṃ mago. Ettha visesato hariṇa migo migo nāma. Sāmaññato pana avasesāpi catuppadā
anya-e0804n:2456_3: “migo” icceva vuccanti. Tathā hi susīmajātake “kāḷā migā setadantā tava ime, parosahassaṃ
anya-e0804n:2456_4: hemajālābhisañchannā”ti etasmiṃ pāḷippadese hatthinopi migasaddena vuttā “kāḷamigā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2456_5: Atha vā magiyati jīvitakappanatthāya maṃsādīhi atthikehi luddehi anvesiyati pariyesiyatīti
anya-e0804n:2456_6: migo, araññajātā sasapasadahariṇeṇeyyādayo catuppādā, evaṃ mago. “Atthaṃ na labhate
anya-e0804n:2456_7: mago”ti ettha pana mago viyāti mago, bāloti attho.
anya-e0804n:2457: Magga gavesane. Maggeti, maggayati. Maggo, magganaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2458_0: Ettha ca maggoti paṭipadāya ca pakatimaggassa ca upāyassa ca adhivacanaṃ. “Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2458_1: vācanāmagganissita”ntiādīsu pana kathāpabandhopi “maggo”ti vuccati. Tatra paṭipadā
anya-e0804n:2458_2: ekantato jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi dukkhakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇatthāya
anya-e0804n:2458_3: maggitabbo gavesitabboti maggo. Pakatimaggo pana maggamūḷhehi maggitabboti maggo.
anya-e0804n:2458_4: Pakatimaggamūḷhehi ca paṭipadāsaṅkhātāriyamaggamūḷhā eva bahavo santi. Pakatimaggo
anya-e0804n:2458_5: hi kadāci eva addhikānaṃ muyhati, “esa maggo”ti nāyakā na dullabhā. Ariyamaggo pana
anya-e0804n:2458_6: sabbadāyeva sabbalokassa muyhati, nāyakā paramadullabhā. Tasmā so eva avijjāsammūḷhehi
anya-e0804n:2458_7: maggitabboti maggo. Aññesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasenapi atthaṃ vadanti garū “kilese
anya-e0804n:2458_8: mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti. Taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ hitaṃ vā nipphādetukāmehi maggiyati gavesiyatīti
anya-e0804n:2458_9: maggo, upāyo. Maggasaddo hi “abhidhammakathāmaggaṃ, devānaṃ sampavattayī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n:2458_10: upāyepi vattati. Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ “maggoti upāyo, khandhāyatanādīnaṃ kusalādīnañca
anya-e0804n:2458_11: dhammānaṃ avabodhassa saccappaṭivedhasseva vā upāyabhāvato abhidhammakathāmaggo”ti
anya-e0804n:2458_12: vutto, pabandho vā “maggo”ti vuccati. So hi dīghattā maggo viyāti maggo, tasmā abhidhammakathāpabandho
anya-e0804n:2458_13: abhidhammakathāmaggoti vutto. Idāni pakatipaṭipadāmaggānaṃ nāmāni kathayāma. Tesu pakatimaggassa –
anya-e0804n:2463: Nāva uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti
anya-e0804n:2464_0: Anekāni nāmāni. Ettha pana keci “nāvātiādīni pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vadanti, taṃ
anya-e0804n:2464_1: na gahetabbaṃ, pakatimaggassa kismiñcipi pāḷippadese “nāvā”tiādīhi padehi vuttaṭṭhānābhāvato,
anya-e0804n:2465_0: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – nāvāviyāti nāvā, uttaranti etenāti uttaraṃ, nāvāyeva uttaranti.
anya-e0804n:2465_1: Ayañhi nāvāpariyāyo “taraṃ, taraṇaṃ, poto, plavo”ti. Imepi taṃpariyāyāyeva. Uttaraṃ
anya-e0804n:2465_2: viyāti uttaraṃ. Setu viyāti setu. Kullo viyāti kullo. Bhisi viyāti bhisi. Saṅkamo
anya-e0804n:2465_3: viya, saṅkamanti vā etenāti saṅkamo, sabbametaṃ ariyamaggasseva nāmaṃ, na pakatimaggassa.
anya-e0804n:2465_4: Tathā hi “dhammanāvaṃ samārūyha, santāressaṃ sadevaka”nti ca, “dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ
anya-e0804n:2465_5: katvā, nibbuto so narāsabho”ti ca, “kullo’ti kho bhikkhave ariyamaggassetaṃ adhivacana”nti
anya-e0804n:2465_6: ca evamādinā tattha tattha bhagavatā ariyamaggo “nāvā”tiādīhi anekehi nāmehi vutto.
anya-e0804n:2465_8: etasmiṃ padese evaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanā katā “bhisīti pattharitvā puthulaṃ katvā baddhā
anya-e0804n:2465_9: ‘kullā’ti vuccati loke, ariyassa vinaye pana ariyamaggo’ti.
anya-e0804n:2467: Nāvā uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo;
anya-e0804n:2469: Evaṃ ācariyehi katāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya dassanato ca “nāvātiādīnipi pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, yathāvuttameva vacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2470_0: Koci panettha evaṃ vadeyya “dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ katvā’ti ettha ‘dhammasetunti maggasetu’nti
anya-e0804n:2470_1: vacanato dhammasaddo magge vattati, na setusaddo”ti. Tanna, dhammasaddo viya setusaddopi
anya-e0804n:2470_2: magge vattatīti setu viyāti setu, dhammo eva setu dhammasetūti atthavasena, esa nayo
anya-e0804n:2470_4: bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbuttarabhāge ṭhito’ti
anya-e0804n:2470_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne dakkhiṇuttarasaddena dakkhiṇo maggo vutto”ti. Na, anekesu pāḷippadesesu
anya-e0804n:2470_6: aṭṭhakathāpadesesu ca abhidhānasatthesu ca maggavācakassa uttarasaddassa anāgatattā,
anya-e0804n:2470_7: tasmā tattha evamattho daṭṭhabbo “dakkhiṇadisato gantabbo uttaradisābhāgo dakkhiṇuttaroti
anya-e0804n:2470_8: vuccati, evaṃbhūtena dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍapavisanaṃ sandhāya dakkhiṇuttarena
anya-e0804n:2470_9: bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvāti vutta”nti. Atha vā dakkhiṇuttarenāti dakkhiṇapacchimuttarena,
anya-e0804n:2470_10: ettha ādiavasānaggahaṇena majjhassapi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ gahaṇaṃyeva hi yaṃ
anya-e0804n:2470_11: jātakanidāne vuttaṃ “bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ ārūyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge
anya-e0804n:2470_12: uttarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi, tasmiṃ khaṇe dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ
anya-e0804n:2470_13: viya ahosi, uttaracakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi, bodhisatto
anya-e0804n:2470_14: idaṃ sambodhipāpuṇaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavati maññeti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto pacchimadisābhāgaṃ
anya-e0804n:2470_15: gantvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsī”tiādi, tena sameti. Athāpi vadeyya “yadi uttarasaddo
anya-e0804n:2470_16: disāvācako, evañca sati “dakkhiṇuttarenā”ti enayogaṃ avatvā “dakkhiṇuttarāyā”ti āyayogo
anya-e0804n:2470_17: vattabbo”ti. Tanna, disāvācakassapi saddassa “uttarena nadī sītā, gambhīrā duratikkamā”ti
anya-e0804n:2470_18: enayogavasena vacanato. Apica disābhāgaṃ sandhāya “dakkhiṇuttarenā”ti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2473_0: Lighi bhāsane. Laṅgheti, laṅghayati. Etāni buddhavacane appasiddhānipi lokikappayogadassanavasena
anya-e0804n:2477_2: rūpāni diṭṭhāni eva honti. Bhāsatthavācakassa pana tathārūpāni rūpāni na diṭṭhāni,
anya-e0804n:2477_3: evaṃ santepi pubbācariyehi dīghadassīhi abhimatattā bhāsatthavācikāpi laṅghadhātu
anya-e0804n:2477_4: atthīti gahetabbā, evaṃ sabbesupi bhūvādigaṇādīsu sāsane appasiddhānampi rūpānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2477_5: sāsanānukūlānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, ananukūlānañca appasiddhānaṃ chaḍḍanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2478: Agha pāpakaraṇe. Agheti, aghayati. Aghaṃ, agho, anagho.
anya-e0804n:2479_0: Tattha aghanti dukkhaṃ. “Aghantaṃ paṭisevissaṃ. Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe. Khaggadīpinisevite”ti
anya-e0804n:2479_1: idaṃ nidassanaṃ. Aghoti kileso. Tena aghena arahā anagho. Tattha aghayanti pāpaṃ
anya-e0804n:2479_2: karonti sattā etenāti aghaṃ, kintaṃ? Dukkhaṃ, evaṃ agho. Nanu ca sappurisā dukkhahetupi
anya-e0804n:2479_3: kilesahetupi ca attano sukhatthāya pāpaṃ na karonti. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:2483: Chandā ca dosā na jahanti dhamma”nti
anya-e0804n:2484_0: Vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante kasmā “agha pāpakaraṇe”ti dhātu ca “aghayanti pāpaṃ karonti sattā
anya-e0804n:2484_1: etenāti agha”ntiādivacanañca vuttanti? Saccaṃ, yebhuyyena pana sattā dukkhādihetu
anya-e0804n:2484_2: pāpakammaṃ karonti, etesu sappurisā eva na karonti, itare karonti. Evaṃ pāpakaraṇassa
anya-e0804n:2484_3: hi dukkhaṃ kileso ca hetu. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:2489_0: Vuttaṃ. Ayañhi gāthā dukkhahetupi sattā pāpaṃ karontīti etamatthaṃ dīpeti. “Kuddho
anya-e0804n:2489_1: hi pitaraṃ hanti, kuddho hanti samātara”nti ayaṃ pana kilesahetupi pāpaṃ karontīti
anya-e0804n:2489_2: etamatthaṃ dīpeti, tasmā amhehi “agha pāpakaraṇe”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2492: Loca dassane. Loceti, locayati. Locanaṃ. Rūpārammaṇaṃ locayati passatīti locanaṃ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2493: Kici maddane. Kiñceti, kiñcayati. Kiñcanaṃ, akiñcano.
anya-e0804n:2494: Tattha kiñcananti palibodho. Kiñceti satte maddatīti kiñcanaṃ. Kiñcanasaddo maddanatthe vattati. Manussā hi vīhiṃ maddantā goṇaṃ “kiñcehi kāpila, kiñcehi kāpilā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2495: Paci vitthāre. Pañceti, pañcayati. Papañceti, papañcayati. Papañcā.
anya-e0804n:2496_0: Ettha papañcāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo. Etā hi attanissitānaṃ sattānaṃ saṃsāraṃ papañcenti
anya-e0804n:2496_1: vitthinnaṃ karontīti papañcāti vuccanti. Atha vā papañcenti yattha sayaṃ uppannā
anya-e0804n:2496_2: taṃsantānaṃ vitthārenti ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā. Lokiyā pana “amhākaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ
anya-e0804n:2496_3: kathentānaṃ papañco hotī”tiādīni vadantā kālassa cirabhāvaṃ papañcoti vadanti, sāsane
anya-e0804n:2498: Vañcu palambhane. Palambhanaṃ upalāpanaṃ. Vañceti, vañcayati. Vañcako, vañcanaṃ. Bhūvādigaṇe pana vañcadhātu gatyatthe vattati. “Santi pādā avañcanā”ti hi pāḷi
anya-e0804n:2500: Cu cavane. Cāveti, cāvayati. Añño “cu sahane” iti brute. Cāveti, cāvayati, sahatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2502: Loca bhāsāyaṃ. Loceti, locayati. Locanaṃ, locayati samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya bhavatīti locanaṃ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2503: Raca patiyatane. Raceti, racayati. Racanā, viracitaṃ, kesaracanā, gāthāracanā.
anya-e0804n:2504: Sūca pesuññe. Pisuṇabhāvo pesuññaṃ. Sūceti, sūcayati. Sūcako.
anya-e0804n:2506: Rica viyojanasampajjanesu. Receti, recayati. Seṭṭhiputtaṃ vireceyya. Vireceti, virecayati. Virecako, virecanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2507_0: Vaca bhāsane. Vaceti, vacayati. Bhūvādigaṇepi ayaṃ vattati. Tadā tassā “vatti, vacati,
anya-e0804n:2507_1: avoca, avocu”ntiādīni rūpāni bhavanti. Kārite pana “antevāsikaṃ dhammaṃ vāceti, vācayatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2507_2: rūpāni. Vattuṃ, vattave, vatvā, vuttaṃ, vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2509: Sūca gandhane. Suceti, sūcayati. Sūcako, suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2510: Ettha ca attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūcetīti suttaṃ. Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2512_0: Ettha kaccoti rūpasampattiyā kacceti dibbati virocatīti kacco, evaṃnāmako ādipuriso,
anya-e0804n:2515: Milecha abyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Mileccheti, milecchayati. Milakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2516: Ettha milakkhūti mileccheti abyattavācaṃ bhāsatīti milakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2517: Kuccha avakkhepe. Avakkhepo adhokhipanaṃ. Kuccheti, kucchayati.
anya-e0804n:2521: Vajja vajjane. Vajjeti, vajjayati. Parivajjanako. Vajjito sīlavantehi, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasīti.
anya-e0804n:2523: Tuji piji hiṃsābaladānaniketanesu. Niketanaṃ nivāso. Tuñjeti, tuñjayati. Piñjeti. Piñjayati.
anya-e0804n:2525: Khaji rakkhaṇe. Tādisāniyeva rūpāni. Bhūvādigaṇe “khaji gativekalleti imissā “khañjatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2526: Pūja pūjāyaṃ. Pūjeti, pūjayati. Pūjā. Esāva pūjanā seyyo. Pūjako, pūjito, pūjanīyo, pūjaneyyo, pūjetabbo, pujjo.
anya-e0804n:2530: Tajja santajjane. Tajjeti, tajjayati. Santajjeti, santajjayati. Santajjito.
anya-e0804n:2532: Sajja sajjane. Sajjeti, sajjayati dānaṃ. Gamanasajjo hutvā.
anya-e0804n:2533: Bhaja vissāse. Bhajeti, bhajayati. Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bhajatī”ti rūpaṃ, bhatti, sambhatti.
anya-e0804n:2534: Tuji piji luji bhaji bhāsāyaṃ. Tuñjeti, tuñjayati. Piñjeti, piñjayati. Luñjeti, luñjayati. Bhañjeti, bhañjayati. Kathetīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2536: Bhāja puthakammani. Puthakammaṃ puthakkaraṇaṃ, visuṃ kriyāti attho. Bhājeti, bhājayati. Vibhājeti, vibhājayati. Vibhatti.
anya-e0804n:2539: Yuja saṃyamane. Saṃpubbo bandhane. Yojeti, yojayati. Saṃyojeti, saṃyojayati. Saṃyojanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2540: Majja soceyyālaṅkāresu. Majjeti, majjayati. Sammajjeti, sammajjayati. Sammajjā.
anya-e0804n:2541: Bhāja bhājanadānesu. Bhājeti, bhājayati. Kathaṃ vessantaro putto, gajaṃ bhājeti sañcaya.
anya-e0804n:2543: Jhañantā appasiddhā. Saddasatthe pana “ñā niyojane”ti paṭhanti, rūpaṃ pana buddhavacanānukūlaṃ na bhavati, tasmā na dassitaṃ amhehi.
anya-e0804n:2545: Ghaṭṭa ghaṭṭane. Ghaṭṭanaṃ vāyāmakaraṇaṃ. Ghaṭṭeti, ghaṭṭayati. Ettha tu “ghaṭṭesi, ghaṭṭesi, kiṃkāraṇā ghaṭṭesi, ahaṃ taṃ jānāmī”ti nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2546: Ghaṭa saṅghāte. Pubbe viya kriyāpadāni, nāmikatte “ghaṭo, ghaṭā”ti rūpāni. Ettha gaṭoti pānīyaghaṭo. Ghaṭāti samūho “macchaghaṭā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:2548: Naṭa avasandane. Avasandanaṃ gattavikkhepo. Naṭeti, naṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2549: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭṭa chedane. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Chuṭeti, chuṭayati. Kuṭṭeti, kuṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2550: Puṭṭa caṭṭa appabhāve. Puṭṭeti, puṭṭayati. Cuṭṭeti, cuṭṭayati, appaṃ bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2552: Aṭṭa suṭṭa anādare. Aṭṭeti, aṭṭayati. Suṭṭeti, suṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2555: Tuvaṭṭa nipajjāyaṃ. Tuvaṭṭeti, tuvaṭṭayati. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
anya-e0804n:2556: Chaṭṭa chaṭṭane. Chaṭṭeti, chaṭṭayati. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi – sace so chaṭṭeti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Noce chaṭṭeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaṭṭako sammannitabbo.
anya-e0804n:2558: Kīṭa bandhe. Bandho bandhanaṃ. Kīṭeti, kīṭayati. Kīṭo.
anya-e0804n:2561: Kūṭa appasāde. Kūṭeti, kūṭayati. Kūṭaṃ rajataṃ. Kūṭā gāvī. Kuṭatāpaso.
anya-e0804n:2562: Cuṭa puṭa phuṭa vibhede. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Phoṭeti, phoṭayati. Aṅguliyo phoṭesuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2563: Ghaṭa saṅghāṭe hantyatthe ca. Ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2564: Paṭa puṭa luṭa ghaṭa ghaṭi bhāsāyaṃ. Pāṭeti, pāṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Loṭeti, loṭayati. Ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati. Ghaṇṭeti, ghaṇṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2565: Paṭa vaṭa ganthe. Paṭeti, paṭayati. Vaṭeti, vaṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2578: Ettha saṭhoti kerāṭiko. Saṭhayatīti saṭho, na sammā bhāsatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2582: Ettha sākuṇiko “kitavā”ti vutto. Tassa idaṃ ketavaṃ, tasmiṃ ketave ayaṃ dhātu vattatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2586: Paṭi parihāse. Paṇḍeti, paṇḍayati. Uppaṇḍeti, uppaṇḍayati. Manussānaṃ naṃ bhikkhuniṃ uppaṇḍiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:2588: Khaḍi kaḍi chede. Khaṇḍeti, khaṇḍayati. Kaṇḍeti, kaṇḍayati. Khaṇḍo, kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:2590: Ettha ca piṇḍoti samūhasaṅkhāto kalāpopi “coḷaṃ piṇḍo rati khiḍḍā”ti ettha vutto āhārasaṅkhāto piṇḍopi piṇḍoyeva.
anya-e0804n:2592: Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ hasane ca. Maṇḍeti, maṇḍayati. Maṇḍo, maṇḍanaṃ, maṇḍito.
anya-e0804n:2593: Bhaḍi kalyāṇe. Kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇatā. Bhaṇḍeti, bhaṇḍayati. Bhaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:2594: Ettha ca bhaṇḍoti dhanaṃ, alaṅkāro vā. “Bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti. Samalaṅkaritvā bhaṇḍenā”ti ca ādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:2596: Chaḍḍa chaḍḍane. Chaḍḍeti, chaḍḍayati. Chaḍḍanako. Chaḍḍiyati, chaḍḍito. Chaḍḍituṃ, chaḍḍayituṃ, chaḍḍetvā, chaḍḍayitvā.
anya-e0804n:2599: Vaḍḍha ākiraṇe. Kaṃsapātiyā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhayati. Bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi.
anya-e0804n:2602: Vaṇṇa vaṇṇakriyāvitthāraguṇavacanesu. Vaṇṇo pasaṃsā. Kriyā karaṇaṃ. Vitthāro vitthinnatā. Guṇo sīlādidhammo. Vacanaṃ vācā. Vaṇṇeti, vaṇṇayati. Vaṇṇo, vaṇṇaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ, saṃvaṇṇanā.
anya-e0804n:2603_1: “suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā”ti evamādīsu chaviyaṃ. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa
anya-e0804n:2603_2: gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. “Cattārome bho gotama vaṇṇā”tievamādīsu kulavagge.
anya-e0804n:2603_3: “Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu kāraṇe. “Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2603_4: abhinimminitvā”tievamādīsu saṇṭhāne. “Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. “Vaṇṇo
anya-e0804n:2604_0: Tattha chaviyanti chavigatā vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena
anya-e0804n:2604_1: gahitāti apare. Vaṇṇanaṃ kittiyā ugghosananti vaṇṇo, thuti. Vaṇṇiyati asaṅkarato
anya-e0804n:2604_2: vavatthapiyatīti vaṇṇo, kulavaggo. Vaṇṇiyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāviyatīti
anya-e0804n:2604_3: vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ, vaṇṇaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo, saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇiyati
anya-e0804n:2604_4: aḍḍhamahantādivasena pamiyatīti vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0804n:2604_5: pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0804n:2605_0: Aparampi vaṇṇasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vadāma. Vaṇṇasaddo saṇṭhānajāti rūpāyatanakāraṇapamāṇaguṇapasaṃsājātarūpapuḷinakkharādīsu
anya-e0804n:2605_1: dissati. Ayañhi “mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu saṇṭhāne dissati,
anya-e0804n:2605_2: “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo”tiādīsu jātiyaṃ. “Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
anya-e0804n:2606: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2607: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2608_0: Ādīsu kāraṇe. “Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu pamāṇe. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati
anya-e0804n:2608_1: samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇe. “Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu pasaṃsāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2608_2: “Vaṇṇaṃ añjanavaṇṇena, kāliṅgamhi vanimhase”ti ettha jātarūpe. “Akilāsuno vaṇṇapathe
anya-e0804n:2608_3: khaṇantā”ti ettha puḷine. “Vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyāyo”tiādīsu akkhare dissati. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi –
anya-e0804n:2609: Chaviyaṃ thutiyaṃ heme, kulavagge ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n:2612_0: Suvaṇṇasaddo chavisampattigaruḷajātarūpesu āgato. Ayañhi “suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate
anya-e0804n:2612_1: duggate”ti, “suvaṇṇatā sussaratā”ti ca evamādīsu chavisampattiyaṃ āgato. “Kākaṃ suvaṇṇā
anya-e0804n:2615: Cuṇṇa peraṇe. Cuṇṇeti, cuṇṇayati. Cuṇṇaṃ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n:2617: Kuṇa saṅkocane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Kuṇo. Kuṇahattho. Hatthena kuṇī.
anya-e0804n:2619: Ettha tūṇīti sarakalāpo. Sā hi tūṇenti pūrenti sare etthāti tūṇī.
anya-e0804n:2622_0: Ettha kāṇoti ekena vā dvīhi vā akkhīhi parihīnakkhi. Aṭṭhakathācariyā pana “kāṇo
anya-e0804n:2622_1: nāma ekakkhinā kāṇo, andho nāma ubhayakkhikāṇo”ti vadanti, taṃ kāṇandhasaddānaṃ ekatthasannipāte
anya-e0804n:2622_2: yujjati. Itarathā kāṇakacchapopamasutte vutto kacchapo ekasmiṃ kāṇo siyā, ekakkhikāṇo
anya-e0804n:2622_3: ca pana puriso “andho”ti na vattabbo siyā, tasmā tesamayugaḷatte ekekassa yathāsambhavaṃ
anya-e0804n:2622_4: dvinnaṃ dvinnamākārānaṃ vācakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tathā hi kosalasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kāṇoti
anya-e0804n:2622_5: ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo vā”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā “ovadeyyānusāseyyā”ti ettha ovādānusāsanānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2623: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne. Gaṇeti, gaṇayati. Gaṇanā, gaṇo.
anya-e0804n:2624: Ettha gaṇanāti saṅkhyā. Gaṇoti bhikkhusamūho. Yesaṃ vā kesañci samūho. Samūhassa ca anekāni nāmāni. Seyyathidaṃ –
anya-e0804n:2637_0: Kiñcāpi ete saṅghagaṇasamūhādayo saddā samūhatthavācakā, tathāpi saṅghagaṇasaddāyeva
anya-e0804n:2637_1: vināpi visesakapadena bhikkhusamūhe vattanti, nāññe, aññe pana saṅghagaṇasaddehi
anya-e0804n:2637_2: saddhiṃ aññamaññañca kadāci samānatthavisayā honti, kadāci asamānatthavisayā, tasmā
anya-e0804n:2637_3: yathāpāvacanaṃ asammuyhantena yojetabbā. “Eko, dve”tiādinā gaṇetabboti gaṇo.
anya-e0804n:2638: Kaṇṇa savane. Kaṇṇeti, kaṇṇayati. Kaṇṇo. Kaṇṇayanti saddaṃ suṇanti etenāti kaṇṇo, yo loke “savanaṃ, sota”nti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2639: Kuṇa guṇa āmantane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Guṇeti, guṇayati. Guṇo. Goṇo.
anya-e0804n:2640_0: Ettha guṇoti sīlādayo dhammā, kenaṭṭhena te guṇā. Goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani
anya-e0804n:2640_1: patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca icchantehi janehīti guṇo. Ettha kiñcāpi
anya-e0804n:2640_2: sīlādidhammānaṃ āmantāpanaṃ natthi, tathāpi taṃhetuāmantanaṃ nimantanañca teyeva
anya-e0804n:2640_3: karonti nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:2645_0: Ettha kassakassa tuṭṭhiuppattikāraṇattā hetuvasena niccetanassapi phalassa tosanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2645_1: vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi āmantāpanakāraṇattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññe pana “guñjante abyayante
anya-e0804n:2645_2: iti guṇā”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Tadanurūpaṃ pana dhātusaddaṃ na passāma, “guṇa āmantane”
anya-e0804n:2647: Ettha vaṇoti aru. Sā hi sarīraṃ vaṇayati vicuṇṇeti chiddāvachiddaṃ karotīti vaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2648: Paṇṇa harite. Paṇṇeti, paṇṇayati. Tālapaṇṇaṃ. Sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2649: Ettha ca haritabhāvavigatepi vatthusmiṃ paṇṇabhāvo rūḷhito pavattoti daṭṭhabbo. “Paṇṇaṃ, pattaṃ, palāso, dalaṃ” iccete samānatthā.
anya-e0804n:2650: Paṇa byavahāre. Paṇeti, paṇayati. Rājā ca daṇḍaṃ garukaṃ paṇeti.
anya-e0804n:2653: Cinta cintāyaṃ. Cinteti, cintayati. Cittaṃ, cintā, cintanā, cintanako. Kārite “cintāpeti, cintāpayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2654_0: Tattha cittanti ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ, vijānātīti attho, sabbacittasādhāraṇavasenetaṃ
anya-e0804n:2654_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha siyā – kasmā “ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti citta”nti vatvāpi “vijānātīti
anya-e0804n:2654_2: attho”ti vuttaṃ, nanu cintanavijānanā nānāsabhāvā. Na hi “cintetī”ti padassa “vijānātī”ti
anya-e0804n:2654_3: attho sambhavati, duppaññassa hi nānappakārehi cintayatopi sukhumatthādhigamo na
anya-e0804n:2654_4: hotīti? Saccaṃ, “vijānātī”ti idaṃ padaṃ cittassa saññāpaññākiccehi visiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2654_5: dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā cittasaddassa. Yañhi dhammajātaṃ “citta”nti
anya-e0804n:2654_6: vuccati, tadeva viññāṇaṃ, tasmā vijānanatthaṃ gahetvā saññāpaññākiccāvisiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2655_0: Idāni aññagaṇikadhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ pakāsayāma – sabbesu cittesu yaṃ lokiyakusalākusalamahākriyacittaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2655_1: taṃ javanavīthivasena attano santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ, vipākaṃ kammakilesehi citanti
anya-e0804n:2655_2: cittaṃ, idaṃ cidhātuvasena nibbacanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ, sabbassa
anya-e0804n:2655_3: tassa citteneva karaṇato citteti vicitteti vicittaṃ kariyati etenāti cittaṃ, cittakaraṇatāya
anya-e0804n:2655_4: cittanti vuttaṃ hoti, idaṃ cittadhātuvasena nibbacanaṃ. Cittatāya cittaṃ, idaṃ pāṭipadikavasena
anya-e0804n:2655_5: nibbacanaṃ. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “sabbampi yathānurūpato cittatāya cittaṃ, cittakaraṇatāya
anya-e0804n:2656_1: vasena cittassa cittatā veditabbā. Kiñcāpi ekassa cittassa evaṃ vicittatā natthi,
anya-e0804n:2656_2: tathāpi vicittānaṃ antogadhattā samudāyavohārena avayavopi “citta”nti vuccati, yathā
anya-e0804n:2656_3: pabbatanadīsamuddādiekadesesu diṭṭhesu pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti vuccanti. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0804n:2656_4: “kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti, cittānaṃ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0804n:2657_0: Ettha ca vuttappakārānamatthānaṃ vinicchayo bavati. Kathaṃ? Yasmā yattha yattha yathā
anya-e0804n:2657_1: yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabbo. Tasmā yaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena
anya-e0804n:2657_2: cinoti, yañca kammunā abhisaṅkhatattā citaṃ, taṃ tena kāraṇena cittanti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0804n:2657_3: pana tathā na hoti, taṃ parittakriyadvayaṃ antimajavanañca labbhamānacintanavicittatādivasena
anya-e0804n:2659: Cittaṃ mano mānasañca, viññāṇaṃ hadayaṃ manaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2661_0: Cittasaddo paññattiyaṃ viññāṇe vicitte cittakamme acchariyeti evamādīsu atthesu dissati.
anya-e0804n:2661_1: Ayañhi “citto gahapati. Cittamāso”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ dissati. “Cittaṃ mano mānasa”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2661_2: viññāṇe. “Vicittavatthābharaṇā”tiādīsu vicitte. “Diṭṭhaṃ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṃ nāma
anya-e0804n:2661_3: citta”ntiādīsu cittakamme. “Iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, cittarūpaṃva dissatī”tiādīsu acchariyeti.
anya-e0804n:2662_0: Cita sañcetane. Ceteti, cetayati. Ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto attabyābādhāyapi
anya-e0804n:2662_1: ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti. Ākaṅkhati cetayati, taṃ
anya-e0804n:2662_2: nisedha jutindhara. Cetanā, sañcetanā. Cetayitaṃ, cetetvā, cetayitvā. Sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeti.
anya-e0804n:2663_0: Tattha cetanāti cetayatīti cetanā, saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti
anya-e0804n:2663_1: attho. Sañcetanāti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Cetayitanti cetanākāro. Sañciccāti
anya-e0804n:2663_2: sayaṃ ñatvā, cecca abhivitaritvāti attho. Imāni cetanāya nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:2666: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “cetanāhaṃ bhikkhave kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2667_0: Manta guttabhāsane. Manteti, mantayati, nimanteti, nimantayati, āmanteti, āmantayati.
anya-e0804n:2667_1: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mantayanti, mantayiṃsu rahogatā. Nimantayittha rājānaṃ. Āmantayittha
anya-e0804n:2667_2: devindo, visukammaṃ mahiddhikaṃ. Mantā, manto. Kārite “mantāpeti, mantāpayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2668_0: Ettha mantāti paññā, “gavesanasaññā”tipi vadanti. Mantoti guttabhāsanaṃ. “Upassutikāpi
anya-e0804n:2668_1: suṇanti mantaṃ, tasmā hi manto khippamupeti bheda”nti ettha hi guttabhāsanaṃ “manto”ti
anya-e0804n:2668_2: vuccati. Apica mantoti chaḷaṅgamanto. Vuttañca “ye mantaṃ parivattenti, chaḷaṅgaṃ
anya-e0804n:2668_3: brahmacintita”nti. Ettha sikkhā nirutti kappa byākaraṇa jotisattha chandovicitivasena
anya-e0804n:2668_4: manto “chaḷaṅgo”ti veditabbo. Etāni eva cha “vedaṅgānī”ti vuccanti. Vedo eva hi “manto,
anya-e0804n:2668_5: sutī”ti ca vutto. Atha vā mantoti vedādivijjā.
anya-e0804n:2669: Yanta saṅkocane. Yanteti, yantayati. Yantaṃ, telayantaṃ yathācakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī.
anya-e0804n:2671: Santa āmappayoge. Āmappayogo nāma ussannakriyā. Santeti, santayati.
anya-e0804n:2672: Kitta saṃsandane. Kitteti, kittayati. “Ye vohaṃ kittayissāmi, girāhi anupubbaso. Kittanā parikittanā”tiādīsu pana katthanā “kittanā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2673: Tanta kuṭumbadhāraṇe. Tanteti, tantayati. Satanto, sappadhānoti attho.
anya-e0804n:2674_0: Yata nikāropakāresu. Yateti, yatayati. Nīto ca paṭidāne, yatadhātu niupasaggato paro
anya-e0804n:2674_1: paṭidāne vattati, niyyāteti, niyyātayati. Takārassa pana dakāratte kate “niyyādeti,
anya-e0804n:2674_2: niyyādayati. Rathaṃ niyyādayitvāna, aṇaṇo ehi sārathī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2677: Vāta gatisukhasevanesu. Gati sukhaṃ sevananti tayo atthā. Tattha sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ. Vāteti, vātayati. Vāto, vātapupphaṃ. Cīvarassa anuvāto.
anya-e0804n:2679: Satta santānakriyāyaṃ. Santānakriyā nāma pabandhakriyā avicchedakaraṇaṃ. Satteti, sattayati. Satto.
anya-e0804n:2682_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “gatasattaṃ jaraggava”nti pāṭhassa “vigatajīvitaṃ jiṇṇagoṇa”nti atthaṃ
anya-e0804n:2682_1: saṃvaṇṇesuṃ. Iminā sattasaddassa jīvitavacanaṃ viya dissati, “na sukarā uñchena paggahena
anya-e0804n:2682_2: yāpetu”nti ettha paggahasaddassa pattakathanaṃ viya. Suṭṭhu vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2684_0: Mutta pasavane. Mutteti, muttayati. Omutteti, omuttayati. Muttaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “mutteti
anya-e0804n:2684_1: ohadeti cā”ti. Tattha muttetīti passāvaṃ karoti. Ohadetīti karīsaṃ vissajjeti. Kārite
anya-e0804n:2685: Kattara sethille. Kattareti, kattarayati. Kattaro. Kattaradaṇḍo, kattarasuppaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2686_0: Tattha kattaroti jiṇṇo. Mahallakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kenaṭṭhena? Kattarayati aṅgānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2686_1: sithilabhāvena sithilo bhavatīti atthena. Kattaradaṇḍoti kattarehi jiṇṇamanussehi
anya-e0804n:2686_2: ekantato gahetabbatāya kattarānaṃ daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “kattaradaṇḍoti
anya-e0804n:2686_3: jiṇṇakāle gahetabbadaṇḍo”ti. Kattarasuppanti jiṇṇasuppaṃ. Kattarañca taṃ suppañcāti
anya-e0804n:2687: Citta cittakaraṇe, kadāci dassanepi. Cittakaraṇaṃ vicittabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Citteti, cittayati. Cittaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2690: Katha kathane. Katheti, kathayati. Dhammaṃ sākacchati. Sākacchā, kathā, parikathā, aṭṭhakathā.
anya-e0804n:2691: Tattha sākacchatīti saha kathayati. Attho kathiyati etāyāti aṭṭhakathā, tthakārassa ṭṭhakārattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2695_0: Pathi gatiyaṃ. Panthenti, panthayanti. Pantho. Bhūvādigaṇe “patha gatiya”nti akārantavasena
anya-e0804n:2695_1: kathitassa “pathati, patho”ti niggahītāgamavajjitāni rūpāni bhavanti, idha pana ikārantavasena
anya-e0804n:2695_2: kathitassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni niccaṃ bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2699: Putha bhāsāyaṃ. Potheti, pothayati. Kathetīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2700: Putha pahāre. Potheti, pothayati. Kumāre pothetvā agamāsi.
anya-e0804n:2703: Attha pattha yācanāyaṃ. Attheti, atthayati. Attho. Pattheti, patthayati. Patthanā. Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayanti icchantīti paccatthikā.
anya-e0804n:2707: Santha gantha santhambhe. Santheti, santhayati. Gantheti, ganthayati. Gantho.
anya-e0804n:2710: Hada karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo karīsassa ussaggo vissajjanaṃ. Hadeti, hadayati. Ohadeti, ohadayati.
anya-e0804n:2711_0: Vida lābhe. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne lābho nāma anubhavanaṃ, tasmā vidadhātu anubhavane vattatīti
anya-e0804n:2711_1: attho gahetabbo. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti. Dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti. Vedayati. Vedanā,
anya-e0804n:2713: Mida sinehane. Atra sineho nāma pīti. Medeti, medayati.
anya-e0804n:2714: Chada saṃvaraṇe. Gehaṃ chādeti, chādayati. Dosaṃ chādeti, chādayati. Paṭicchādeti, paṭicchādayati. Chattaṃ. Channā kuṭi.
anya-e0804n:2715: Tatra chattanti ātapattaṃ. Ātapaṃ chādetīti chattaṃ. Paṭicchādiyateti channā.
anya-e0804n:2716: Cuda sañcodane āṇattiyañca. Codeti, codayati. Codako, cuditako, codanā. Ānando buddhacodito.
anya-e0804n:2717: Tatra codanāti cālanā. Cālanāti dosāropanāti attho.
anya-e0804n:2720: Vida cehanākhyānanivāsesu. Cehanā saññāṇaṃ. Ākhyānaṃ kathanaṃ. Nivāso nivasanaṃ. Vedeti, vedayati. Paṭivedeti, paṭivedayati. Paṭivedayāmi te mahārāja.
anya-e0804n:2721: Sadda saddane. Saddeti, saddayati. Visaddeti, visaddayati. Saddo, saddito. Dīghatte “saddāyatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2722_0: Ettha ca “maṃ saddāyatīti saññāya vegena udake patī”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2722_1: idaṃ “pabbatāyatī”ti rūpaṃ viya dhātuvasena nipphannaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ, dhātuvasena
anya-e0804n:2722_2: nipphannaṃyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Saddoti saddiyatīti saddo, yathāvuccatīti vacanaṃ. Atha
anya-e0804n:2722_3: vā saddiyati attho anenāti saddo. Garavo pana “sappatīti saddo. Udīriyati abhilapiyatīti attho”ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2725: Kanda sātacce. Sātaccaṃ satatabhāvo nirantarabhāvo. Kandeti, kandayati.
anya-e0804n:2726: Muda saṃsagge. Ekatokaraṇaṃ saṃsaggo. Modeti, modayati sattūni sappinā.
anya-e0804n:2727_0: Nada bhāsāyaṃ. Nādeti, nādayati. Hetukatturūpānīti na vattabbāni pāḷidassanato “sīho
anya-e0804n:2727_1: ca sīhanādena, daddaraṃ abhinādayī”ti. Aññatrāpi saṃsayo na kātabbo. Imasmiṃ curādigaṇe
anya-e0804n:2728: Sada assādane. Sādeti, sādayati. Assādeti, assādayati. Ettha āupasaggo rassavasena ṭhito.
anya-e0804n:2729: Gada devasadde. Devasaddo vuccati meghasaddo. Gadeti, gadayati.
anya-e0804n:2730: Pada gatiyaṃ. Padeti, padayati. Padaṃ. Imissā divādigaṇe “pajjatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati, idha pana īdisāni.
anya-e0804n:2732_0: Chida dvedhākaraṇe. Nanu bho yo catudhā vā pañcadhā vā anekasatadhā vā chindati,
anya-e0804n:2732_1: tassa taṃ chedanaṃ dvedhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti, evaṃ sante kasmā sāmaññena avatvā
anya-e0804n:2732_2: “dvedhākaraṇe”ti dvidhā gahaṇaṃ katanti? Dvidhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2732_3: anekasatadhā chedanampi dvidhākaraṇaṃyeva. Aparassa hi aparassa chinnakoṭṭhāsassa
anya-e0804n:2732_4: pubbena ekena koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ apekkhanavasena dvidhākaraṇaṃ hotiyeva. Chedeti, chedayati.
anya-e0804n:2733: Yo te hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n:2734: Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ vinassa idaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2735: Yo me hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n:2736: Ciraṃ jīvatu so rājā, na hi kujjhanti mādisāti.
anya-e0804n:2737: Chada apavāraṇe. Chādeti, chādayati. Chattaṃ. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayati.
anya-e0804n:2738: Īdī sandīpane. Īdeti, īdayati. Īkārantavasena niddiṭṭhattā saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2741_0: Tattha “vādeti, vādayatī”ti imesaṃ “vadatī”ti suddhakattuvaseneva attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0804n:2741_1: na hetukattuvasena. Tathā hi “saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādeti. Ovadeyyānusāseyya. Idameva
anya-e0804n:2741_2: saccanti ca vādayanti. Avisaṃvādako lokassā”ti suddhakattudīpakapāḷinayā dissanti,
anya-e0804n:2741_3: saddasatthe ca “vādayatī”ti suddhakattupadaṃ dissati. Tattha visaṃvādetīti musā vadeti,
anya-e0804n:2741_4: atha vā vippalambheti, vādoti vacanaṃ. “Vādo jappo vitaṇḍā”ti evaṃvidhāsu tīsu kathāsu
anya-e0804n:2741_5: vādasaṅkhātā kathā. “Vādāpeti, vādāpayatī”ti dveyeva hetukattupadāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2742_0: Chadī icchāyaṃ. Īkārantoyaṃ dhātu, tasmā saniggahītāgamānissa rūpāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2742_1: Purisassa bhattaṃ chādeti, chādayati, ruccatīti attho. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayamānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2743_0: Vadī abhivādanathutīsu. Ayampi īkāranto dhātu, tasmā imassapi saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni
anya-e0804n:2743_1: na bhavanti. Vādeti, vādayati, vandati, thometi vāti attho. Imāni anupasaggāni rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2743_2: Saddasatthepi ca “vādayatī”ti anupasaggavandanathutiatthaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ, sāsane pana
anya-e0804n:2743_3: “abhivādeti, abhivādayati, abhivādanaṃ, bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā”tiādīni sopasaggāni rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n:2744_0: Tattha abhivādetvāti vanditvā, thometvā vā, ayamasmākaṃ ruci. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
anya-e0804n:2744_1: “abhivādetvāti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā, vandanto hi atthato evaṃ vadāpeti
anya-e0804n:2744_2: nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vutto, amhehi pana vandanasaddaṃ saddasatthanayamaggahetvā
anya-e0804n:2744_3: suddhakattuvasena attho kathito. Abhivādanañhi vandanaṃyeva, na vadāpanaṃ abhisaddena
anya-e0804n:2744_5: vuttaṃ. Yadi ca saddasatthe vadāpanamadhippetaṃ siyā, “vadī vadāpanathutīsū”ti nissandehavacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2744_6: vattabbaṃ siyā, evañca na vuttaṃ, evaṃ pana vuttaṃ “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti, tena
anya-e0804n:2745_0: Athāpi siyā “kassaci vuddhena visiṭṭhaṃ vadāpanaṃ abhivādana”nti, evampi nupapajjati
anya-e0804n:2745_1: kāritavasena dhātuatthassa akathetabbato. Tathā hi “paca pāke, chidi dvidhākaraṇe”tiādinā
anya-e0804n:2745_2: bhāvavasena atthappakāsanamatteyeva “pacati, paccati, pāceti. Chindati, chijjati,
anya-e0804n:2745_3: chedāpetī”tiādīni sakammakāni ceva akammakāni ca sakāritāni ca rūpāni nipphajjanti,
anya-e0804n:2745_4: na ca tadatthāya visuṃ visuṃ dhātuniddeso kariyati. Tasmā “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti
anya-e0804n:2745_5: ettha kāritavasena dhātuattho kathitotipi vattuṃ na sakkā kriyāsabhāvattā dhātūnaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2745_6: Yathā pana “takketi, vitakketi. Takko, vitakko”tiādīni samānatthāni, tathā “vādeti,
anya-e0804n:2745_7: abhivādetī”tiādīni samānatthāni. Ato saddasatthepi saddasatthavidūhi “takka vitakke,
anya-e0804n:2745_9: rūpāni dassitāni, tāni ca kho suddhakattupadāniyeva, na hetukattupadāni, tasmā “abhivādanathutīsū”ti
anya-e0804n:2746_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – “abhivādeti, abhivādayati. Abhivādetvā, abhivādayitvā”tiādīni samānatthāni,
anya-e0804n:2746_1: ṇeṇayamattena hi savisesāni. Yadi “abhivādetvā”ti imassa padassa “sukhī arogo hotū’ti
anya-e0804n:2746_2: vadāpetvā”ti attho siyā, “sirasā abhivādayi”nti ettha “sirasā”ti padaṃ na vattabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:2746_3: siyā vadāpanena asambandhattā. Yasmā vuttaṃ taṃ padaṃ, tena ñāyati “abhivādetvā”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2746_4: vadāpanattho na icchitabbo, vandanattho icchitabbo thomanattho ca. Yasmā bhūvādigaṇe
anya-e0804n:2746_6: thometi cā”ti atthoyeva icchitabbo, na vadāpanattho. Tathā hi “vande sugataṃ gativimutta”nti
anya-e0804n:2746_7: padānamatthaṃ vadantena ṭīkācariyenapi “vandeti vandāmi, thomemi cā”ti vandanathomanatthoyeva
anya-e0804n:2746_8: dassito, na abhivādanasaddatthaṃ paṭicca vadāpanattho, tasmā “abhivādetvā”ti etthāpi
anya-e0804n:2747_0: Athāpi siyā “vande’ti pade kāritapaccayo natthi, ‘abhivādetvā’ti imasmiṃ pana atthi,
anya-e0804n:2747_1: tasmā tattha vadāpanattho na labbhati, idha pana labbhatī”ti. Tanna, “karotī”tisuddhakattupadassapi
anya-e0804n:2747_3: hotū’ti vadāpetvā”ti vivaraṇassa vattabbattā. “Abhivādetvā”ti idañca “vande”ti padamiva
anya-e0804n:2747_4: kāritapaccayantaṃ na hoti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā “cinteti, cintayati. Manteti, mantayatī”tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n:2747_6: dissanti, tasmā yadi hetukattupadaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā, “abhivādāpetvā”ti vā “abhivādāpayitvā”ti
anya-e0804n:2747_7: vā vattabbaṃ siyā, yasmā panevaṃ na vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ kāritapaccayantaṃ na hotīti siddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2748: Imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathaṃ vidhurajātakappadesaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0804n:2750: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2751_0: Ayaṃ tāva jātakapāḷi. Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāpāṭho “yañhi naro hantumiccheyya, so taṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_1: kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya, kathaṃ vā tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve. Tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_2: na upapajjatī”ti. Tattha pāḷiyaṃ abhivādeyyāti suddhakattupadaṃ tabbācakattā. Abhivādāpayetha
anya-e0804n:2751_3: veti hetukattupadaṃ tabbācakattā. Evaṃ vibhāgaṃ pana ñatvā pāḷiyā aṭṭakathāya ca
anya-e0804n:2751_4: adhippāyo gahetabbo “naro yaṃ puggalaṃ hantuṃ iccheyya, so hantā taṃ vajjhaṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_5: kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya, so vā hantā, tena vajjhena maṃ vandāhīti attānaṃ kathaṃ vandāpeyyā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2751_6: Ettha pana “rājāno coraṃ sunakhehipi khādāpentī”tiādīsu viya karaṇavasena “tena vajjhenā”ti
anya-e0804n:2751_7: padaṃ yojitaṃ, attho pana “taṃ vajjha”nti upayogavacanavasena daṭṭhabbo dvikammakattā
anya-e0804n:2751_8: sakāritapaccayassa sakammakadhātuyāti. Nanu evaṃ sante “aṭṭhakathācariyā passitabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_9: na passanti, atitthe pakkhandantī”ti tesaṃ doso hotīti? Na hoti, suṇātha asmākaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_10: sodhanaṃ, tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “abhivādetvā”ti ettha “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti
anya-e0804n:2751_11: dhātuyā atthamaggahetvā vohāravisaye kosallasamannāgatattā saṇhasukhumamatthaṃ sotūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_12: bodhetuṃ “vada viyattiyaṃ vācāya”nti dhātuyevatthaṃ gahetvā kāritapaccayaparikappanena
anya-e0804n:2751_13: kāritatthamādāya “abhivādetvāti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā, vandanto hi atthato
anya-e0804n:2751_14: evaṃ vadāpeti nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vuttoti na koci tesaṃ doso.
anya-e0804n:2751_15: Pūjārahā hi te āyasmanto, namoyeva tesaṃ karoma, idampi ṭhānaṃ sukhumaṃ sādhukaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_16: manasi kātabbaṃ. Evañhi karoto paññā vaḍḍhatīti.
anya-e0804n:2754_0: Randha pāke. Sūdo bhattaṃ randheti, randhayati. Kākaṃ sokāya randhehi. Randhako.
anya-e0804n:2754_1: Sūdena odano randhiyati. Randhito. Randhanaṃ. Puriso sūdaṃ sūdena vā odanaṃ randhāpeti,
anya-e0804n:2754_2: randhāpayati. Randhetuṃ, randhayituṃ. Randhitvā, randhayitvā, randhiya iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:2756: Gandha sūcane addane ca. Sūcanaṃ. Pakāsanaṃ. Addanaṃ pariplutā. Gandheti, gandhayati, gandho.
anya-e0804n:2757_0: Ettha gandhoti gandheti attano vatthuṃ sūcayati pakāsetīti gandho. Paṭicchannaṃ vā
anya-e0804n:2757_1: pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ upasaṃharanto viya pakāsetīti gandho.
anya-e0804n:2757_3: iti, āha ca “gacchanto dhariyatīti gandho, sūcanatopi vā”ti. Gandhasaddo ca “uppalagandhatheno”ti
anya-e0804n:2759_0: Budhi hiṃsāyaṃ. Bundheti, bundhayati. Palibundheti, palibundhayati. Palibodho, parisaddo
anya-e0804n:2759_1: upasaggo, so vikāravasena aññathā jāto. Tattha palibodhoti āvāsapalibodhādi. Apica
anya-e0804n:2760: Vaddha chedanapūraṇesu. Vaddheti, vaddhayati. Vaddhakī. Vaddhakīti gahakārako.
anya-e0804n:2761: Gaddha abhikaṅkhāyaṃ. Gaddheti, gaddhayati. Gaddho. Gaddhoti gijjho. “Gaddhabādhipubbo”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2764_0: Andha diṭṭhūpasaṃhāre. Diṭṭhūpasaṃhāro nāma cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāro apanayanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2764_1: vināso vā. Cakkhu hi passanti etāyāti diṭṭhīti vuccati. Yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0804n:2764_5: vuttaṃ. Evaṃbhūtāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāre andhadhātu vattati. Andheti, andhayati. Cakkhūni
anya-e0804n:2764_6: andhayiṃsu, andho. Andhoti andhetīti andho. Dvinnaṃ cakkhūnaṃ ekassa vā vasena naṭṭhanayano,
anya-e0804n:2764_7: evamidha andhadhātu vutto. Kaccāyane pana “khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhā”ti vacanena
anya-e0804n:2765: Badha bandhane. Migaṃ bādheti, bādhayati. Baddho migo, baddhosi mārapāsena.
anya-e0804n:2766_0: Tattha bādhetīti bandhatīti suddhakattuvasena attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ bādhayatīti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n:2766_1: Tathā hi “vātaṃ jālena bādhesi, yo anicchantimicchasī”ti ettha bādhesīti bandhasīti
anya-e0804n:2766_2: suddhakattuvasena attho. Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bādha baddhāya”nti bādhadhātussa vasena
anya-e0804n:2766_3: “bādhatī”ti kattupadaṃ “bādheti, bādhayatī”ti hetukattupadaṃ bhavati. Baddhoti bādhiyate
anya-e0804n:2769: Māna pūjāyaṃ pemane vīmaṃsāyaṃ. Māneti, mānayati. Mātā. Vimāneti, vimānayati, paṭimāneti, paṭimānayati. Mānanā, sammānanā, vimānanā, vimānaṃ, vimānanaṃ, mānito.
anya-e0804n:2770: Amānanā yattha santo, santānaṃ vā vimānanā;
anya-e0804n:2771: Hīnasammānanā vāpi, na tattha vasatiṃ vase.
anya-e0804n:2773_0: Tattha mānetīti pūjeti, aṭṭhakathāsu pana “mānentī”ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ayamattho dassito
anya-e0804n:2773_1: “mānentīti manena piyāyanti. Pūjentīti paccayehi pūjentī”ti. So vevacanatthappakāsanavasena
anya-e0804n:2773_2: vuttoti gahetabbo. Mānanapūjanasaddā hi pariyāyasaddattā vevacanasaddā eva. Vimānetīti
anya-e0804n:2773_3: avamaññati. Vimānanti sobhāvisesayogato visiṭṭhamāniyatāya vimānaṃ, visesato mānetabbanti
anya-e0804n:2774: Mana thambhe. Thambho cittassa thaddhatā. Māneti, mānayati. Māno.
anya-e0804n:2775: Thana devasadde. Devasaddo meghasaddo, thaneti, thanayati.
anya-e0804n:2779: Ūna parihāniyaṃ. Ūneti, ūnayati. Ūno loko.
anya-e0804n:2780: Dhana sadde. Dhaneti, dhanayati, dhaniyyati. Dhani, dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2781_0: Tattha dhanīti saddo. Dhananti santakaṃ, tañhi mama idanti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddāyitabbanti
anya-e0804n:2781_1: dhananti. Ayaṃ pana dhātu icchāyampi vattati. “Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhūrassa
anya-e0804n:2781_2: hadayaṃ dhaniyyatī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha dhaniyyatīti pattheti icchati.
anya-e0804n:2782: Thena coriye. Corassa bhāvo coriyaṃ. Yathā sūriyaṃ, yathā ca dakkhiyaṃ. Theneti, thenayati. Theno, thenetvā.
anya-e0804n:2783: Tanu saddopatāpesu. Tāneti, tānayati. Idhāyaṃ savuddhikā. Tanādigaṇe vitthāratthavasena “tanoti, tanute”ti avuddhikā.
anya-e0804n:2786: Ñapa tosananisānesu. Ñāpeti, ñāpayati, paññāpeti, paññāpayati, paññatti.
anya-e0804n:2787_0: Ettha ca niddese “paññāpetī”ti padaṃ nidassanaṃ. Tattha paññāpetīti katanibbacanehi
anya-e0804n:2787_1: vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca
anya-e0804n:2787_2: karotīti attho. Papubbo nikkhipane. Āsanaṃ paññāpeti, paññāpayati. “Āsanaṃ paññapetī”ti
anya-e0804n:2787_3: rassattampi dissati. Amatassa dvāraṃ paññapeti, paññā. Kārite “puriso purisena āsanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2787_4: paññapāpetī”ti ekameva padaṃ. Tāni “paññāpeti, paññāpayatī”ti rūpāni yadā “ñā avabodhane”ti
anya-e0804n:2787_5: imissā rūpāni siyuṃ, tadā hetukatturūpāni bhavanti. Ettha pana suddhakatturūpāni tabbācakattā.
anya-e0804n:2788: Lapa viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Lapeti, lapayati. Lāpo, lapanaṃ, ālāpo, sallāpo, kathāsallāpo, lapitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2789: Byapa dāhe. Jhāpeti, jhāpayati. Jhatto, jhānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2790_0: Tattha jhattoti khuddāpareto pācanagginā jhāpitoti jhatto, “jhattā assu kilantā”ti
anya-e0804n:2790_1: ca pāḷi. Jhānanti nīvaraṇadhamme jhāpetīti jhānaṃ, savuddhikaṃ. Kārite pana – jhāpāpeti, jhāpāpayati.
anya-e0804n:2791: Rūpa rūpakriyāyaṃ. Rūpakriyā nāma pakāsanakriyā. Rūpeti, rūpayati. Rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2792: Tattha rūpanti rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Divādigaṇe panāyaṃ “rūpaṃ ruppane”ti bhijjanādiatthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0804n:2793: Kappa vidhimhi. Vidhi kriyā. Sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Kappayati. Moro vāsamakappayi. Sīhaseyyaṃ pakappentaṃ, buddhaṃ vandāmi gotamaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2794_0: Kappa vitakke vidhimhi chedane ca. Kappeti, kappayati, moro vāsamakappayi. Kappitamassu.
anya-e0804n:2794_1: Pakappeti, pakappayati. Saṅkappeti, saṅkappayati. Kappo, saṅkappo, vikappo. Kappasamaṇo iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:2795: Tattha kappoti paricchedavasena kappiyatīti kappo. Saṅkappoti saṅkappanaṃ. Vikappoti vividhā kappanaṃ, atthassa anekantikabhāvo. Idha kappasaddassa atthuddhāro bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2796_1: Tathā hissa “okappanīyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
anya-e0804n:2796_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
anya-e0804n:2796_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
anya-e0804n:2796_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
anya-e0804n:2796_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
anya-e0804n:2796_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo.
anya-e0804n:2797_0: Atha vā kappasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vitakkavidhānapaṭibhāgapaññattikālaparamāyuvohārasamantabhāvābhisaddahana
anya-e0804n:2797_2: dissati. Tathā hesa “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo”tiādīsu vitakke āgato. “Cīvare
anya-e0804n:2797_3: vikappaṃ āpajjeyyā”tiādīsu vidhāne, adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyyāti hi attho. “Satthukappena
anya-e0804n:2797_4: vata bho sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu paṭibhāge, satthusadisenāti
anya-e0804n:2797_5: ayañhi tattha attho. “Iccāyasmā kappo”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ
anya-e0804n:2797_6: viharāmī”tiādīsu kāle. “Ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vātiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ
anya-e0804n:2797_7: vā”tiādīsu paramāyumhi. Āyukappo hi idha “kappo”ti adhippeto. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave
anya-e0804n:2797_8: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”ntiādīsu samaṇavohāre. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2797_10: saddhāyanti attho. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”tiādīsu chedane. “Evameva ito dinnaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2797_11: petānaṃ upakappatī”tiādīsu viniyoge. “Kappakatena akappakataṃ saṃsibbitaṃ hotī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2797_12: vinayakriyāyaṃ. “Atthi kappo nipajjituṃ, handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”tiādīsu lese. “Āpāyiko
anya-e0804n:2797_13: nerayiko, kappaṭṭho saṅghabhedako, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.
anya-e0804n:2802_0: Ādīsu taṇhādiṭṭhīsu. Tathā hi vuttaṃ niddese “kappoti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo
anya-e0804n:2803: Vitakke ca vidhāne ca, paṭibhāge tatheva ca;
anya-e0804n:2804: Paññattiyaṃ tathā kāle, paramāyumhi ca chedane.
anya-e0804n:2809_0: Kapi gatiyaṃ. Kampeti, kampayati, gacchatīti attho. Imāni calanatthe pavattahetukatturūpasadisāni
anya-e0804n:2809_1: bhavanti. Calanatthe hi “kampa kampane”ti dhātuyā “kampatī”ti akammakasuddhakatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2809_2: “Kampetī”tiādīni sakammakāni hetukatturūpāni “idampi dutiyaṃ sallaṃ, kampeti hadayaṃ
anya-e0804n:2811: Thūpa samussaye. Samussayo āroho ubbedho. Thūpeti, thūpayati. Thūpo, thūpikā.
anya-e0804n:2816: Ḍapa ḍipa saṅghāte. Ḍāpeti. Ḍāpayati. Ḍepeti, ḍepayati.
anya-e0804n:2817: Kapa avakampane. Kapeti, kapayati. Kapaṇo. Kapaṇoti karuṇāyitabbo. Aññattha pana “kappatī”ti rūpaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2818: Gupa kupa dhūpa bhāsāyaṃ. Gopeti, gopayati. Kopeti, kopayati. Dhūpeti, dhūpayati.
anya-e0804n:2820: Khepa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ, khepeti, khepayati.
anya-e0804n:2823: Tapa dāhe. Tapeti, tapayati. Tapo, tāpo. Ātāpo, santāpo. Kārite – tāpeti, tāpayati. Tattha tapoti akusalānaṃ tāpanaṭṭhena tapo, sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2824: Opathapa thapane. Opeti, opayati. Na tesaṃ koṭṭhe openti. Thapeti, thapayati. Thapito. Thapayitvā paṭicchadaṃ vavaṭṭhapeti. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2825_0: Ettha ca “vi ava thapeti, vi ava thapana”nti chedo. Ettha purime saralopo thassa
anya-e0804n:2825_1: ṭhattaṃ visadisabhāvena dvittañca. Pacchime pana saralopo, avassa okārattaṃ, thassa
anya-e0804n:2825_2: ṭhattaṃ, passa vattaṃ, vassa dvittaṃ, vakāradvayassa ca bakāradvayaṃ bhavati. Voṭṭhabbananti
anya-e0804n:2825_3: ca byavatthāpakacittassa nāmaṃ. Nakāralope “voṭṭhabba”nti aparampi rūpaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2826: Māpa māpane. Paṇṇasālaṃ māpeti, māpayati. Yo pāṇamatimāpeti, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā.
anya-e0804n:2827: Yapa yāpane. Yāpanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Tena so tattha yāpeti. Yāpayati. Yāpanā.
anya-e0804n:2828: Tattha yāpetīti idaṃ yādhātussa payogatte sati kāritapadaṃ bhavati. Tathā hi “uyyāpenti nāmā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:2832: Samba sambandhe. Sambandho daḷhabandhanaṃ. Sambeti, sambayati. Sambalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2833: Sabi maṇḍale. Maṇḍalaṃ parimaṇḍalatā. Rūpaṃ tādisameva.
anya-e0804n:2835: Lubi dubi addane. Addanaṃ hiṃsā. Lumbeti, lumbayati. Dumbeti, dumbayati.
anya-e0804n:2836: Pubba niketane. Niketanaṃ nivāso. Pubbeti, pubbayati.
anya-e0804n:2837: Gabba māne. Māno ahaṃkāro. Gabbeti, gabbayati. Gabbanaṃ, gabbito. Tattha gabbatīti na saṅkucati.
anya-e0804n:2840: Bhū pattiyaṃ. Patti pāpanaṃ. Sakammikā dhātu. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Pabhāveti, pabhāvayati. Itthambhūto. Cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto.
anya-e0804n:2841_0: Tattha bhāvetīti puriso gacchantaṃ purisamanugacchanto pāpuṇātīti attho. Esa nayo
anya-e0804n:2841_1: sesakriyāpadesupi. Ettha ca “bhāvetī”tiādīni yattha sace “bhū sattāya”nti dhātuyā
anya-e0804n:2841_2: rūpāni honti, tattha hetukatturūpāni nāma honti. “Bhāveti kusalaṃ dhamma”ntiādīnettha
anya-e0804n:2841_3: nidassanapadāni. Bhāvetīti hi vaḍḍhetīti attho. Idha pana suddhakatturūpattā pāpuṇātīti
anya-e0804n:2841_4: attho. Itthambhūtoti imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto patto. “Cakkhubhūto”tiādīni pana “bhū sattāyaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2841_5: bhū pattiya”nti dvigaṇikānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakathāṭīkānayanissitaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e0804n:2841_6: pakāsayissāma āgamikānaṃ kosallatthāya. Tattha cakkhubhūtoti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2841_7: dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti, evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanato dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n:2841_8: cakkhubhūto. Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtotipi cakkhubhūto. Paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhūñāṇena
anya-e0804n:2841_9: paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti cakkhubhūto. Viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇabhūto, asādhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0804n:2841_10: vā ñāṇaṃ bhūto pattoti ñāṇabhūto, aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena, pariyattidhammappavattanato
anya-e0804n:2841_11: vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto. Bodhipakkhiyadhammehi
anya-e0804n:2841_12: vā uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhūto pattoti
anya-e0804n:2841_13: dhammabhūto. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūto. Atha vā brahmaṃ vuccati maggo tena uppannattā
anya-e0804n:2841_14: lokassa ca taduppādanattā, tañca sayambhūñāṇena bhūto pattoti brahmabhūto. Evaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0804n:2842_0: Aparāni cettha nidassanapadāni veditabbāni. “Tātā mayaṃ mahallakā suddhodanamahārājaputtaṃ
anya-e0804n:2842_1: buddhabhūtaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā, tumhe tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti ca “atha
anya-e0804n:2842_2: kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ revataṃ sahajātiyaṃ sambhāviṃsū”ti cāti. Aññānipi panettha
anya-e0804n:2842_3: “manussabhūto, devabhūto”tiādīni yojetabbāni. Tathā hi saṃsāramocakapetavatthu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:2842_4: “manussabhūtātimanussesu jātā, manussabhāvaṃ vā pattā”ti attho saṃvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n:2843: Bhū avakampane. Ayampi sakammako. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Manobhāvanīyā bhikkhū.
anya-e0804n:2844_0: Ettha ca bhāvetīti anukampati puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā yaṃkiñci. Manobhāvanīyāti “dīghāyukā
anya-e0804n:2844_1: hontu bhadantā arogā abyāpajjā”ti evamādinā bhāvetabbā anukampitabbāti manobhāvanīyā.
anya-e0804n:2844_2: Aññattha pana manobhāvanīyāti manovaḍḍhanakāti attho. Yesu hi diṭṭhesu mano vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0804n:2847: Lābha pesane. Lābheti, lābhayati. “Labha lābheti dhātussa rūpāni ce, kāritarūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2848: Dabhī bhaye. Īkārantāyaṃ dhātu, tena saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Dabheti, dabhayati.
anya-e0804n:2850: Vambha viddhaṃsane. Vambheti, vambhayati. Vambhanā. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ vambhenti.
anya-e0804n:2853: Ātena camu dhovane. Āpubbo camudhātu dhovane vattati. Ācameti, ācamayati. Ācamanakumbhī.
anya-e0804n:2854_0: Ettha pana “tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavī, therassa datvā yugāni aṭṭhā”ti appasakkārapetavatthupāḷippadeso
anya-e0804n:2854_1: nidassanaṃ. Tattha ācamayitvāti hatthapādadhovanapubbakaṃ mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā. Ayaṃ
anya-e0804n:2854_2: pana dhātu bhūvādigaṇikatte “camatī”ti bhakkhanatthaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n:2855: Kamu icchākantīsu. Kāmeti, kāmayati. Kāmo, kanti, nikanti, kāmanā, kāmayamāno,kāmento, abhikkantaṃ. Abhikkantavaṇṇā.
anya-e0804n:2856_0: Ettha ca kāmoti rūpādivisayaṃ kāmetīti kāmo. Kāmiyatīti vā kāmo, kilesakāmavatthukāmavasenetaṃ
anya-e0804n:2856_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kileso hi tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātañca vatthu “kāmo”ti vuccati. Māropi vā
anya-e0804n:2856_2: devaputto “kāmo”ti vuccati. So hi accantakaṇhadhammasamaṅgitāya papañcasamatikkantepi
anya-e0804n:2856_3: buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvake attano vase ṭhapetuṃ kāmetīti “kāmo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2861: Kāmo namuci kaṇho ca, vasavattī pajāpati;
anya-e0804n:2863: Kandappo ca ratipati, māro ca kusumāyudho;
anya-e0804n:2864: Aññe aññānipi vadanti. Tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “māro, namuci, kaṇho, pamattabandhū”ti cattāriyeva nāmāni āgatāni.
anya-e0804n:2865_0: Idāni abhikkantasaddassa bhūvādigaṇe “kamu padavikkhepe”ti vohārasīsena vuttassa
anya-e0804n:2865_1: kamudhātussa vasena idha ca “kamu icchākantīsū”ti vuttassa kamudhātussa vasena atthuddhāraṃ
anya-e0804n:2865_3: bhante ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu khaye dissati.
anya-e0804n:2865_4: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
anya-e0804n:2866: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2871: Thoma silāghāyaṃ. Silāghā pasaṃsā. Thometi, thomayati. Thomito, thomanā.
anya-e0804n:2873: Sama vitakke. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Samā. Nisāmeti, nisāmayati. Nisāmanaṃ. Paṭisāmeti, paṭisāmayati. Paṭisāmanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2874: Tattha samāti saṃvaccharo, so “samā”ti itthiliṅgavasena vuccati. “Yo yajetha sataṃ sama”nti ettha hi samāsaddo itthiliṅgo, upayogavasena pana “sama”nti vutto.
anya-e0804n:2875_0: Imāni saṃvaccharassa nāmāni “saṃvaccharo, vaccharo, samā, hāyano, sarado, vasso”tiādīni
anya-e0804n:2875_1: bhavanti. Nisāmetīti vitakketi upadhāreti. Ettha hi “iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, nigghoso
anya-e0804n:2875_2: yādiso vane”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha nisāmehīti vitakkehi upadhārehīti attho. Paṭisāmetīti
anya-e0804n:2876: Sama ālocane. Ālocanaṃ pekkhanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Nisāmanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2877_0: Ettha pana nisāmetīti pekkhati oloketi. Tathā hi “iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, cittaṃ rūpaṃva
anya-e0804n:2877_1: dissatī”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha hi nisāmehīti olokehīti attho. Dhātūnamatthātisayena
anya-e0804n:2877_2: yogoti vacanato pana upasaggayogato vā savanepi ayaṃ vattati. Tathā hi “tato kaṇhājināyāpi,
anya-e0804n:2877_3: nisāmehi rathesabhā”tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti. Tattha nisāmehīti suṇohīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2878: Ama roge. Ameti, amayati. Andho. Bilaṅkapādo andhanakho.
anya-e0804n:2879: Tattha andhoti naṭṭhanayano vuccati. Andhanakhoti pūtinakho. Ubhayathāpi sarogattaṃ sūcitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2882: Sāma svāntane āmantane. Svāntanaṃ sāmappayogo. Āmantanaṃ avhāyanaṃ pakkosanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati.
anya-e0804n:2883_0: Saṅgāma yuddhe. Saṅgāmeti, saṅgāmayati. Dve rājāno saṅgāmesuṃ. Saṅgāmo. Āto gamu
anya-e0804n:2883_1: īsamadhivāsane. Āgameti, āgamayati, kāmāvacaradhamme nissāya rūpārūpadhammo samudāgameti,
anya-e0804n:2883_2: samudāgamayati. Upāsako dhammasavanantarāyaṃ anicchanto “āgametha āgamethā”ti āha.
anya-e0804n:2884_0: Tatra āgametīti īsakaṃ adhivāseti. Samudāgametīti sampavattati. Bhūvādigaṇe “gamayatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2884_1: hetukattuvasena vuttaṃ, idha pana upasagganipātapubbakāni katvā “āgametī”tiādīni
anya-e0804n:2894: Para gatiyaṃ. Pareti, parayati. Ettha ca “iti kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha aggāya parentīti arahattatthāya gacchanti.
anya-e0804n:2898: Vara icchāyaṃ. Vareti, varayati. Varo, varaṃ, varanto. Ete varānaṃ caturo varemi. Etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
anya-e0804n:2899: Tattha varoti variyate varitabboti varo. Varanti varetīti varaṃ, icchanto patthentoti attho.
anya-e0804n:2901: Muttaṃ muttaṃ sudassanaṃ, vande bodhivaraṃ vara”nti
anya-e0804n:2902_0: Purāṇakaviracanāyaṃ “vara”nti padassa viya. Evaṃ varetīti varanto. Vareti varemi
anya-e0804n:2902_1: icchāmi yācāmi. Kārite “pavāretī”ti rūpaṃ, icchāpetīti attho. Nisedhanatthe panidaṃ kāritaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0804n:2903: Sara akkhepe. Sareti, sarayati. Saro. Saroti saddo.
anya-e0804n:2904: Sāra dubbalye. Sāreti, sārayati. Dubbalo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2905: Kumāra kīḷāyaṃ. Kumāreti, kumārayati. Kumāro, kumārako. Kumārī, kumārikā.
anya-e0804n:2906: Ettha kumārayati tattha tattha kīḷatīti kumāro. So eva atidaharattā kumārako. Esa nayo itaratrāpi.
anya-e0804n:2907_0: Sūra vīra vikkantiyaṃ. Vikkanti vikkamanaṃ. Sūreti, sūrayati. Vīreti, vīrayati. Sūro,
anya-e0804n:2907_1: vīro. Sāsanikehi pana saddhammavidūhi evaṃ dhātusabhāvānampi sūravīrasaddānaṃ nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2907_2: na dassitaṃ, kevalaṃ pana tattha tattha “sūroti visiṭṭhauro”ti ca “mahāvīroti mahāvikkanto”ti
anya-e0804n:2908_0: Pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ. Kammasampatti nāma kammassa parisamāpanaṃ niṭṭhāpanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2908_1: Pāreti, pārayati. Tīreti, tīrayati. Pāraṃ. Tīraṃ. Vikkamāmi na pāremi, bhūmiṃ sumbhāmi
anya-e0804n:2908_2: vegasā. Taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvā gato. Santīraṇaṃ, tīraṇapariññāti ca ādīni ettha dassetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2909: Tattha na pāremīti chindituṃ na sakkomīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2911: Jara vayohānimhi. Jareti, jarayati. Jarā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “jīratī”ti pāṭho.
anya-e0804n:2912: Vara āvaraṇe. Vāreti, vārayati. Nivāreti, nivārayati. Nivāretā. Parivāreti, parivārayati. Parivāro. Pavāreti, pavārayati. Pavāraṇaṃ. Pavāraṇanti nisedhanaṃ vā kāmyadānaṃ vā.
anya-e0804n:2913: Dhara dhāraṇe. Dhāreti, dhārayati. Ādhāro, ādhārako, dhammo iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:2914_0: Tattha dhammoti anekavidhesu dhammesu lokuttaro uppādito sacchikato ca catūsu apāyesu
anya-e0804n:2914_1: saṃsāre vā satte apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. Atha vā sotāpannādīhi ariyehi dhāriyati,
anya-e0804n:2914_2: nu puthujjanehītipi dhammo. Catubhūmiko pana sakalakkhaṇaṃ dhāretīti dhammo. Kakkhaḷattādinā
anya-e0804n:2914_3: phusanādinā santiādinā sakasakabhāvena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati sallakkhiyatītipi dhammo.
anya-e0804n:2914_4: Tepiṭako pana pāḷidhammo sakatthaparatthādibhee atthe dhāretīti dhammo. Keci tu vidū
anya-e0804n:2914_5: “pāpake akusale dhamme dhunāti kampeti viddhaṃsetīti dhammo”ti dhūdhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0804n:2914_6: vadanti, taṃ maggadhamme atīva yujjati, phalanibbānapariyattidhammesu pana pariyāyena yujjati.
anya-e0804n:2915_1: suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu hetumhi.
anya-e0804n:2916: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n:2917: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti
anya-e0804n:2918: Ādīsu guṇe. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”tiādīsu nissattanijjīvatāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2919_1: yapaccayuppannādīsu dissati. Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
anya-e0804n:2921: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2923: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n:2924: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2925_1: dhammā, saṅghādisesā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ
anya-e0804n:2925_2: geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu
anya-e0804n:2926_1: diṭṭhappayogo. Tathā hi “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:2926_3: samādhimhi. “Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”ti evamādīsu paññāyaṃ. “Jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0804n:2926_4: sattāna”nti evamādīsu pakatiyaṃ. “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri”nti evamādīsu puññe.
anya-e0804n:2926_5: “Cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Kusalā dhammā”tiādīsu ñeyye. Evaṃ dhammasaddappavattivisayā
anya-e0804n:2926_6: vividhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassitā, tattha tattha pana ādisaddena yuttivisayādayo
anya-e0804n:2926_7: ca atthā gahetabbā. Tathā hi dhammasaddo –
anya-e0804n:2927: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako;
anya-e0804n:2928: Ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiyā”ti
anya-e0804n:2929_0: Ādīsu yuttiyaṃ vattati. “Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2929_1: visaye. “Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī”ti ettha nibbāne vattati. Tatra yā nissattatā,
anya-e0804n:2929_2: sā eva nijjīvatā. Yo ca hetu, so eva paccayo.
anya-e0804n:2932: Sabhāve ceva paññāyaṃ, puññe paññattiyampi ca.
anya-e0804n:2936: Keci pana dhammasaddassa pavattivisayānaṃ dasadhāva paricchedaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2937: Ñeyyamagge ca nibbāne, sabhāve atha jātiyaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2940: Tatra atthuddhāroti samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro.
anya-e0804n:2943_0: Pāla rakkhaṇe. “Rakkhaṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, gopanaṃ, avanaṃ, pālanaṃ, rakkhā, rakkhaṇā, gutti”
anya-e0804n:2943_1: iccete pariyāyā. Pāleti, pālayati. Pālako, buddhapālo. Ambapālī gaṇikā. Samo bhavatu
anya-e0804n:2944_0: Ettha pāḷīti atthaṃ pāletīti pāḷi, lassa ḷattaṃ. Atha vā antodakaṃ rakkhaṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n:2944_1: mahato taḷākassa thirā mahatīti pāḷi viyāti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo. Aparo nayo pakaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2944_2: ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi bhāsitattā
anya-e0804n:2947_2: paṭipāṭiyā nisīdiṃsūti attho. Imasmiṃ panatthe dhātuyā kiccaṃ natthi. Pāṭipadiko
anya-e0804n:2948: Tila sinehane. Teleti, telayati. Telaṃ, tilo, tilaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2949_0: Tattha tiloti tilagaccho. Tilanti tapphalaṃ. Tato pana nikkhanto sineho telaṃ. So
